src: Make sure your hand is as relaxed as possible while still hitting all the notes correctly - also try not to make much extraneous motion with your fingers. This way, you will tire yourself out as little as possible. Remember there's no need to hit the keys with a lot of force for extra volume like on the piano. On the accordion, to get extra volume, you use the bellows with more pressure or speed.

src: One of the most common problems when trying to convert a movie to DVD format is the overscan. Most televisions are made in a way to please the general public. For that reason, everything you see on the TV had the borders cut, top, bottom and sides. This is made to ensure that the image covers the whole screen. That is called overscan. Unfortunately, when you make a DVD, it's borders will most likely be cut too, and if the video had subtitles too close to the bottom, they won't be fully shown.
mt: Moja ya maswala yanayojulikana zaidi wakati wa kubadilisha filamu kwa ajili ya formati ya DVD ni overscan. Zaidi ya nyingine, zaidi ya televisheni zimejengwa kwa ajili ya kushirikiana na umma. Kwa hiyo, yote ulivyoona kwenye televisheni, yalikuwa yamekatazwa, juu, chini na mawimbi. Hii inatokana na kuhakikisha kuwa picha inakubali kila sehemu ya skrini. Hivyo, wakati wa kufanya DVD, sehemu zake zitakatazwa pia, na kama video ilikuwa na orodha pia kama orodha, zitakatazwa pia.
ref: Shida moja ya kawaida wakati wa kujaribu kubadilisha sinema kwenda kwa muundo wa DVD ni kuskani zaidi. Vipindi vingi vya televisheni nyingi hutengenezwa kwa njia ya kufurahisha umma. Kwa sababu hiyo, kila kitu mnachokiona kwenye runinga kilikatwa mipaka, juu, chini na pande. Hii hufanywa ili kuhakikisha picha inafunika skrini yote. Hiyo inaitwa kuskani kulikokithiri. Kwa bahati mbaya, unapotengeneza DVD, kuna uwezekano kingo zake zitakatwa pia, na kama video ilikuwa na maandishi ya tafsiri yaliyokuwa karibu sana na chini, pia hayataonyeshwa.

src: The American plan relied on launching coordinated attacks from three different directions. General John Cadwalder would launch a diversionary attack against the British garrison at Bordentown, in order to block off any reinforcements. General James Ewing would take 700 militia across the river at Trenton Ferry, seize the bridge over the Assunpink Creek and prevent any enemy troops from escaping. The main assault force of 2,400 men would cross the river nine miles north of Trenton, and then split into two groups, one under Greene and one under Sullivan, in order to launch a pre-dawn attack.
mt: Plan ya Kimarekani ulikuwa unaangazia ushindi kwa kushirikiana katika vitendo vitatu tofauti. Jenerali John Cadwalder alikuwa anashirikiana katika vitendo vya kujitafutia kwa kushirikiana na askari wa kijiji cha Bordentown, ili kublock kwa kushirikiana na mabasi ya kushirikiana. Jenerali James Ewing alikuwa akishirikiana na askari 700 kwa kushirikiana kwa kushirikiana kwa kushirikiana kwa kushirikiana kwa kushirikiana kwa kushirikiana kwa kushirikiana kwa kushirikiana kwa kushirikiana kwa kushirikiana kwa kushirikiana kwa kushirikiana kwa kushirikiana kwa kushirikiana kwa kushirikiana kwa kushirikiana kwa kushirikiana kwa kushirikiana kwa kushirikiana kwa kushirikiana kwa kushirikiana kwa kushirikiana kwa kushirikiana kwa kushirikiana kwa kushirikiana kwa kushirikiana kwa kushirikiana kwa kushirikiana kwa kushirikiana kwa kushirikiana kwa kushirikiana kwa kushirikiana kwa kushirikiana kwa kushirikiana kwa kushirikiana kwa kushirikiana kwa kushirikiana kwa kushirikiana kwa kushirikiana kwa kushirikiana kwa kushirikiana kwa kushirikiana kwa kushirikiana kwa kushirikiana kwa kushirikiana kwa kushirikiana kwa kushirikiana kwa kushirikiana kwa kushirikiana kwa kushirikiana kwa kushirikiana kwa kushirikiana kwa kushirikiana kwa kushirikiana kwa kushirikiana kwa kushirik
ref: Mpango wa Marekani ulitegemea uanzishaji wa mashambulio yaliyoratibiwa kutoka pande tatu tofauti. Jenerali John Cadwalder alianzisha shambulio la kupotosha dhidi ya ngome ya Uingereza katika Bordentown, ili kuzuia usaidizi wowote. Jenerali James Ewing angewachukua wanamgambo 700 na kuvuka mto huko Kivukio cha Trenton, kutwaa kwa nguvu daraja iliyoko juu ya Asunpink Creek na kuwazuia wanamgambo wowote adui kutoroka. Kikosi kikuu cha ushambuliaji chenye wanaume 2,400 kilivuka mto maili tisa kaskazini mwa Trenton, kisha kugawanyika kwa vikundi viwili, kimoja chini ya Greene na kingine chini ya Sullivan, ili kuanzisha shambulio kabla ya macheo.

src: "After its adoption by Congress on July 4, a handwritten draft signed by the President of Congress John Hancock and the Secretary Charles Thomson was then sent a few blocks away to the printing shop of John Dunlap. Through the night between 150 and 200 copies were made, now known as ""Dunlap broadsides"". The first public reading of the document was by John Nixon in the yard of Independence Hall on July 8. One was sent to George Washington on July 6, who had it read to his troops in New York on July 9. A copy reached London on August 10. The 25 Dunlap broadsides still known to exist are the oldest surviving copies of the document. The original handwritten copy has not survived."
mt: "Baada ya kufikiwa na Bunge la kongresu tarehe 4 Julai, kipindi cha kufikia kwa kipindi cha kufikia kipindi cha kufikia kipindi cha kufikia kipindi cha kufikia kipindi cha kufikia kipindi cha kufikia kipindi cha kufikia kipindi cha kufikia kipindi cha kufikia kipindi cha kufikia kipindi cha kufikia kipindi cha kufikia kipindi cha kufikia kipindi cha kufikia kipindi cha kufikia kipindi cha kufikia kipindi cha kufikia kipindi cha kufikia kipindi cha kufikia kipindi cha kufikia kipindi cha kufikia kipindi cha kufikia kipindi cha kufikia kipindi cha kufikia kipindi cha kufikia kipindi cha kufikia kipindi cha kufikia kipindi cha kufikia kipindi cha kufikia kipindi cha kufikia kipindi cha kufikia kipindi cha kufikia kipindi cha kufikia kipindi cha kufikia kipindi cha kufikia kipindi cha kufikia kipindi cha kufikia kipindi cha kufikia kipindi cha kufikia kipindi cha kufikia kipindi cha kufikia kipindi cha kufikia kipindi cha kufikia kipindi cha kufikia kipindi cha kufikia kipindi cha kufikia kipindi cha kufikia kipindi cha kufikia kipindi cha kufikia kipindi cha kufikia kipindi cha kufikia kipindi cha kufikia kipindi cha kufikia kipindi cha kufikia kipindi cha kufikia kipindi cha kufikia kipindi cha kufikia kipindi cha kufikia kipindi cha kufikia kipindi cha kuf
ref: Baada ya kukubaliwa na Kongresi mnamo Julai 4, rasimu iliyoandikwa kwa hati ya mkono na kutiwa sahihi na Rais wa Kongresi John Hancock na Katibu Charles Thomson ilitumwa vitalu vichache kwa duka la uchapishaji la John Dunlap. Usiku kucha kati ya nakala 150 na 200 zilitengenezwa, ambazo sasa zinajulikana kama “Vikaratasi vya Dunlop”. Usomaji wa kwanza kwa umma wa hati hiyo ulifanywa na John Nixon katika yadi ya Ukumbi wa Uhuru mnamo Julai 8. Moja ilitumwa kwa George Washington mnamo Julai 6, ambaye aliifanya isomewe vikosi vyake katika New York mnamo Julai 9. Nakala ilifika London mnamo Agosti 10. Nakala 25 za Dunlap zenye cheche za mashambulizi zinazojulikana kuwahi kuwepo ndizo nakala kongwe zaidi za hati hiyo zinazopatikana. Nakala asili iliyoandikwa kwa mkono haipo.

src: The Colonists, seeing this activity, had also called for reinforcements. Troops reinforcing the forward positions included the 1st and 3rd New Hampshire regiments of 200 men, under Colonels John Stark and James Reed (both later became generals). Stark's men took positions along the fence on the north end of the Colonist's position. When low tide opened a gap along the Mystic River along the northeast of the peninsula, they quickly extended the fence with a short stone wall to the north ending at the water's edge on a small beach. Gridley or Stark placed a stake about 100 feet (30 m) in front of the fence and ordered that no one fire until the regulars passed it.
mt: Wakoloni, wakikuta hali hii, waliwataka kwa upande wao. Wakati wa kufufuka kwa mchanga wa mto Mystic kuelekea kaskazini mwa nchi, wakakata kwa nguvu kwa wakati wa kufufuka kwa mchanga. ref: Wakoloni, walipoona shughuli hii, pia waliita wasaidizi. Majeshi yanayoimarisha nafasi za mbele ni pamoja na ya 1 na ya 3 ya majeshi ya New Hampshire yaliyo na wanaume 200, yaliyo chini ya makanali John Stark na James Reed (ambao baadaye wote walikuwa majenerali). Wanaume wa Stark walichukua nafasi kando ya uzio upande wa kaskazini mwa nafasi ya Mkoloni. Wakati kupwa kwa maji kulifungua mwanya katika Mto Mystic katika kaskazini mashariki mwa rasi, waliendeleza ua kwa haraka kwa ukuta mfupi wa mawe upande wa kaskazini na kuishia kwenye ukingo wa maji katika pwani ndogo. Gridley au Stark aliweka nguzo umbali wa kama futi 100 (mita 30) mbele ya uzio na akaamuru kwamba hakuna atakayeiwasha moto hadi watu wa kawaida watakapokuwa wameipita.

src: Ancient China had a unique way of showing different time periods; each stage of China or each family that was in power was a distinctive dynasty. Also between each dynasty was an unstable age of divided provinces. The best-known of these periods was the Three Kingdoms epoch taking place for 60 years between the Han and the Jin Dynasty. During these periods fierce warfare took place between many nobles fighting for the throne. The Three Kingdoms was one of the bloodiest eras in Ancient China’s history thousands of people died fighting to sit in the highest seat in the grand palace at Xi’an.
mt: China ya Kale ilikuwa na njia yake ya kutoa maelezo tofauti kuhusu muda; kila kipindi cha China au kila familia ambayo ilikuwa na nguvu ilikuwa kifalme cha kawaida. Pia kati ya kila kifalme kuna umasikini wa maeneo yaliyotengana. Kipindi cha maarufu zaidi kati ya hayo lilikuwa kipindi cha Mitaa Tatu kilicho kifika kwa miaka 60 kati ya Han na Jin. Kati ya muda huu mafuriko mengi yalitokea kati ya wanyama wengi waliokuwa wakifanya vita kwa madaraka. Mitaa Tatu ilikuwa moja ya mafuriko mengi kati ya historia ya China ya Kale, ngao zaidi za watu zaidi zilikuwa wamefariki kwa kushinda madaraka katika ngome kubwa ya Xi’an.
ref: Uchina ya kale ilikuwa na njia ya kipekee ya kuonyesha vipindi tofauti vya wakati; kila hatua ya Uchina au kila familia iliyokuwa mamlakani ilikuwa nasaba maalumu. Pia kati ya kila nasaba kilikuwa kipindi kisicho na msimamo cha majimbo yaliyogawanyika. Maarufu sana kati ya vipindi hivi ilikuwa enzi za Falme Tatu za ya Han na Jin. Wakati wa vipindi hivi vita vikali vilifanyika kati ya waangwana wakipigania kiti cha enzi. Falme Tatu ilikuwa enzi yenye umwagaji damu zaidi katika historia ya China ya Kale, maelfu ya watu walikufa wakipigania kuketi kwenye kiti cha juu zaidi katika ikulu ya Xi'an.

src: Army ant colonies march and nest in different phases as well. In the nomadic phase, army ants march at night and stop to camp during the day. The colony begins a nomadic phase when available food has decreased. During this phase, the colony makes temporary nests that are changed everyday. Each of these nomadic rampages or marches lasts for approximately 17 days.

src: Many observed rhythms in physiology and behavior often crucially depend on the presence of endogenous cycles and their production through biological clocks. Periodic rhythms, which are not simply responses to external periodic cues, have been documented for most living beings, including bacteria, fungi, plants, and animals. Biological clocks are self sustaining oscillators which will continue a period of free-running cycling even in the absence of external cues.
mt: Zaidi ya hayo, vyombo vya habari vya ndani vinaripoti kwamba gari la zimamoto la uwanja wa ndege lilibingirika wakati wa kuitikia.
ref: Wengi walifuata mtindo katika fiziolojia na tabia ambazo mara nyingi hutegemea uwepo wa vipindi vya kiasili na uzalishaji wao kupitia mida za kibiolojia. Midundo ya mara kwa mara, ambayo si jibu tu kwa ishara za nje za mara kwa mara, imerekodiwa kwa viumbe wengi wenye uhai, zikiwemo bakteria, kuvu, mimea na wanyama, Saa za kibiolojia ni osileta zinazojimudu ambazo zitaendeleza kipindi cha ujiendeshaji wa mzunguko hata pasipo na vidokezo vya nje.

src: A population is the collection of organisms of a particular species within a given geographic area. When all individuals in a population are identical with regard to a particular phenotypic trait they are known as monomorphic. When the individuals show several variants of a particular trait they are polymorphic.
mt: Jumuiya ni kundi la wanyama wa spishi fulani katika eneo fulani. Kama wanyama wote katika jumuiya hii wana uwezo fulani wa kujitambua wanaojulikana kama monomorfiki. Kama wanyama wana uwezo wa kujitambua wanaojulikana kama polimorfiki.
ref: Idadi ni mkusanyiko wa viumbehai wa spishi maalum ndani ya eneo fulani la kijiografia. Wakati kila mmoja katika idadi ya wakazi ni sawa kwa kuzingatia tabia fulani ya maumbile wanajulikana kama wanajinsia moja. Wakati watu wanaonyesha tofauti kadhaa za tabia fulani wanasemekana kuwa polimofiki.

src: Nature-based tourism attracts people interested in visiting natural areas for the purpose of enjoying the scenery, including plant and animal wildlife. Examples of on-site activities include hunting, fishing, photography, bird watching, and visiting parks and studying information about the ecosystem. An example is visiting, photographing, and learning about organgatuangs in Borneo.
mt: Utafiti wa kimaisha unatambulisha watu wanaoendesha shughuli za kimaisha kwa ajili ya kuona maeneo ya asili kwa ajili ya kutumia picha, kama vile wanyama na wanyama. Mifano ya shughuli za kawaida ni kama vile kuangalia, kupiga picha, kuangalia wanyama, na kufika katika mitihani na kujifunza habari kuhusu ekosistem. Mifano ni kama vile kufika, kupiga picha, na kujifunza habari kuhusu organgatuangs katika Borneo.
ref: Utalii wa asili huvutia watu walio na nia ya kutembelea maeneo ya asili kwa sababu ya kuburudishwa na maadhari, pamoja na mimea na wanyama. Mifano ya shughuli za eneoni ni pamoja na uwindaji, uvuvi, upigaji picha, kutazama ndege, na kutembelea mbuga na kusoma habari za mfumo wa ikolojia. Mfano ni kutembelea, kupiga picha, na kujifunza juu ya nyani wakubwa huko Borneo.

src: Every morning, people leave small country towns in cars to go their workplace and are passed by others whose work destination is the place they have just left. In this dynamic transport shuttle everyone is somehow connected with, and supporting, a transport system based on private cars. Science now indicates that this massive carbon economy has dislodged the biosphere from one of its stable states that has supported human evolution for the past two million years.
mt: Kila asubuhi, watu wanaelekea miji mikubwa ya nchi za chini kwa gari kwa ajili ya kazi na wengine wanaelekea mahali ambapo wameelekea kwa ajili ya kazi. Katika ushahidi huu wa kasi wa kasi ya kasi, kila mtu anasambaa na kufanya kazi katika mfumo wa usafirishaji ulioitwa kwa gari. Sayansi sasa inaonyesha kwamba mfumo huu wa kimaumbukano wa kimaumbukano umewaacha mazingira ya kijani kutoka katika hali ya kawaida ambayo imeendeleza utambuzi wa binadamu kwa miaka 2 milioni.
ref: Kila asubuhi, watu huondoka miji midogo mashambani ndani ya magari wakielekea kazini wakipitana na wengine ambao wanaelekea kazini walikotoka wao. Katika chombo hiki imara cha usafiri, kila mtu kwa njia fulani ameunganishwa na, na kuunga mkono, mfumo wa usafiri unaotegemea magari ya kibinafsi. Sayansi sasa inaashiria kuwa uchumi huu mkubwa wa kaboni umeondoa nyanjahai ya dunia kutoka mojawapo ya hali zake imara ambayo ilipaswa kushikilia mageuzi ya mwanadamu kwa miaka milioni mbili iliyopita.

src: The atom can be considered to be one of the fundamental building blocks of all matter. Its a very complex entity which consists, according to a simplified Bohr model, of a central nucleus orbited by electrons, somewhat similar to planets orbiting the sun - see Figure 1.1. The nucleus consists of two particles - neutrons and protons. Protons have a positive electric charge while neutrons have no charge. The electrons have a negative electric charge.
mt: Atomi ni kifaa kipya cha kujengwa kwa kila kitu. Ni kitu kikubwa ambacho kinaweza kujulikana kwa kufuata mfano wa Bohr, ambako kuna nuklea ya kati ambayo inamilikiwa na elektroni, kama vile dunia inamilikiwa na nyota - angalia Fig. 1.1. Nuklea inamilikiwa na majina mawili - nyakati na protoni. Protoni zina joto la kipindu cha kipuvi, wakati nyakati zina joto la kipuvi. Elekroni zina joto la kipuvi cha kipindu cha kipuvi.
ref: Atomu inaweza kuchukuliwa kama mojawapo ya mawe msingi ya ujenzi ya dutu zote. Ni chombo tata ambacho kulingana na mfano uliorahisishwa wa Bohr, kina nyuklia ya kati inayozungukwa na elektroni, sawa na sayari zinavyozunguka jua - ona Mchoro 1.1. Nyuklia ina chembe mbili - nyutroni na protoni. Protoni zina chaji chanya ya umeme wakati neutroni hazina chaji. Elektroni zina chaji hasi ya umeme.

src: Virtually all computers in use today are based on the manipulation of information which is coded in the form of binary numbers. A binary number can have only one of two values, i.e. 0 or 1, and these numbers are referred to as binary digits - or bits, to use computer jargon.
mt: Kila kompyuta inayotumika leo inabebeka kwenye mawimbi ya habari ambayo inaandaliwa kwa namna ya kifungua kwa namba za kibina. Namba za kibina zinaweza kufanywa kwa namna moja tu, i.e. 0 au 1, na hizi namba zinajulikana kama namba za kibina - au bit, kama inavyojulikana kwa lugha ya kompyuta.
ref: Karibu kompyuta zote zinazotumika leo zimekitwa katika kuendeshwa kwa habari ambayo imewekwa katika msimbo ulio katika hali ya nambari za bainari. Nambari ya bainari yaweza tu kuwa na thamani moja kati ya mbili, yaani 0 au 1, na hizi nambari zinajulikana kama takwimu jozi, au biti, katika msamiati wa kompyuta.

src: Virtually all computers in use today are based on the manipulation of information which is coded in the form of binary numbers. A binary number can have only one of two values, i.e. 0 or 1, and these numbers are referred to as binary digits - or bits, to use computer jargon.

src: "Blogs can also help improve student writing. While students often begin their blog experience with sloppy grammar and spelling, the presence of an audience generally changes that. Since students are often the most critical audience, the blog writer begins to strive to improve writing to avoid criticism. Also blogging ""forces students to become more savvy about the world around them."" The need to feed the interest of the audience inspires students to be clever and interesting (Toto, 2004). Blogging is a tool that inspires collaboration, and encourages students to extend learning well beyond the traditional school day. Appropriate use of blogs ""can empower students to become more analytical and critical; through actively responding to Internet materials, students can define their positions in the context of others' writings as well as outline their own perspectives on particular issues (Oravec, 2002)."
mt: "Blogs pia huweza kuhusisha kuchangamka kwa kuchapisha. Wataalamu wengi wanaanza kazi yao ya kuchapisha kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi
ref: "Blogi pia zinaweza kuimarisha uandishi wa mwanafunzi. Huku wanafunzi wakianza tajriba yao ya blogi na matatizo ya sarufi na herufi, uwepo wa hadhira kijumla hubadilisha hilo. Kwa kuwa wanafunzi ndio hadhira muhimu zaidi, mwandishi wa blogu huanza kujitahidi kuboresha uandishi ili kuzuia kukosolewa. Uandishi blogi pia ""hulazimisha wanafunzi kuwa wajuzi wa ulimwengu unaowazunguka."" Hitaji la kutosheleza ari ya hadhira huwachochea wanafunzi kuwa werevu na wenye kuvutia (Toto, 2004). Uandishi blogi ni kifaa kinachochochea ushirikiano, na kuhimiza wanafunzi kupanua usomaji zaidi ya siku ya kawaida ya masomo shuleni. Utumiaji mwafaka wa blogu “unaweza kuwawezesha wanafunzi kuwa wachambuzi na wa kushutumu zaidi; kupitia kujibu nyenzo za Intaneti kiamilifu, wanafunzi wanaweza kuaini nafasi zao katika muktadha wa maandiko ya wengine vilevile kuelezea mitazamo yao wenyewe kuhusu masuala maalum (Oravec, 2002)."

src: Asynchronous communication encourages time for reflection and reaction to others. It allows students the ability to work at their own pace and control the pace of instructional information. In addition, there are fewer time restrictions with the possibility of flexible working hours. (Bremer, 1998) The use of the Internet and the World Wide Web allows learners to have access to information at all times. Students can also submit questions to instructors at any time of day and expect reasonably quick responses, rather than waiting until the next face-to-face meeting.
mt: Ukamilifu wa mawasiliano unawasilisha wakati wa ufupi na ufupi wa kujibu wengine. Inawafaa wanafunzi kufanya kazi kwa muda wao na kudhibiti muda wa habari ya elimu. Pamoja na hayo, kuna madhara ya kifungua na uwezo wa kazi za kawaida. (Bremer, 1998) Kusitisha kwa Internet na World Wide Web inawafaa wanafunzi kufika kwenye habari kwa wakati wote. Wanafunzi pia wanaweza kutoa swali kwa mwalimu wakati wowote wa siku na kutafakari kwa kasi ya kawaida, zaidi ya kukaa hadi kufika kwa kikao cha kawaida.
ref: Mawasiliano mengi ya kisolandanifu huchochea muda wa kutafakari na kuitikia wengine. Huwaruhusu wanafunzi uwezo wa kufanya kazi kwa mwendo wao wenyewe na kudhibiti mwendo wa taarifa za mafundisho. Isitoshe, kuna vizuizi vichache vya saa na uwezekano wa saa huru za kufanya kazi. (Bremer, 1998) Matumizi ya intaneti na Wavuti wa Ulimwengu Wote unaruhusu wanafunzi kupata habari kila wakati. Wanafunzi wanaweza pia kupeleka maswali kwa waalimu wakati wowote wa siku na wanatarajia majibu ya haraka, badala ya kungojea mkutano wa uso-kwa-uso utakaofuata.

Pamoja na hayo, kuna madhara ya kifungua na uwezo wa kazi za kawaida. (Bremer, 1998) Kusitisha kwa Internet na World Wide Web inawafaa wanafunzi kufika kwenye habari kwa wakati wote. Wanafunzi pia wanaweza kutoa swali kwa mwalimu wakati wowote wa siku na kutafakari kwa kasi ya kawaida, zaidi ya kukaa hadi kufika kwa kikao cha kawaida.
ref: Mawasiliano mengi ya kisolandanifu huchochea muda wa kutafakari na kuitikia wengine. Huwaruhusu wanafunzi uwezo wa kufanya kazi kwa mwendo wao wenyewe na kudhibiti mwendo wa taarifa za mafundisho. Isitoshe, kuna vizuizi vichache vya saa na uwezekano wa saa huru za kufanya kazi. (Bremer, 1998) Matumizi ya intaneti na Wavuti wa Ulimwengu Wote unaruhusu wanafunzi kupata habari kila wakati. Wanafunzi wanaweza pia kupeleka maswali kwa waalimu wakati wowote wa siku na wanatarajia majibu ya haraka, badala ya kungojea mkutano wa uso-kwa-uso utakaofuata.

src: The traditional medieval castle has long inspired the imagination, conjuring up images of jousts, banquets and Arthurian chivalry. Even standing amidst thousand year-old ruins it is easy to bring to mind the sounds and smells of battles long gone, to almost hear the clatter of hooves on the cobbles and to smell the fear rising from the dungeon pits. But is our imagination based on reality? Why were castles built in the first place? How were they designed and built?
mt: Kasteli ya kihistoria kimepata mafanikio kwa miaka mingi, kujaza kwa picha za michezo ya kifalme, majadiliano na chifuwache cha kifalme cha Arthur. Hata kwa kusimama katikati mwa magofu ya miaka elfu ni rahisi kuwa na taswira ya sauti na harufu ya vita vilivyopita kitambo, na karibu kusikia mlio wa kwato kwenye barabara za mawe na kunusa uoga kutoka kwenye jela za chini kwa chini. src: Typical for the period, Kirby Muxloe Castle is more of a fortified house than a true castle. Its large glazed windows and thin walls would not have been able to resist a determined attack for long. In the 1480s, when its construction was begun by Lord Hastings, the country was relatively peaceful and defense was only required against small bands of roving marauders.
mt: Kawaida kwa muda, Kirbi Muxloe Castle ni zaidi ya nyumba yenye silaha kuliko ngome. Vitabu vyake vikubwa na majengo yake mabovu hawakutakiwi kudumu dhidi ya kushitakiwa kwa muda mrefu. Katika miaka ya 1480, wakati wa kuanzishwa kwa nyumba hiyo na Lord Hastings, nchi ilikuwa rahisi na kudumu na kudhulikia kwa kushitakiwa dhidi ya kundi chenye kushitakiwa.
ref: Kwa kawaida ya kipindi hicho, Ngome ya Kirby Muxloe ni zaidi ya nyumba ambayo imeimarishwa kuliko ngome ya kweli. Madirisha yenye glasi kubwa na kuta nyembamba hazingeweza kupinga shambulio kwa muda mrefu. Katika miaka ya 1480, wakati ujenzi wake ulipoanzishwa na Bwana Hastings, nchi ilikuwa yenye amani kiasi na ulinzi ulihitajika tu dhidi ya vikundi vidogo vya wanyang’anyi.

src: With the change from the quarter to the half mile run, speed becomes of much less importance and endurance becomes an absolute necessity. Of course a first-class half-miler, a man who can beat two minutes, must be possessed of a fair amount of speed, but endurance must be cultivated at all hazards. Some cross country running during the winter, combined with gymnasium work for the upper part of the body, is the best preparation for the running season.
mt: Kwa mabadiliko kutoka kilometa cha tatu hadi kilometa cha sita, ushindi unaweza kufanya kazi kwa kasi, lakini ushindi unaweza kufanya kazi kwa kasi, lakini ushindi unaweza kufanya kazi kwa kasi, lakini ushindi unaweza kufanya kazi kwa kasi, lakini ushindi unaweza kufanya kazi kwa kasi, lakini ushindi unaweza kufanya kazi kwa kasi, lakini ushindi unaweza kufanya kazi kwa kasi, lakini ushindi unaweza kufanya kazi kwa kasi, lakini ushindi unaweza kufanya kazi kwa kasi, lakini ushindi unaweza kufanya kazi kwa kasi, lakini ushindi unaweza kufanya kazi kwa kasi, lakini ushindi unaweza kufanya kazi kwa kasi, lakini ushindi unaweza kufanya kazi kwa kasi, lakini ushindi unaweza kufanya kazi kwa kasi, lakini ushindi unaweza kufanya kazi kwa kasi, lakini ushindi unaweza kufanya kazi kwa kasi, lakini ushindi unaweza kufanya kazi kwa kasi, lakini ushindi unaweza kufanya kazi kwa kasi, lakini ushindi unaweza kufanya kazi kwa kasi, lakini ushindi unaweza kufanya kazi kwa kasi, lakini ushindi unaweza kufanya kazi kwa kasi, lakini ushindi unaweza kufanya kazi kwa kasi, lakini ushindi unaweza kufanya kazi kwa kasi, lakini ushindi unaweza kufanya kazi kwa kasi, lakini ushindi unaweza kufanya kazi kwa kasi, lakini ushindi unaweza kufanya kazi kwa kasi, lakini ushindi unaweza kufanya kazi kwa kasi, lakini ushindi
ref: Kwa mabadiliko kutoka mbio za robo hadi nusu maili, kasi huwa yenye umuhimu mdogo zaidi na ustahimilivu ukawa hitaji lenye umuhimu kabisa. Kwa kweli mkimbiaji wa daraja la kwanza wa nusu maili, mtu anayeweza kufuzu kwa dakika mbili, lazima awe na kasi ya kutosha, lakini uvumilivu lazima ustawishwe wakati wote wa hatari. Mbio kiasi za mashambani katika msimu wa baridi, pamoja na shughuli katika ukumbi wa mazoezi kwa ajili ya sehemu ya juu ya mwili, ndiyo maandalizi bora ya msimu wa mbio.

src: Proper nutritional practices alone cannot generate elite performances, but they can significantly affect young athletes' overall wellness. Maintaining a healthy energy balance, practicing effective hydration habits, and understanding the various aspects of supplementation practices can help athletes improve their performance and increase their enjoyment of the sport.
mt: Utafiti wa usafi wa vyakula pekee hauwezi kuleta ushindi wa kijamii, lakini inaweza kubadilisha usalama kwa wanaume wadogo wanaocheza kwa kiasi kikubwa. Kujikimu kwa usalama wa kipato, kufanya mazoezi ya usafi wa maji, na kuelewa masuala mbalimbali ya mengine ya mawazo ya usafi, yanaweza kuwafanya wanaume wadogo wanaocheza kufanya mazao yao kubadilika na kuongeza wao kufurahia mchezo.
ref: Mazoea ya lishe sahihi pekee haiwezi kuzalisha usomi wa utendaji, ila yanaweza kuathiri kwa kiasi kikubwa na ustawi wa wakimbiaji wachanga kwa ujumla. Kudumisha uwiano bora wa kawi, kuwa na mazoea ya unywaji wa maji yenye ufanisi, na kuelewa vipengele tofauti vya mazoea ya ziada kunaweza kusaidia wanariadha kuboresha utendaji wao na kuongeza raha yao katika spoti hiyo.

src: Middle distance running is a relatively inexpensive sport; however, there are many misconceptions regarding the few pieces of equipment required to participate. Products can be purchased as needed, but most will have little or no real impact on performance. Athletes may feel that they prefer a product even when it provides no real benefits.
mt: Ukumbi wa mabwajio ni kiuchumi kidogo; lakini kuna mashaka mengi kuhusu vitu vichache vya kawaida vinavyotakiwa kwa kushirikiana. Vitu vya kawaida vinauzwa kama inavyotarajiwa, lakini wengi watahitaji kwa sababu zisizo za kawaida.
ref: Mbio za umbali wa kati ni spoti isiyo ghali sana; hata hivyo, kuna dhana nyingi potovu kuhusu zana chache zinazohitajika ili kushiriki. Bidhaa zinaweza kununuliwa zinapotakikana, lakini nyingi zitakuwa na athari ndogo au isiyo halisi kwa utendaji. Wanariadha wanaweza kuhisi wanapendelea bidhaa hata kama haina manufaa halisi.

src: MRI is based on a physics phenomenon called nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR), which was discovered in the 1930s by Felix Bloch (working at Stanford University) and Edward Purcell (from Harvard University). In this resonance, magnetic field and radio waves cause atoms to give off tiny radio signals. In the year 1970, Raymond Damadian, a medical doctor and research scientist, discovered the basis for using magnetic resonance imaging as a tool for medical diagnosis. Four years later a patent was granted, which was the world's first patent issued in the field of MRI. In 1977, Dr. Damadian completed the construction of the first “whole-body” MRI scanner, which he called the ”Indomitable”.
mt: MRI inategemea mifumo ya fizikia ya kujitambua kwa kipimo cha kujitambua kwa kipimo cha kujitambua kwa kipimo cha kujitambua kwa kipimo cha kujitambua kwa kipimo cha kujitambua kwa kipimo cha kujitambua kwa kipimo cha kujitambua kwa kipimo cha kujitambua kwa kipimo cha kujitambua kwa kipimo cha kujitambua kwa kipimo cha kujitambua kwa kipimo cha kujitambua kwa kipimo cha kujitambua kwa kipimo cha kujitambua kwa kipimo cha kujitambua kwa kipimo cha kujitambua kwa kipimo cha kujitambua kwa kipimo cha kujitambua kwa kipimo cha kujitambua kwa kipimo cha kujitambua kwa kipimo cha kujitambua kwa kipimo cha kujitambua kwa kipimo cha kujitambua kwa kipimo cha kujitambua kwa kipimo cha kujitambua kwa kipimo cha kujitambua kwa kipimo cha kujitambua kwa kipimo cha kujitambua kwa kipimo cha kujitambua kwa kipimo cha kujitambua kwa kipimo cha kujitambua kwa kipimo cha kujitambua kwa kipimo cha kujitambua kwa kipimo cha kujitambua kwa kipimo cha kujitambua kwa kipimo cha kujitambua kwa kipimo cha kujitambua kwa kipimo cha kujitambua kwa kipimo cha kujitambua kwa kipimo cha kujitambua kwa kipimo cha kujitambua kwa kipimo cha kujitambua kwa kipimo cha kujitambua kwa kipimo cha kujitambua kwa kipimo cha kujitambua
ref: MRI ni ya msingi wa fizikia inayoitwa nyuklia mwangwi wa sumaku (NMR), ambayo iligunduliwa katika 1930s na Felix Bloch (anayefanya kazi katika Chuo Kikuu cha Stanford) na Edward Purcell (kutoka Chuo Kikuu cha Harvard). Katika tasnifu hii, uga wa sumaku na wimbiredio husababisha atomi kutoa ishara ndogo za redio. Katika mwaka wa 1970, Raymond Damadian, daktari wa kimatibabu na mtafiti wa kisayansi, aligundua msingi wa kutumia picha za mwangwi wa sumaku kama kifaa cha utambuzi wa kimatibabu. Miaka minne baadaye leseni ilitolewa, ambayo ilikuwa leseni ya kwanza ulimwenguni iliyotolewa katika sehemu ya MRI Mwaka wa 1977, Dak. Damadian alikamilisha ujenzi wa mdaki wa MRI wa mwili wote ambao aliuita “kisicho epukika”.

src: Humans are by far the most talented species in reading the minds of others. That means we are able to successfully predict what other humans perceive, intend, believe, know or desire. Among these abilities, understanding the intention of others is crucial. It allows us to resolve possible ambiguities of physical actions. For example, if you were to see someone breaking a car window, you would probably assume he was trying to steal a stranger’s car. He would need to be judged differently if he had lost his car keys and it was his own car that he was trying to break into.
mt: Kwa kawaida, binadamu ni wale wanao uwezo mkubwa zaidi wa kusoma moyo ya wengine. Hivyo, inasababisha kuwa tunaweza kusambaza kwa ufanisi kuhusu yale ambayo wengine wanavyoona, wanavyojaribu, wanavyoamini, wanajua au wanavyodharau. Kati ya uwezo huu, kuelewa nia ya wengine ni muhimu. Inaweza kutupa ufumbuzi wa uhalisia wa majazaa ya kazi za kibinafsi. Kwa mfano, kama unakuta mtu akifuta vitu vya kawaida vya gari, unaweza kuelewa kwamba anataka kuuza gari la mtu mwingine. Anaweza kutambuliwa tofauti kama anataka kufuta gari lake linalokwenda kwa sababu anajua anafichwa.
ref: Kwa umbali wanadamu ndio spishi yenye talanta zaidi katika kusoma akili za wengine. Hilo linamaanisha tunaweza kutabiri kile binadamu wengine wanachohisi, kukusudia, kuamini, kujua au kutamani kwa ufanisi. Katika uwezo huu, kuelewa nia ya wengine ni muhimu. Huturuhusu kutatua uwezekano wa utata katika vitendo halisi vya kimwili. Kwa mfano, ikiwa ungeona mtu akivunja dirisha la gari, labda ungedhani alikuwa anajaribu kuiba gari la mtu usiyemjua. Angehitaji kuhukumiwa tofauti ikiwa angepoteza funguo za gari lake na lilikuwa gari lake mwenyewe ambalo alikuwa akijaribu.

src: Humans are by far the most talented species in reading the minds of others. That means we are able to successfully predict what other humans perceive, intend, believe, know or desire. Among these abilities, understanding the intention of others is crucial. It allows us to resolve possible ambiguities of physical actions. For example, if you were to see someone breaking a car window, you would probably assume he was trying to steal a stranger’s car. He would need to be judged differently if he had lost his car keys and it was his own car that he was trying to break into.

src: Although AI has a strong connotation of science fiction, AI forms a very important branch of computer science, dealing with behavior, learning and intelligent adaptation in a machine. Research in AI involves making machines to automate tasks that require intelligent behavior. Examples include control, planning and scheduling, the ability to answer customer diagnoses and questions, as well as handwriting recognition, voice and face. Such things have become separate disciplines, which focus on providing solutions to real life problems. The AI ​​system is now often used in the fields of economics, medicine, engineering and the military, as has been built in several home computer and video game software applications.
mt: AI inaonyesha kwa kawaida kama utamaduni wa fasihi, AI inaunganishwa na sehemu muhimu ya sayansi ya kompyuta, inayohusu utendaji, kujifunza na ujumbe wa kujitolea katika mashine. Uchunguzi wa AI unahusu kufanya mashine kwa ajili ya kutatua maswala ambayo zinahitaji utendaji wa kibinafsi. Mifano ni uendeshaji, mipango na mchakato, uwezo wa kutoa majibu kwa maswali ya wateja na kujibu maswali, pamoja na kujifunza kwa kuchapisha, sauti na mwelekeo. Kama vile kuna sehemu zinazotenganishwa, ambazo zinafanya kazi kwa ajili ya kutatua maswala ya maisha ya asili. Mifumo ya AI sasa mara nyingi yanatumika katika sehemu za uchumi, dharura, dharura, mawasiliano na kijeshi, kama ilivyotengenezwa katika sehemu nyingi za kompyuta na programu za video.
ref: Ingawa Akili Bandia inahusishwa sana na tungo za kisayansi, Akili Bandia huunda sehemu muhimu sana ya tawi la sayansi ya kompyuta, kushughulikia tabia, mafunzo na marekebisho ya akili kwa mashine. Utafiti katika Al unajumuisha kutengeneza mashine za kufanya kazi zinazohitaji tabia za busara kuwa otomatiki. Mfano ni pamoja na kudhibiti, kupanga na kuratibu, uwezo wa kujibu utambuzi na maswali ya wateja, pamoja na utambuzi wa maandishi, sauti na uso. Mambo kama hayo yamekuwa taaluma tofauti, zinazotazamia kutoa suluhu kwa shida za maisha. Mfumo wa AI sasa hutumiwa mara nyingi katika nyanja za uchumi, dawa, uhandisi na jeshi, kama ulivyojengwa katika programu kadhaa za kompyuta za nyumbani na michezo ya video.

src: Convergent thinking patterns are problem solving techniques that unite different ideas or fields to find a solution. The focus of this mindset is speed, logic and accuracy, also identification of facts, reapplying existing techniques, gathering information. The most important factor of this mindset is: there is only one correct answer. You only think of two answers, namely right or wrong. This type of thinking is associated with certain science or standard procedures. People with this type of thinking have logical thinking, are able to memorize patterns, solve problems and work on scientific tests.
mt: Mifumo ya kujieleza ya kushikamana ni njia za kujibu maswali ambazo zinazungana mifano tofauti au sehemu mbalimbali ili kupata majibu. Mifumo ya kujieleza hii yamejumuisha kasi, logikia na usahihi pamoja na kujifunza mifano, kujadili mifano, kupata habari. Mifumo hii ni muhimu zaidi: kuna majibu moja tu. Unajua majibu mawili tu, yale ya kuu na yale ya kubwa. Mifumo hii inasambazwa na mifano fulani au taratibu za kawaida. Wanaojieleza kwa mifumo hii wana mifumo ya kujieleza, wana uwezo wa kuandika mifano, wana uwezo wa kujibu maswali na kufanya uchunguzi wa kisayansi.
ref: Mifumo inayobadilika ya fikira ni mbinu za utatuzi wa shida ambazo zinaunganisha maoni au nyanja tofauti ili kupata suluhisho. Angazio la mtazamo huu ni kasi, mantiki na usahihi, pia utambuzi wa ukweli, kutumia tena mbinu zilizopo, kukusanya taarifa. Kipengele muhimu zaidi cha mtazamo huu ni: kuna jibu moja tu sahihi. Unafikiria majibu mawili tu, yaani sahihi au kosa. Aina hii ya fikira inahusishwa na taratibu fulani za kisayansi au kawaida. Watu wenye aina hii ya kufikiria wana mawazo ya kimantiki, wanaweza kukariri miundo, kutatua shida na kufanya majaribio ya kisayansi.

src: The use of video recording has led to important discoveries in the interpretation of micro-expressions, facial movements which last a few milliseconds. In particular, it is claimed that one can detect whether a person is lying by interpreting micro-expressions correctly. Oliver Sacks, in his paper The President's Speech, indicated how people who are unable to understand speech because of brain damage are nevertheless able to assess sincerity accurately. He even suggests that such abilities in interpreting human behavior may be shared by animals such as domestic dogs.
mt: Kuandika video imeleta utambuzi muhimu katika tafsiri ya micro-expressions, harakati za wanyama wanaozunguka ambazo zinakwenda kwa takribani milisadili. Hasa, inasemekana kwamba unaweza kutambua kama mtu anasema ukweli kwa kutafsiri micro-expressions kwa njia ya kutosha. Oliver Sacks, katika makala yake The President's Speech, alielezea jinsi watu ambao hawawezi kuelewa maneno kwa sababu ya afya ya akili wanaoathirika wanaoweza kuelewa kwa kutosha kwa kuelewa kwa kutosha. Anasema kwamba uwezo huu wa kutambua tabia za binadamu inaweza kushirikiana na wanyama kama vile wanyama wadogo.
ref: Matumizi ya video za kurekodi imesababisha uvumbuzi muhimu katika tafsiri ya sauti ndogo, kusongeshwa kwa uso ambao hudumu sekunde ndogo kadhaa. Hususan, inadaiwa kuwa mtu anaweza kutambua ikiwa mtu anadanganya kwa kufasiri ishara ndogondogo kwa njia sahihi. Oliver Sacks, katika gazeti lake Hotuba ya Rais, alionyesha namna watu ambao hawawezi kuelewa hotuba kutokana na uharibifu wa ubongo hata hivyo wana uwezo kwa kutathmini ukweli kwa usahihi. Hata anapendekeza kwamba uwezo kama huo wa kufasiri tabia za binadamu unaweza kushirikishwa wanyama kama vile mbwa wa kufugwa.

src: As the ability to obtain knowledge and to learn changed in such a way as mentioned above the base rate at which knowledge was obtained changed. The approach to obtaining information was different. No longer did pressure reside within individual recall, but the ability to recall text became more of a focus. In essence, the Renaissance made a significant change in the approach to learning and the dissemination of knowledge.
mt: Kama uwezo wa kupata elimu na kupata elimu kuchanganywa kama ilivyotajwa juu ya kipimo hicho, kiwango cha kawaida cha kupata elimu kilichanganywa. Jitihada za kupata habari zilikuwa tofauti. Sasa hakuna haja ya kushika kwenye kumbukumbu ya kibinafsi, bali uwezo wa kumbukumbu ya kitabu ilikuwa zaidi ya kujitahidi. Kwa ufupi, Ureja ulifanya changamoto kubwa katika jitihada za kupata habari na kutolea habari.
ref: Jinsi uwezo wa kupata maarifa na kujifunza ulivyobadilika kwa njia kama ilivyoelezewa hapo juu, ndivyo kiwango msingi ambacho kwacho maarifa yalipatikana kilivyobadilika. Njia ya kupata habari ilikuwa tofauti. Shaka haikuwa tena ndani ya kumbukumbu ya mtu binafsi, lakini uwezo wa kukumbuka maandishi ukawa wa kuzingatiwa zaidi. Kimsingi, Kipindi cha Mwamko kilifanya mabadiliko muhimu katika mbinu za kujifunza na usambazaji wa maarifa.

src: The Internet combines elements of both mass and interpersonal communication. The distinct characteristics of the Internet lead to additional dimensions in terms of the uses and gratifications approach. For example, “learning” and “socialization” are suggested as important motivations for Internet use (James et al., 1995). “Personal involvement” and “continuing relationships” were also identified as new motivation aspects by Eighmey and McCord (1998) when they investigated audience reactions to websites.
mt: Internet inaunganisha vipande vya kujadili na kujadiliana. Mabadiliko ya kawaida ya Internet yanasababisha vipengele vingine katika mazingira ya mawazo ya kujitolea na kujifurahisha. Kwa mfano, “elimu” na “ujifunzaji” wanasababisha kujitolea na kujifurahisha kwa kutumia Internet (James et al., 1995). “Ujuzi wa kibinafsi” na “ujifunzaji wa kibinafsi” wanasababisha vipengele vingine vya kujitolea na kujifurahisha wakati wa kufanya uchunguzi wa mawazo ya kujitolea na kujifurahisha kwa kutumia mitandao ya kijamii (Eighmey na McCord, 1998) wakati wa kufanya uchunguzi wa mawazo ya kujitolea na kujifurahisha kwa kutumia mitandao ya kijamii.
ref: "Mtandao unachanganya vitu vya mawasiliano ya kundi la watu na ya kati ya mtu na mtu. Tabia za kipekee za mtandao hupelekea vipimo zaidi kuhusu matumizi na mbinu za kuridhisha. Kwa mfano, ""kujifunza"" na ""ushirikiano"" kunapendekezwa kama vichochezi muhimu kwa matumizi ya mtandao (James na wengine, 1995). Kushiriki kwa kibinafsi na ""mahusiano endelezi"" pia yalitambuliwa na Eighmey na McCord (1998) kama vipengele vipya vya motisha walipichunguza mjibizo wa hadhira katika tovuti."

src: Gothic style peaked in the period between the 10th - 11th centuries and the 14th century. At the beginning dress was heavily influenced by the Byzantine culture in the east. However, due to the slow communication channels, styles in the west could lag behind by 25 to 30 year. towards the end of the Middle Ages western Europe began to develop their own style. one of the biggest developments of the time as a result of the crusades people began to use buttons to fasten clothing.

ref: Staili ya Kigothi ilifikia kilele katika kipindi kati ya karne za 10-11 na karne ya 14. Hapo mwanzoni mavazi yaliathiriwa na tamaduni za Baizantini kutoka mashariki. Hata hivyo, kwa sababu ya njia hafifu za mawasiliano, mitindo ya magharibi ilibakia nyuma kwa miaka 25 hadi 30. Kuelekea mwishoni mwa Zama za Kati Uropa magharibi ilianza kuendeleza staili yao wenyewe. Mojawapo ya maendeleo makubwa zaidi ya wakati huo kama matokeo ya krusedi watu walianza kutumia vifungo kukazia nguo.

src: Gothic style peaked in the period between the 10th - 11th centuries and the 14th century. At the beginning dress was heavily influenced by the Byzantine culture in the east. However, due to the slow communication channels, styles in the west could lag behind by 25 to 30 year. towards the end of the Middle Ages western Europe began to develop their own style. one of the biggest developments of the time as a result of the crusades people began to use buttons to fasten clothing.

ref: Staili ya Kigothi ilifikia kilele katika kipindi kati ya karne za 10-11 na karne ya 14. Hapo mwanzoni mavazi yaliathiriwa na tamaduni za Baizantini kutoka mashariki. Hata hivyo, kwa sababu ya njia hafifu za mawasiliano, mitindo ya magharibi ilibakia nyuma kwa miaka 25 hadi 30. Kuelekea mwishoni mwa Zama za Kati Uropa magharibi ilianza kuendeleza staili yao wenyewe. Mojawapo ya maendeleo makubwa zaidi ya wakati huo kama matokeo ya krusedi watu walianza kutumia vifungo kukazia nguo.

src: We can start living more friendly to the environment, we can join to the environmental movement, and we can even be activists in order to reduce the future suffering in some degree. This is just like symptomatic treatment in many cases. However, if we do not only want a temporary solution, then we should find the root of the problems, and we should deactivate them. It is obvious enough that the world has changed much because of humankind's scientific and technological advancements, and problems have become greater because of overpopulation and mankind's extravagant lifestyle.
mt: Kuweza kuanza kuishi kwa mwenendo ambao ni rahisi kwa mazingira, kujiunga na harakati ya mazingira, na kufanya kazi kama mwanaharakati ili kudhibiti maishara ya kujitakasa katika daraja moja. Hii ni kama dawa ya kujitambua katika mambo mengi. Lakini kama tunataka mabadiliko ya kudumu, basi tunapaswa kufikiria kwa nini mambo hayo yamekuwepo, na tunapaswa kufuta chanzo chao. Inafaa kufikiri kama dunia imebadilika kwa wingi kwa sababu ya mabadiliko ya sayansi na teknolojia, na mambo mengi yamekuwa kubwa zaidi kwa sababu ya ukarabati na mwenendo wa kujitakasa.
ref: Tunaweza kuanza kuishi kama marafiki wazuri wa mazingira, tunaweza kujiunga na harakati za mazingira, na hata pia tunaweza kuwa wanaharakati ili kupunguza dhiki ya baadaye kwa kiwango fulani. Hii ni sawa na matibabu ya dalili katika hali nyingi. Hata hivyo, ikiwa hatutaki tu suluhisho la muda mfupi, basi tunastahili kupata shina la matatizo, nasi tupate kuizima. Ni wazi kabisa kuwa ulimwengu umebadilika sana kwa sababu ya maendeleo ya kibinadamu katika sayansi na teknolojia, nayo matatizo yameongezeka kwa sababu ya watu kuwa wengi kupita kiasi na mitindo ya ubadhirifu ya maisha ya wanadamu.

src: The balance of power was a system in which European nations sought to maintain the national sovereignty of all European states. The concept was that all European nations had to seek to prevent one nation from becoming powerful, and thus national governments often changed their alliances in order to maintain the balance. The War of Spanish Succession marked the first war whose central issue was the balance of power. This marked an important change, as European powers would no longer have the pretext of being religious wars. Thus, the Thirty Years' War would be the last war to be labeled a religious war.

src: During this period of European history, the Catholic Church, which had become rich and powerful, came under scrutiny. For over a thousand years the Christian religion had bound European states together despite differences in language and customs. I Its all-pervading power affected everyone from king to commoner. One of the main Christian tenets is that wealth should be used to alleviate suffering and poverty and that the monetary funds of the church are there specifically for that reason. The central authority of the church had been in Rome for over a thousand years and this concentration of power and money led many to question whether this tenet was being met.
mt: Katika muda huu wa historia ya Ulaya, Kanisa la Kikatoliki, ambalo lilikuwa na nguvu na utajiri, lilikuwa na mchakato. Kwa zaidi ya miaka elfu moja, dini ya Kikristo ilibindisha nchi za Ulaya bila kujali tofauti za lugha na desturi. Utawala wake uliowakilisha uliathiri kila mtu kutoka mfalme hadi mmoja wa wanyonge. Mojawapo ya mifano muhimu ya dini ya Kikristo ni kwamba utajiri unatumika kwa ajili ya kupunguza uchovu na ugonjwa na kwamba mapato ya kisheria ya kanisa yanayotumika kwa ajili hiyo. Utawala wa kikanda cha kanisa lilikuwa katika mji wa Roma kwa zaidi ya miaka elfu na hii uliathiriwa na nguvu na utajiri, kwa hivyo wengi wakati huo wakasema kama tena utajiri huu unatumika kwa ajili hiyo.
ref: Katika kipindi hiki cha historia ya Ulaya, Kanisa Katoliki, ambalo lilikuwa tajiri na lenye nguvu, likawa chini ya uchunguzi. kwa zaidi ya miaka elfu moja dini ya Kikristo imefunga majimbo ya Uropa pamoja licha ya kuwa na lugha na mila tofauti. I Nguvu zake zilizoenea kote ziliathiri wote toka mfalme hadi mtu wa kawaida. Mojawapo ya kanuni kuu za Kikristo ni kwamba mali inafaa kutumika kupunguza mateso na umasikini na kwamba hazina za kifedha za kanisa ziko hapo hususan kwa sababu hiyo. Mamlaka kuu ya kanisa yalikuwa katika Roma kwa zaidi ya miaka elfu na uwepo huu wa mamlaka na pesa katika sehemu moja ulipelekea wengi kuuuliza kama itikadi hii ilikuwa ikitekelezwa.

src: The terrified King Louis XVI, Queen Marie Antoinette their two young children (11 year old Marie Therese and four year old Louis-Charles) and the King's sister, Madam Elizabeth, on the 6th October 1789 were forced back to Paris from Versailles by a mob of market women. In a carriage, they traveled back to Paris surrounded by a mob of people screaming and shouting threats against the King and Queen. The mob of people forced the King And Queen to have their carriage windows wide open. At one point a member of the mob waved the head of a royal guard killed at Versailles in front of the terrified Queen.
mt: Kabla ya kuondoka, Mfalme Louis XVI, Mwanamke Mfalme Marie Antoinette, wana wawili (11 mwaka Marie Therese na Louis-Charles wa miaka kumi) na dada yake Mfalme Elizabeth, tarehe 6 Oktoba 1789 walipigwa kwa jamaa wakati wa kuondoka kutoka Versailles hadi Paris na jamaa wakubwa wa biashara. ref: Mfalme Louis XVI, Malkia Marie Antoinette, watoto wao wawili wadogo (Marie Therese mwenye umri wa miaka 11 na Louis Charles mwenye umri wa miaka minne) na dada ya mfalme Bibi Elizabeth waliojawa na hofu, mnamo Oktoba 6 1789 walilazimishwa kurudi Paris kutoka Versailles na umati wa wanawake wa sokoni. Katika gari la kukokotwa, walisafiri kuelekea Paris wakiwa wamezungukwa na umati wa watu waliopiga nduru na kutoa vitisho kwa Mfalme na Malkia kwa sauti kubwa. Umati wa watu uliwalazimisha Mfalme Na Malkia kufungua madirisha ya gari lao. Kwa wakati mmoja memba wa umati alipunga kichwa cha mlinzi mmoja wa kifalme aliyeuawa katika Versailles mbele ya Malkia aliyejawa na hofu.

src: Soon after the outbreak of hostilities, Britain initiated a naval blockade of Germany. The strategy proved effective, cutting off vital military and civilian supplies, although this blockade violated generally accepted international law codified by several international agreements of the past two centuries. Britain mined international waters to prevent any ships from entering entire sections of ocean, causing danger to even neutral ships. Since there was limited response to this tactic, Germany expected a similar response to its unrestricted submarine warfare.
mt: Baada ya kuanza kwa vita, Uingereza lilianza kuwakamua bahari ya Ujerumani. Strategia hiyo ilikuwa inafaa, kutupia ushahidi wa kifedha na wa kijamii, ingawa hii ilivyovamia sheria za kimataifa zilizotolewa na makubaliano ya miaka mitano iliyopita. Uingereza lilivamia maji ya kimataifa kwa kuzimua, kwa hiyo kushindisha ushahidi wa kifedha na wa kijamii, ingawa hii ilivyovamia sheria za kimataifa zilizotolewa na makubaliano ya miaka mitano iliyopita. Mkakati ulikuwa na ufanisi, kukatisha vifaa muhimu vya kijeshi na kiraia, ingawa kizuizi hiki kilikiuka sheria ya kimataifa ambayo inakubaliwa kwa jumla iliyoratibiwa na mikataba kadhaa ya kimataifa katika karne mbili zilizopita. Uingereza ilitega mabomu kwenye maji ya kimataifa ili kuzuia meli zozote kuingia sehemu nzima za bahari, hivyo kuweka hatari hata kwa meli zisizoegemea upande wowote. Kwa kuwa kulikuwa na mwitikio mdogo kwa mbinu hii, Ujerumani ilitarajia majibu kama hayo kwa vita vyake ambavyo havijazuiliwa vya chini ya bahari.

src: Across the United States of America, there are approximately 400,000 known cases of Multiple Sclerosis (MS), leaving it as the leading neurological disease in younger and middle aged adults. MS is a disease that affects the central nervous system, which is made up of the brain, the spinal cord and the optic nerve. Research has found that females are two times more likely to have MS then males.
mt: Katika Marekani kuna takribani 400,000 kesi za kawaida za saratani ya kawaida (MS), kwa hivyo kufanya kama saratani inayosababisha ugonjwa wa utambuzi kwenye wale wanaoishi katika miaka ya chini na ya kati. MS ni ugonjwa unaosababisha utambuzi wa mfumo wa utambuzi, ambao unaangaliwa kwa kujumuisha akili, mfumo wa utambuzi na mfumo wa utambuzi. Uchunguzi umefanya kuona kwamba wanawake wana uwezo wa kufanya kesi za MS zaidi kuliko wanaume.
ref: Katika Amerika yote, kuna takribani kesi 400,000 zinazojulikana za Sklerosisi ya Sehemu Nyingi (MS), na kuuwacha kuwa ugonjwa wa neva unaoongoza katika vijana na watu wazima wenye umri wa kati. Selerosisiwingi ni ugonjwa unaoathiri mfumo mkuu wa neva, ambao unajumuisha ubongo, uti wa mgongo na neva ya macho. Utafiti umebainisha kuwa wanawake wana uwezekano maradufu wa kuugua selerosisiwingi kuliko wanaume.

src: The study found that depression, fear and catastrophising mediated the relationship between pain and disability in lower back pain sufferers. Only the effects of catastrophizing, not depression and fear was conditional of regular weekly structured PA sessions. Those participating in regular activity required more support in terms of negative perception of pain distinguishing the differences of chronic pain and discomfort feel from normal physical movement.
mt: Utafiti ulionyesha kwamba uchovu, ukafiri na kujitambua kama mabaya yalivuta mwonekano kati ya uchovu na uhaba katika wale wanaoathirika na uchovu wa mdomo. Jumuiya tu ya kujitambua kama mabaya, bila uchovu na ukafiri, ilivuta tofauti za uchovu na uhaba na ujambazi wa kawaida wa haraka ya kichwani.
ref: Utafiti ulionyesha kwamba mafadhaiko, uoga na kutia janga chumvi kulipatanisha uhusiano kati ya uchungu na ulemavu kwa walio na maumivu ya sehemu ya chini ya mgongo. Ni athari tu za kutia janga chumvi, si mafadhaiko na uoga, zilizokuwa na masharti ya vipindi vya PA vya mara kwa mara kila wiki. Walioshiriki katika shughuli za mara kwa mara walihitaji usaidizi zaidi kubainisha tofauti za uchungu sugu na hisia za usumbufu kutokana na msogeo wa kawaida wa kimwili, kuhusiana na mtazamo hasi wa uchungu.

src: The modern sport of fencing is played at many levels, from students learning at a university to professional and Olympic competition. The sport is primarily played in a duel format, one fencer dueling another.

src: Internal poisoning may not be immediately apparent. Symptoms, such as vomiting are sufficiently general that an immediate diagnosis cannot be made. The best indication of internal poisoning may be the presence of an open container of medication or toxic household chemicals. Check the label for specific first aid instructions for that specific poison.
mt: Ugonjwa wa ndani unaotokana na dawa au madhara ya nyumbani hauonekani kwa mara ya kwanza. Maambukizi, kama vile kupindua, ni sawa kwa kiasi fulani na hivyo hakuna haja ya kufanya utambuzi. Ukweli wa ugonjwa wa ndani unaotokana na dawa au madhara ya nyumbani unaonekana kwa kutambua kifaa cha dawa au madhara ya nyumbani. ref: Sumu ya ndani inaweza kukosa kuwa dhahiri papo hapo. Dalili, kama vile kutapika ni jumla kiasi kwamba utambuzi wa mara moja hauwezi kufanywa. Dalili bora ya sumu ya ndani inaweza kuwa kuwepo kwa chombo wazi cha dawa ama kemikali za kaya zenye sumu. Angalia lebo kwa maagizo maalum ya huduma ya kwanza ya sumu hiyo.

src: To Check the victim, you must first survey the scene to ensure your safety. You need to notice the victim's position as you approach him or her and any automatic red flags. If you get hurt trying to help, you may only serve to make matters worse.
mt: Kuona mgonjwa, lazima uangalie kwanza mazingira ili uweze kuwa salama. Lazima uangalie nafasi ya mgonjwa wakati wa kuendesha na yeye na yoyote kama bendera za kijivu. Kama unapata kujeruhi wakati wa kuendesha, unaweza kuwa na mafanikio wengi.
ref: Ili Kumwangalia mwathirika, ni lazima kwanza uchunguze eneo ili kuhakikisha usalama wako. Unahitaji kugundua nafasi ya mwathiriwa unapoenda kumkaribia na kiashiria vyovyote vya kawaida vya hatari. Ikiwa utaumia ukijaribu kusaidia, huenda utafanya mambo kuwa mabaya zaidi tu.

src: There are a lot of social and political effects such as the use of metric system, a shift from absolutism to republicanism, nationalism and the belief the country belongs to the people not to one sole ruler. Also after the Revolution occupations were open to all male applicants allowing the most ambitious and successful to succeed. Same goes for the military because instead of army rankings being based on class they were now based on cailaber. The French Revolution also inspired many other repressed working class people of other country's to began their own revolutions.
mt: Kuna mengi ya athari kijamii na kipolitiki kama vile kutumia sistem ya mita, kujitenga kutoka kwa utawala wa kibinafsi hadi utawala wa kijamaa, utamaduni na imani kwamba nchi inaendeshwa na watu wote, si mmoja tu. Pia baada ya mapinduzi wakati wa kujitegemea waliweza kufanya kazi za kijeshi kwa wale wote wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa wanaoomba kwa w
ref: Kuna athari nyingi za kijamii na kisiasa kama vile utumiaji wa mfumo wa metriki, mabadiliko kutoka kwa msimamo wa udikteta hadi ujamhuri, utaifa na imani kuwa inchi ni ya watu si ya mtawala mmoja pekee. Pia baada ya Mapinduzi kazi ilikuwa wazi kwa waombaji wote wa kiume, hivyo kuruhusu waliojitakia makuu na wenye mafanikio kufaulu. Vilevile kwa wanajeshi kwa sababu badala ya madaraka ya kijeshi kutegemea darasa sasa yanategemea sifa. Mapinduzi ya Kifaransa pia yalichochea wafanyakazi wengine wengi wa nchi nyingine waliokandamizwa kuanza mapinduzi yao wenyewe.

src: Everyone participates in society and uses transportation systems. Almost everyone complains about transportation systems. In developed countries you seldom hear similar levels of complaints about water quality or bridges falling down. Why do transportation systems engender such complaints, why do they fail on a daily basis? Are transportation engineers just incompetent? Or is something more fundamental going on?
mt: Kila mtu anafanya jamii na kutumia mitandao ya usafirishaji. Kila mtu anasema kuhusu mitandao ya usafirishaji. Katika nchi za kujitayarishaji sio kawaida kuchukua ushahidi kama vile kuhusu maji ya kutosha au jengo la kufa. Kwa nini mitandao ya usafirishaji hujengana kwa mashaka, kwa nini hujengwa kwa kawaida? Katika nchi zilizostawi ni nadra kusikia viwango sawa vya malalamiko kuhusu ubora wa maji au uporomokaji wa madaraja. src: Traffic Flow is the study of the movement of individual drivers and vehicles between two points and the interactions they make with one another. Unfortunately, studying traffic flow is difficult because driver behavior cannot be predicted with one-hundred percent certainty. Fortunately, drivers tend to behave within a reasonably consistent range; thus, traffic streams tend to have some reasonable consistency and can be roughly represented mathematically. To better represent traffic flow, relationships have been established between the three main characteristics: (1) flow, (2) density, and (3) velocity. These relationships help in planning, design, and operations of roadway facilities.
mt: Utafiti wa Mipango ya Mawingu ni ufundishaji wa harakati za walinzi na vyombo vya ndege kati ya nje na ndani ya mawingu na mawasilisho yao. Kwa sababu walinzi na vyombo vya ndege hawawezi kufundishwa kwa kujua kwa kipimo cha kutosha, ufundishaji wa mawingu unaweza kuwa na uhalisho. Lakini walinzi na vyombo vya ndege wana uhalisho wa kawaida, hivyo mawingu yao yamekuwa na uhalisho wa kawaida na hivyo yamekuwa na uhalisho wa kawaida na hivyo yamekuwa na uhalisho wa kawaida na hivyo yamekuwa na uhalisho wa kawaida na hivyo yamekuwa na uhalisho wa kawaida na hivyo yamekuwa na uhalisho wa kawaida na hivyo yamekuwa na uhalisho wa kawaida na hivyo yamekuwa na uhalisho wa kawaida na hivyo yamekuwa na uhalisho wa kawaida na hivyo yamekuwa na uhalisho wa kawaida na hivyo yamekuwa na uhalisho wa kawaida na hivyo yamekuwa na uhalisho wa kawaida na hivyo yamekuwa na uhalisho wa kawaida na hivyo yamekuwa na uhalisho wa kawaida na hivyo yamekuwa na uhalisho wa kawaida na hivyo yamekuwa na uhalisho wa kawaida na hivyo yamekuwa na uhalisho wa kawaida na hivyo yamekuwa na uhalisho wa kawaida na hivyo yamekuwa na uhalisho wa kawaida na hivyo yamekuwa na uhalisho wa kawaida na hivyo yamekuwa na uhalisho wa kawaida na hivyo yamekuwa na uhalisho wa
ref: Mtiririko wa Trafiki ni utafiti wa mwondoko wa madereva binafsi na magari kati ya sehemu mbili na mwingiliano wanaofanya na wenzao. Kwa bahati mbaya, kutafiti mtiririko wa trafiki ni vigumu kwa sababu tabia ya dereva haiwezi kutabiriwa kwa uhakika wa asilimia mia moja. Kwa bahati, madereva huwa na mazoea kwa upatano fulani; kwa hivyo, misongamano ya trafiki huwa na uthabiti fulani na inaweza kuwakilishwa haswa kitakwimu. Ili kuwakilisha mtiririko wa trafiki vizuri, uhusiano umeanzishwa kati ya hali tatu kuu: (1) mtiririko, (2) uzito, (3) kasimwelekeo. Mahusiano haya husaidia katika upangaji, kubuni, na uendeshaji wa welekevu barabarani.

ref: Mtiririko wa Trafiki ni utafiti wa mwondoko wa madereva binafsi na magari kati ya sehemu mbili na mwingiliano wanaofanya na wenzao. Kwa bahati mbaya, kutafiti mtiririko wa trafiki ni vigumu kwa sababu tabia ya dereva haiwezi kutabiriwa kwa uhakika wa asilimia mia moja. Kwa bahati, madereva huwa na mazoea kwa upatano fulani; kwa hivyo, misongamano ya trafiki huwa na uthabiti fulani na inaweza kuwakilishwa haswa kitakwimu. Ili kuwakilisha mtiririko wa trafiki vizuri, uhusiano umeanzishwa kati ya hali tatu kuu: (1) mtiririko, (2) uzito, (3) kasimwelekeo. Mahusiano haya husaidia katika upangaji, kubuni, na uendeshaji wa welekevu barabarani.

src: The Hershey and Chase experiment was one of the leading suggestions that DNA was a genetic material. Hershey and Chase used phages, or viruses, to implant their own DNA into a bacterium. They did two experiments marking either the DNA in the phage with a radioactive phosphorus or the protein of the phage with radioactive sulfur.
mt: Kutoka kwa Hershey na Chase ilikuwa moja ya mifano ya kwanza kuonyesha kwamba DNA ni mchanganyiko geneti. Hershey na Chase walifanya makubaliano ya kuchapisha DNA ya phage, au virusi, katika bakteria. Waliweka mifano mawili ya kuchapisha DNA ya phage na mionzi wa radia ya fosfori au mionzi wa radia ya sulfuri.
ref: Jaribio la Hershey na Chase lilikuwa mojawapo ya mapendekezo kwamba DNA ilikuwa nyenzo za nasaba. Hershey na Chase walitumia virusi kuchomeka DNA yao wenyewe ndani ya bakteria. Walifanya majaribio mawili kuashiria DNA kwenye virusi kwa fosforasi nururifuau protini ya virusi kwa salfa nururishi.

src: Mutations can have a variety of different effects depending on the type of mutation, the significance of the piece of genetic material affected and whether the cells affected are germ-line cells. Only mutations in germ-line cells can be passed on to children, while mutations elsewhere can cause cell-death or cancer.

src: Goats seem to have been first domesticated roughly 10,000 years ago in the Zagros Mountains of Iran. Ancient cultures and tribes began to keep them for easy access to milk, hair, meat, and skins. Domestic goats were generally kept in herds that wandered on hills or other grazing areas, often tended by goatherds who were frequently children or adolescents, similar to the more widely known shepherd. These methods of herding are still used today.
mt: Kwenda kwa wanyama wanaoendesha kuku, kuku wanaoendesha hupendelekeka kwa kawaida kwa kipindi cha takribani miaka 10,000 kwa kipindi cha takribani miaka 10,000 katika milima ya Zagros ya Iran. Kitaifa na kabila kuanzia sasa kuku wanaoendesha wanaendesha kwa kufikia maziwa, mawindo, nyama na nyama. ref: Yaelekea mbuzi walianza kufugwa takriban miaka 10,000 iliyopita katika Milima ya Zagrosi ya Irani. Tamaduni na makabila ya kale yalianza kuwafuga kwa ufikiaji rahisi wa maziwa, nywele, nyama, na ngozi. Kijumla, mbuzi wa nyumbani walianza kufugwa kwa makundi yaliyotangatanga milimani au maeneo mengine ya malisho, huku yakisimamiwa na walinzi ambao mara nyingi walikuwa watoto au vijana wachanga, sawia na wachungaji wanaofahamika sana. Mbinu hizi za ufugaji bado zinatumika hata leo.

src: Golf is a game in which players use clubs to hit balls into holes. Eighteen holes are played during a regular round, with players usually starting on the first hole on the course and finishing on the eighteenth. The player who takes the fewest strokes, or swings of the club, to complete the course wins. The game is played on grass, and the grass around the hole is mown shorter and called the green.
mt: Golf ni mchezo ambako wachezaji wanatumia klabu za kufuta kufuta mabola kwenye hole. Kila wachezaji anatumia klabu kumi na tatu kwa kufuta mabola kwenye hole kumi na mbili. Wachezaji hupanga kwanza kwenye hole ya kwanza na kufunga kwenye hole ya kumi na mbili. Wachezaji wanaotumia klabu chache zaidi kufuta mabola kwenye hole kumi na mbili hupata fahari. Mchezo huu unatumika kwenye mchakacho, na mchakacho kwenye hole unatumika kwenye mchakacho.
ref: Gofu ni mchezo ambao wachezaji hutumia rungu kuingiza mipira mashimoni. Mashimo kumi na manane huchezwa wakati wa duru ya kawaida, na wachezaji kawaida huanzia shimo la kwanza kwenye uwanja na kumalizia kwenye shimo la kumi na nane. Mchezaji ambaye hufanya mipigo michache zaidi, au mizunguko ya rungu, kukamilisha mkondo hushinda. Mchezo huo huchezwa kwenye nyasi, na nyasi zilizo karibu na shimo hukatwa ziwe fupi na huitwa kijani kibichi.

src: Science’s main goal is to figure out the way the world works through the scientific method. This method in fact guides most scientific research. It isn’t alone though, experimentation, and an experiment is a test that is used to eliminate one or more of the possible hypotheses, asking questions, and making observations also guide scientific research.
mt: Uhusiano wa sayansi ni kufikiria jinsi dunia inavyofanya kazi kwa njia ya methali ya sayansi. Methali hii kwa hakika inamwimbiwa kwa kila utafiti wa sayansi. Hata hivyo, utafiti, na utafiti ni kifanyia kazi, na kifanyia kazi ni kifanyia kazi ambacho ni kifanyia kazi ambacho kinaweza kufuta moja au zaidi ya hifadhi za wazi, kuuliza swali, na kufanya uchunguzi pia wanaangalia utafiti wa sayansi.
ref: Lengo kuu la Sayansi ni kubaini njia ambayo ulimwengu utaendeshwa kwa mbinu za kisayansi. Kwa kweli, mbinu hii huongoza tafiti nyingi za kisayansi. Haiko peke yake hata hivyo, majaribio, na jaribio ni upimaji ambao hutumiwa kuondoa nadharia moja au mbili zinazowezekana, kuuliza maswali, na kufanya uchunguzi pia huongoza utafiti wa kisayansi.

src: Tornadoes strike a small area compared to other violent storms, but they can destroy everything in their path. Tornadoes uproot trees, rip boards from buildings, and fling cars up into the sky. The most violent two percent of tornadoes last more than three hours. These monster storms have winds up to 480 km/h (133 m/s; 300 mph).
mt: Kutoka kwa kipindi cha muda, tornado zinazitupa kwa kiasi kidogo kuliko mabavu mengine, lakini zinaweza kuchimba kila kitu katika njia yao. Tornado zinazitupa miti, kuzimia mabati ya nyumba, na kuzimia gari. Tornado za kibaya zaidi zinazitupa kwa kiasi kidogo zinazitupa kwa muda zaidi ya saa tatu. Mabavu haya ya kibaya zinazitupa angani kati ya 480 km/h (133 m/s; 300 mph).
ref: Vimbunga hupiga sehemu ndogo ikilinganishwa na dhoruba zingine kali, lakini vinaweza kuharibu kila kitu kilichopo njiani mwao. Tufani hung’oa miti, kupasua mbao kutoka kwa majengo, na kurusha magari juu angani. Asilimia mbili ya tufani zenye vurugu zaidi hudumu kwa zaidi ya saa tatu. Dhoruba hizi za ajabu zina upepo wa hadi kilomita 480 kwa saa (mita 133 kwa sekunde; maili 300 kwa saa).

src: Humans have been making and using lenses for magnification for thousands and thousands of years. However, the first true telescopes were made in Europe in the late 16th century. These telescopes used a combination of two lenses to make distant objects appear both nearer and larger.

src: Muhammad was deeply interested in matters beyond this mundane life. He used to frequent a cave that became known as “Hira‘” on the Mountain of “Noor” (light) for contemplation. he cave itself, which survived the times, gives a very vivid image of Muhammad’s spiritual inclinations. Resting on the top of one of the mountains north of Mecca, the cave is completely isolated from the rest of the world. In fact, it is not easy to find at all even if one knew it existed. Once inside the cave, it is a total isolation. Nothing can be seen other than the clear, beautiful sky above and the many surrounding mountains. Very little of this world can be seen or heard from inside the cave.
mt: Muhammad alikuwa na umoja mkubwa kuhusu mambo yaliyobeba kwa nafasi ya maisha ya kawaida. Alitumia kila siku kwenye kisiwa kilichokaa juu ya mlima wa Noor (mawingu) kwa ajili ya kujifunza. Kisiwa hicho kilikuwa na jina la Hira‘. Kisiwa hicho, kilichobaki hadi sasa, linatoa picha ya kutosha kuhusu umoja wa dini wa Muhammad. Kwenye juu ya mlima mmoja kaskazini mwa Mecca, kisiwa hicho kimepangwa kwa kasi kutoka na dunia. Kama kwamba, si rahisi kujua kama kisiwa hicho kipo. Kama kwamba, kwenye ndani ya kisiwa hicho, hakuna kitu kinachotambuliwa kwa macho, bali mawingu tu. Hakuna kitu kinachotambuliwa kwa macho, bali mawingu tu. ref: "Muhammad alivutiwa sana na mambo zaidi ya maisha haya ya kawaida. Alikuwa akitembelea sana pango ambalo lilikuja kujulikana kama ""Hira"" katika mlima wa ""Noor"" (nuru) kwa kutafakari. Pango lenyewe, ambalo lilinusurika nyakati, hutoa picha dhahiri ya mielekeo ya kiroho ya Muhammad. Likiwa juu ya mojawapo ya milima kaskazini mwa Mecca, pango hilo limetengwa kabisa na ulimwengu. Kwa kweli, si rahisi kupata kamwe hata kama mtu alijua ipo. Ukishaingia kwenye pango, umetengwa kabisa. Hakuna kingine kinachoweza kuonekana ila anga safi na nzuri huko juu na milima mingi inayolizunguka. Ni machache sana ya dunia hii yanayoweza kuonwa au kusikiwa ndani ya pango hili."

src: Wagonways were built in England as early as the 16th Century. Although wagonways merely consisted of parallel planks of wood, they allowed horses pulling them to achieve greater speeds and pull larger loads than on the slightly more rough roads of the day. Crossties were introduced fairly early to hold the tracks in place. Gradually, however, it was realised that tracks would be more efficient if they had a stip of iron on the top. This became common practice, but the iron caused more wear on the wooden wheels of the wagons. Eventually, wooden wheels were replaced by iron wheels. In 1767, the first full-iron rails were introduced.
mt: Wagonways zilijengwa nchini Uingereza tangu karne ya 16. Wagonways zilikuwa na plakani za kivuli zilizopangwa kwa pamoja, zilizowasaidia ng’ombe waliopuliza wagonways kufika kwa kasi na kufika kwa kasi kuliko barabara za kawaida za siku hiyo. Kwa kipindi cha kawaida, kunaangazwa kwa kifaa cha kivuli cha kijivu kwenye kivuli, jambo ambalo lilikuwa kawaida. Kifaa hiki kilikuwa na athari kubwa kwenye vifaa vya kivuli vya kivuli. Kwa hatua, vifaa vya kivuli vya kivuli vilichukuliwa na vifaa vya kivuli vya kivuli. Mwaka 1767, vifaa vya kivuli vya kivuli vya kivuli vya kivuli vya kivuli vya kivuli vya kivuli vya kivuli vya kivuli vya kivuli vya kivuli vya kivuli vya kivuli vya kivuli vya kivuli vya kivuli vya kivuli vya kivuli vya kivuli vya kivuli vya kivuli vya kivuli vya kivuli vya kivuli vya kivuli vya kivuli vya kivuli vya kivuli vya kivuli vya kivuli vya kivuli vya kivuli vya kivuli vya kivuli vya kivuli vya kivuli vya kivuli vya kivuli vya kivuli vya kivuli vya kivuli vya kivuli vya kivuli vya kivuli vya kivuli vya kivuli vya kivuli vya kivuli vya kivuli vya kivuli vya kivuli vya kivuli vya kivuli vya kivuli vya kivuli vya kivuli vya kivuli vya kivuli
ref: Magari yanayosukokotwana farasi yalijengwa huko Uingereza mapema kama karne ya 16. Ingawa njia za magari zilisheheni magogo sambamba ya miti, zilihuruhusu farasi kuzivuta kwa kasi zaidi na kuvuta mizigo mikubwa kiasi kwa barabara mbaya za siku. Nguzomlalo zilianzishwa mapema kiasi ili kushikilia reli mahali pake. Hata hivyo, kadiri muda ulivyoendelea iligunduliwa kwamba reli hizo zingefanya kazi bora zaidi ikiwa kipande cha chuma kingewekelewa juu. Hii ilikuja kuwa desturi, lakini chuma kilisababisha kuharibika kwa magurudumu ya mbao ya magari ya kukokotwa. Hatimaye, magurudumu ya mbao yalibadilishwa na magurudumu ya vyuma. Mnamo 1767, reli za kwanza za vyuma kamili zilianzishwa.
