src: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories. Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively. The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay. Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.
mt: Filamu, inayofunzwa na Ryan Gosling na Emma Stone, ilipata mafunzo katika kila kategoria. Gosling na Stone waliapishwa kwa mafunzo ya Balozi na Mwanaume wakati mwingine. src: NHK also reported that the Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant in Niigata prefecture was operating normally. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. reported no effects from the earthquake and that the Number 1 and 2 reactors at its Shika nuclear power plant were shut down. It is reported that some 9400 homes in the region are without water and approximately 100 without electricity. Some roads have been damaged, railway service interrupted in the affected areas, and the Noto Airport in Ishikawa prefecture remains closed.
mt: NHK pia riripoti kwamba jukwaa la kudhibiti nukuu la Kashiwazaki Kariwa katika mkoa wa Niigata ilikuwa inafanya kazi kwa kawaida. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. riripoti hakuna athari kutoka kwa janga la dunia na kwamba reakta za kwanza na pili za jukwaa lake la Shika la kudhibiti nukuu zilikuwa zimefungwa. Ripoti inasema kwamba zaidi ya 9400 nyumba katika eneo hilo zimepotea maji na zaidi ya 100 zimepotea umeme. Barabara nyingi zimeharibiwa, huduma ya reli imepotea katika eneo hilo, na uwanja wa Noto katika mkoa wa Ishikawa bado haukamiliki.
ref: NHK pia iliripoti kuwa kiwanda cha nguvu za nyuklia cha Kashiwazaki Kariwa katika wilaya ya Niigata kilikuwa kikifanya kazi kwa njia ya kawaida. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. iliripoti hakukuwa na athari zozote kutokana na mtetemeko wa ardhi na kwamba tanuri Nambari 1 na 2 katika kiwanda chake cha nguvu za nyuklia cha Shika zilikuwa zimezimwa. Inaripotiwa kwamba takribani kaya 9400 katika eneo hazina maji na takribani 100 hazina umeme. Baadhi ya barabara zimeharibiwa, huduma za reli kukatishwa katika maeneo yaliyoathirika, na uwanja wa ndege wa wilaya ya Ishikawa unabaki kufungwa.

src: The document, according to the leak, will refer to the borders dispute, which Palestine wants based on the borders before the 1967 Mideast War. Other topics covered reportedly include the future state of Jerusalem which is sacred to both nations and the Jordan Valley issue. Israel demands an ongoing military presence in the valley for ten years once an agreement is signed while the PA agrees to leave such presence only for five years.
mt: Kitabu, kulinganisha kwa kutoa, kifupishwa kuhusu mamlaka ya mipaka, ambayo Palestina inataka kufanywa kulingana na mipaka kabla ya vita ya Mashariki ya Kati ya mwaka 1967. Mada nyingine zinazotajwa zinazohusu hali ya baadaye ya mji wa Yerushalayim ambao ni muhimu kwa wote wawili na mada ya nchi ya Yordani. Israel inatangaza kuendesha kazi za kijeshi katika nchi ya Yordani kwa miaka 10 baada ya kufanyika kwa mkataba, wakati PA inaamua kuacha kazi hizo kwa miaka 5 pekee.
ref: Hati hiyo, kulingana na fununu, itarejelea mzozo wa mipaka, ambayo Palestina inataka iwe na msingi wa mipaka kabla ya Vita vya 1967 vya Mashariki ya Kati. Mada nyingine zilizoshughulikiwa inaripotiwa zinatia ndani hali ya baadaye ya Yerusalemu ambayo ni takatifu kwa mataifa yote mawili na suala la Bonde la Yordani. Israeli inadai kuendelezwa kwa uwepo wa kijeshi katika bonde hilo kwa miaka kumi pindi mkataba utakapotiwa saini huku PA ikikubali kuondoa uwepo huo kwa miaka mitano tu.

src: "Born in Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and once held an American permanent resident ""green card"". Hsieh implied during the election that Ma might flee the country during a time of crisis. Hsieh also argued that the photogenic Ma was more style than substance. Despite these accusations, Ma won handily on a platform advocating closer ties with the Chinese mainland."
mt: "Alizaliwa Hong Kong, Ma alikulia New York University na Chuo Kikuu cha Harvard na kwa mara moja alikuwa na kadi ya kawaida ya Marekani "green card"". Hsieh alisema wakati wa uchaguzi kwamba Ma atakataza nchi wakati wa kuchipua. Hsieh pia alisema kwamba Ma alikuwa na nia kubwa kuliko kazi. Bado hivyo, Ma alivuka kwa kasi kwa mafunzo yake ya kufanya zaidi na China."
ref: Mzaliwa wa Hong Kong, Ma alisomea katika kituo kikuu cha New York na shule ya Chuo cha Sheria cha Harvard na kwa wakati mmoja alikuwa na “kadi ya kijani” ya mkazi wa kudumu wa Amerika. Hsieh aliashiria wakati wa uchaguzi kwamba huenda Ma akatoroka nchini wakati wa matatizo. Hsieh pia alidai kuwa Ma aliyeonekana mzuri sana kwenye picha alikuwa mwenye mtindo zaidi kuliko maana. Hata kwa mashtaka haya, Ma alishinda kimuhimu katika jukwaa akitetea uhusiano wa karibu zaidi na bara la Kichina.

src: After it became apparent that many families were seeking legal help to fight the evictions, a meeting was held on March 20 at the East Bay Community Law Center for the victims of the housing scam. When the tenants started sharing what had occurred to them, most of the families involved suddenly realized that Carolyn Wilson of the OHA had stolen their security deposits, and skipped out of town. Tenants at Lockwood Gardens believe that there may be another 40 families or more to face eviction, since they learned that OHA police are also investigating other public housing properties in Oakland that may be caught up in the housing scam.
mt: Baada ya kuonekana kwamba wengi wa familia zilikuwa wakifurahia msaada la kisheria ili kushinda uhalifu, kikao kilifanyika tarehe 20 Machi katika Kituo cha Sheria cha Jamii ya Bay Mashariki kwa wale waliopata uhalifu wa nyumba. Wakiwajibika kwa wale waliopata uhalifu, wengi wa familia zilikuwa wakijua kwamba Carolyn Wilson ya OHA alikuwa ameiba wadhifa wao, na kuficha kwa mji. Wale waliopata uhalifu katika Lockwood Gardens wanamwamini kwamba kuna familia nyingi zaidi au zaidi kwa sababu waliwahi kuona kwamba polisi wa OHA pia wanaendesha utafiti katika nyumba za umma katika Oakland ambazo zinaweza kuwa zimepata uhalifu.
ref: Baada ya kuwa dhahiri kwamba familia nyingi zilikuwa zinatafuta usaidizi wa kisheria kupigana na ufukuzwaji, mkutano ulifanywa mnamo Machi 20 katika Kituo cha Sheria cha Jamii cha East Bay kwa waathirika wa utapeli wa makazi. Wakati wapangaji walianza kusumulia yaliyowatendekea, familia nyingi husika ziligundua kuwa Carolyn Wilson wa shirika la OHA aliiba amana yao na kutoweka mjini. Wapangaji katika Lockwood Gardens wanaamini kwamba huenda kukawa na familia nyingine 40 au zaidi zitakazokabili kufukuzwa, kwani walifahamu kuwa polisi wa OHA pia wanachunguza mali nyingine za makazi katika Oakland ambazo huenda zikajipata katika sakata ya nyumba.

src: Following the race, Keselowski remains the Drivers' Championship leader with 2,250 points. Seven points behind, Johnson is second with 2,243. In third, Hamlin is twenty points behind, but five ahead of Bowyer. Kahne and Truex, Jr. are fifth and sixth respectively with 2,220 and 2,207 points. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, and Harvick round out the top-ten positions for the Drivers' Championship with four races remaining in the season.
mt: Baada ya mashindano, Keselowski bado ni mwenye nafasi bora katika mashindano ya wamiliki wa magari na 2,250 point. Saba point chini, Johnson ni pili na 2,243. Katika nafasi ya tatu, Hamlin ni kumi point chini, lakini saba point juu ya Bowyer. Kahne na Truex, Jr. ni pili na saba kwa kiasi cha 2,220 na 2,207 point. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, na Harvick wana nafasi za kati za mashindano ya wamiliki wa magari na magharibi ya mashindano ya wamiliki wa magari.
ref: Baada ya mbio hizo, Keselowski anabaki kuwa kiongozi wa Ubingwa wa Madereva kwa pointi 2,250. Kwa pointi saba nyuma, Johnson ni wa pili na 2,243. Akiwa wa tatu, Hamlin yuko nyuma kwa pointi ishirini, lakini tano mbele ya Bowyer. Kahne na Truex, mdogo, ni wa tano na sita mtawalia kwa alama 2,220 na 2,207. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth na Harvick wanachukua nafasi kumi za juu za Ubingwa wa Madereva huku mbio nne zikibaki katika msimu.

src: This is believed to be the fifth time in history that people have observed what turned out to be chemically confirmed martian material falling to Earth. Out of the approximately 24,000 known meteorites to have fallen to Earth, only about 34 have been verified to be martian in origin. Fifteen of these rocks are attributed to the meteorite shower last July. Some of the rocks, which are very rare on Earth, are being sold from US$11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, which is about ten times more than the cost of gold.
mt: Hii ni kama inavyoamini ni mara ya tano katika historia ambako watu wameona nchi ya kwanza kujitokeza kama ilivyotambulika kama nchi ya kwanza kujitokeza kama ilivyotambulika kama nchi ya kwanza kujitokeza kama ilivyotambulika kama nchi ya kwanza kujitokeza kama ilivyotambulika kama nchi ya kwanza kujitokeza kama ilivyotambulika kama nchi ya kwanza kujitokeza kama ilivyotambulika kama nchi ya kwanza kujitokeza kama ilivyotambulika kama nchi ya kwanza kujitokeza kama ilivyotambulika kama nchi ya kwanza kujitokeza kama ilivyotambulika kama nchi ya kwanza kujitokeza kama ilivyotambulika kama nchi ya kwanza kujitokeza kama ilivyotambulika kama nchi ya kwanza kujitokeza kama ilivyotambulika kama nchi ya kwanza kujitokeza kama ilivyotambulika kama nchi ya kwanza kujitokeza kama ilivyotambulika kama nchi ya kwanza kujitokeza kama ilivyotambulika kama nchi ya kwanza kujitokeza kama ilivyotambulika kama nchi ya kwanza kujitokeza kama ilivyotambulika kama nchi ya kwanza kujitokeza kama ilivyotambulika kama nchi ya kwanza kujitokeza kama ilivyotambulika kama nchi ya kwanza kujitokeza kama ilivyotambulika kama nchi ya kwanza kujitokeza kama ilivyotambulika kama nchi ya kwanza kujitokeza kama ilivyotambulika kama nchi ya kwanza kujitokeza kama ilivyotambulika kama nchi ya
ref: Hii inaaminika kuwa mara ya tano katika historia ambapo watu walitazama kilichogeuka kuwa nyenzo zilizothibitiwa kikemikali kuwa za mihiri zikianguka Duniani. Kati ya takriban vimondo 24,000 vinavyojulikana kuanguka Duniani, ni takribani 34 tu ambavyo vimethibitishwa kuwa na asili ya mirihi. Kumi na tano ya haya mawe yamehusishwa kwa mawe yaliyotoka katika nyota na kunyesha Julai iliyopita. Baadhi ya mawe, ambayo ni nadra sana katika Dunia, yanauzwa kutoka dola 11,000 hadi dola 22,500 za Marekani kwa aunsi, ambayo ni takriban mara kumi ya bei ya dhahabu.

src: Schumacher who retired in 2006 after winning the Formula 1 championship seven times, was due to replace the injured Felipe Massa. The Brazilian suffered a serious head injury after a crash during the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix. Massa is due to be out for at least the rest of the 2009 season.
mt: Schumacher aliyerithi mwaka 2006 baada ya kushinda pao la Formula 1 saba mara, alikuwa anatarajia kutumia nafasi ya Felipe Massa. Mkenya aliyekuwa na kifua kikuu kubwa baada ya kashfa katika pao la Grand Prix la Hungary mwaka 2009, Massa anatarajia kuwa bado kwenye pao kwa muda wa kati ya msimu wa 2009.
ref: Schumacher aliyestaafu mwaka wa 2006 baada ya kushinda michuano ya Formula 1 mara saba, alikua tayari kuchukua nafasi ya Felipe Massa aliyejeruhiwa. Mbrazili huyo alipata jeraha baya la kichwani baada ya ajali wakati wa Grand Prix ya Hungaria ya 2009. Massa anatarajiwa kuwa nje kwa angalau muda uliobaki wa msimu wa 2009.

src: Until now, AOL has been able to move and develop the IM market at its own pace, due to its widespread use within the United States. With this arrangement in place, this freedom might end. The number of users of the Yahoo! and Microsoft services combined will rival the number of AOL's customers.
mt: Kabla ya sasa, AOL imekuwa na uhuru wa kuendesha na kuboresha bazarini la IM kwa njia yake, kwa sababu kwa kiasi kikubwa imekuwa na matumizi ndani ya Marekani. Na kwa kufanya mkataba huu, uhuru huu huuwezi kuendelea. Jumla ya watumizi wa huduma za Yahoo! na Microsoft zitakubaliana na watumizi wa AOL.
ref: Hadi sasa, AOL imeweza kusongesha na kuendeleza soko la IM kwa kasi yake mwenyewe, kwa sababu ya matumizi yake yaliyoenea ndani ya Merika. Mpangilio huu ukiwa, uhuru huu unaweza kumalizika. Jumla ya idadi ya watumiaji wa huduma za Yahoo! na Microsoft pamoja itazidi idadi ya wateja wa AOL.

src: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people. The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers. Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.
mt: Gari la kivinjari liliangama katika makao ya polisi katika Gaziantep, Uturuki jana asubuhi, kwa kuua wawakilishi wawili wa polisi na kuwaua zaidi ya kumi na mbili wengine. src: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican Party presidential primary election on Tuesday with over 46 percent of the vote. Former U.S. Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent. As a winner-takes-all state, Florida awarded all fifty of its delegates to Romney, pushing him ahead as the front-runner for the Republican Party nomination.
mt: Gavana wa zamani wa Massachusetts Mitt Romney alishinda uchaguzi wa kipindi cha chama cha Republican kwa Florida kwa kipindi cha tarehe 31 Januari 2012. Alipata zaidi ya 46% ya kura. Alipata zaidi ya 32% ya kura Kiongozi wa zamani wa Bunge la Umoja wa Mataifa Newt Gingrich. Kama uchaguzi wa kipindi unaendana na uchaguzi wa kundi, Florida ilipata wote wakati wote wa wabunge 50 kwa Romney, kufikia kama mwenyeji wa kipindi cha chama cha Republican.
ref: Gavana wa awali wa Massachusetts Mitt Romney alishinda uchaguzi wa msingi wa urais wa Chama cha Republican wa Florida Jumanne kwa zaidi ya asilimia 46 ya kura. Spika wa Nyumba wa zamani wa Marekani Newt Gingrich alikuwa wa pili kwa asilimia 32. Kama jimbo la mshindi-huchukua-yote. Florida ilimtunukia Romney wajumbe wake wote hamsini, hivyo kumsukuma mbele kama mgombeaji mkuu katika uchaguzi wa Chama cha Republican.

src: "Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth, and sixth place, respectively. After the results came in, Gingrich lauded Santorum, but had tough words for Romney, on whose behalf negative campaign advertisements were aired in Iowa against Gingrich. Perry stated that he would ""return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race"", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign."
mt: "Mwenyekiti wa Bunge la zamani Newt Gingrich, Gavana wa Texas Rick Perry, na Mbunge wa Kanda Michele Bachmann wakaeza kwa nafasi ya nne, tano na sita, hivyo, baada ya majibu kuja, Gingrich alimwambia Santorum, lakini alikuwa na maneno mabaya kwa Romney, ambaye alikuwa na mawazo ya kibadili kuhusu Newt Gingrich. Perry alisema atakapokwenda Texas kueleza majibu ya kura za kawaida ya kesi ya Ames mwezi Agosti, kama kuna njia ya kufuata katika kura hii, lakini alisema atakapobaki katika kura hii na kushindana katika kura ya kwanza ya Januari 21 ya South Carolina. Bachmann, ambaye alishinda kura ya Ames mwezi Agosti, alisema atakapobadilisha kazi yake."
ref: "Spika wa awali Newt Gingrich, gavana wa Texas Rick Perry na Mbunge Michelle Bachmann walimaliza katika nafasi za nne, tano, na sita mtawalia. Baada ya matokeo kuingia, Gingrich alimpongeza Santorum, lakini alikuwa na maneno makali kwa Romney, ambaye matangazo hasi ya kampeni yalipeperushwa kwa niaba yake dhidi ya Gingrich. Perry alisema, ""Nitarudi Texas ili kutathmini matokeo ya mkutano wa usiku wa leo, kuamua kama kuna njia yangu ya kusonga mbele katika mbio hizi"", lakini baadaye akasema kwamba angebaki kwenye mbio na kushindana katika uchaguzi wa msingi wa Carolina Kusini mnamo Januari 21. Bachmann, aliyeshinda Kura ya maoni ya Ames Straw mnamo Agosti, aliamua kukomesha kampeni yake."

src: "The station's web site describes the show as ""old school radio theater with a new and outrageous geeky spin!"" In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio. In late 2015, TogiNet established AstroNet Radio as a subsidiary station. The show originally featured amateur voice actors, local to East Texas."
mt: "Tovuti ya stesheni inavyoonyesha mchezo kama "radio ya kizamani na spin mpya na mawazo ya wachafu!"" Katika siku zake za awali, mchezo ulifanyika kwa kujumuisha tu katika tovuti ya radio ya kizamani ya TogiNet Radio, tovuti ambayo inaendeshwa kwa radio ya kujadili. Katika mwaka wa 2015, TogiNet alianzisha stesheni ya AstroNet Radio kama stesheni ya kushirikiana. Mchezo ulianza kwa kujumuisha wachafu wa kijamii, wanaoishi katika Texas Mashariki.
ref: "Wavuti wa kituo hicho unaelezea onyesho hilo kama ""Thieta ya zamani ya redio yenye mzunguko mpya wa kukera na wa kichizi!"" Katika siku zake za mwanzo mwanzo, onyesho hilo liliwasilishwa tu kwenye wavuti ya muda mrefu ya redio ya intaneti ya TogiNet, wavuti iliyozingatia mazungumzo ya redioni. Mwishoni mwa 2015, TogiNet ilianzisha Redio ya AstroNet kama idhaa tanzu. Kipindi cha awali kilionyesha waigizaji wa sauti wasio na ujuzi, wa ndani hadi Mashariki mwa Texas."

src: The Mumbai attackers arrived via boat on Novemeber 26, 2008, bringing with them grenades, automatic weapons and hit multiple targets including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal Hotel. David Headley's scouting and information gathering had helped to enable the operation by the 10 gunmen from the Pakistani militant group Laskhar-e-Taiba. The attack put a huge strain on relations between India and Pakistan.
mt: Wanatupu waliingia kwa meli tarehe 26 Novemba 2008, wakibeba na wao bomba za kifaru, silaha za kujikinga na kujikinga na matangazo mengi kama vile Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus jengo la reli na jengo la taj mahal. ref: Wavamizi wa Mumbai walifika kwa boti mnamo 26 Novemba 2008, na wakaleta gruneti, silaha za kiotomatiki na wakapiga sehemu nyingi zikiwamo kituo cha reli cha Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus kilichojawa na watu na Hoteli maarufu ya Taj Mahal. Uwezo wa David Headley wa kutafuta na kukusanya habari ulikuwa umesaidia kuwezesha operesheni ya wanamgambo 10 kutoka kwa kikundi cha Laskhar-e-Taiba cha wapiganaji wa Pakistani. Shambulio hilo liliweka shida kubwa kwenye mahusiano kati ya India na Pakistani.

src: "Nadal's head to head record against the Canadian is 7–2. He recently lost against Raonic in the Brisbane Open. Nadal bagged 88% net points in the match winning 76 points in the first serve. After the match, King of Clay said, ""I am just excited about being back in the final rounds of the most important events. I am here to try to win this."""
mt: "Nadal's head to head record against the Canadian is 7–2. He recently lost against Raonic in the Brisbane Open. Nadal bagged 88% net points in the match winning 76 points in the first serve. After the match, King of Clay said, ""I am just excited about being back in the final rounds of the most important events. I am here to try to win this."""
ref: Rekodi ya Nadal dhidi ya Kanada ni 7-2. Hivi karibuni alipoteza dhidi ya Raonic kwenye Brisbane Open. Nadal alipata 88% ya pointi kwenye mechi na kushinda pointi 76 kwenye utumishi wa kwanza. Baada ya mechi, Mfalme wa Clay alisema, “Nina msisimko tu kuhusu kuwa tena katika raundi za mwisho za tukio muhimu zaidi. Niko hapa kujaribu kushinda hii.”

src: Last week, Naked News announced that it would dramatically increase its international language mandate to news reporting, with three new broadcasts. Already reporting in English and Japanese, the global organization is launching Spanish, Italian, and Korean-language programs, for television, the web, and mobile devices.
mt: Jikwaa la habari la kujivu la Naked News lilianzisha mnamo wiki ijayo, kwa kutoa habari kwa lugha za kimataifa, na kwa kuanzisha programu tatu mpya. Kwa sasa, kwa kufanya habari kwa Kiingereza na Kijapani, kwa kuanzisha habari za Kispanis, Kitalia, na Kikorea, kwa televisheni, kwa mtandao, na kwa vifurushi vya simu.
ref: Wiki iliyopita, Naked News ilitangaza kuwa wangeongeza sana idhini yake ya utangazaji wa Habari kwa lugha za kimataifa, na watangazaji watatu wapya. Tayari likiripoti kwa Kiingereza na Kijapani, shirika la kimataifa linazindua mipango ya lugha za Kihispania, Kiitaliano, na Kikorea, kwa televisheni, wavuti, na vifaa vya mkononi.

src: Beyond Wednesday's event, Carpanedo competed in two individual races at the Championships. Her first was the Slalom, where she earned a Did Not Finish in her first run. 36 of the 116 competitors had the same result in that race. Her other race, the Giant Slalom, saw her finish in tenth in the women's sitting group with a combined run time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes slower than first place finisher Austrian Claudia Loesch and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the ninth place finisher Gyöngyi Dani of Hungary. Four skiers in the women's sitting group failed to finish their runs, and 45 of the 117 total skiers in the Giant Slalom failed to rank in the race.
mt: Baada ya shughuli ya Jumatatu, Carpanedo alishiriki katika mashindano kwa ajili ya mashindano yake ya kujitegemea. Mashindano yake ya kwanza ulikuwa Slalom, ambapo alipata Did Not Finish katika run yake ya kwanza. 36 ya wacharazishaji 116 walikuwa na matokeo haramu katika mashindano hayo. Mashindano yake ya pili, Giant Slalom, alipata nafasi ya tisini katika kundi la wanawake wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa wakiwa w
ref: Zaidi ya tukio la Jumatatu, Carpanedo alishindana katika mbio mbiliza kibinafsi katika Ubingwa. Yake ya kwanza ilikuwa Slalom, ambapo alipata Hakumaliza katika mbio zake za kwanza. 36 wa washindani 116 walikuwa na matokeo sawa katika mbio hizo. Alimaliza wa kumi katika mbio yake nyingine, Giant Slalom, kwenye kitengo cha kuketi cha wanawake kwa muda uliojumuishwa wa ukimbiaji wa 4:41.30, dakika 2:11.60 polepole kuliko aliyemaliza katika nafasi ya kwanza Mwaustralia Claudia Loesch na dakika 1:09.02 polepole kuliko aliyemaliza katika nafasi ya tisa Gyongyi Dani wa Hungaria. Wazungu wanne kwenye kundi la wanawake walishindwa kumaliza mbio zao, na 45 ya 117 walifeli na kushindwa kupata nafasi kwenye mbio hizo.

src: On Wednesday, the United States' National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns regarding COVID-19. The NBA's decision followed a Utah Jazz player testing positive for the COVID-19 virus.
mt: Jumatano, Chama cha Kitaifa cha Mpira wa Kati wa Marekani (NBA) lilisitisha mchezo wake wa mpira wa kati wa kazi kwa sababu ya masuala ya COVID-19. Hali ya kuchukua hatua ya NBA ilifuatia mchezaji kutoka timu ya Utah Jazz kujaribu kwa virusi ya COVID-19.
ref: Mnamo Jumatano, Ushirika wa Kitaifa wa Mpira wa Kikapu wa Marekani (NBA) ulisimamisha kipindi chake cha mpira wa kikapu wa kitaalamu kwa sababu ya wasiwasi kuhusu COVID-19. Uamuzi wa NBA ulifuatia mchezaji wa Utah wa mziki wa Jazz kupatikana na virusi vya COVID-19.

src: On Wednesday, the United States' National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns regarding COVID-19. The NBA's decision followed a Utah Jazz player testing positive for the COVID-19 virus.

src: Today's Player of the Day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals. He had 2 goals and 2 assists in Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers. Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom; his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, becoming the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux each reached that milestone.
mt: Kiongozi wa Siku ya Leo ni Alex Ovechkin wa Washington Capitals. Alifanya 2 goli na 2 ushahidi katika kushinda Washington 5-3 Atlanta Thrashers. Ushahidi wake wa kwanza wa siku iliyopita ulikuwa kwa goli la kushinda la kijana Nicklas Backstrom; goli lake la pili la siku iliyopita ilikuwa goli lake la 60, kuwa kiongozi wa kwanza kufanya goli 60 au zaidi katika msimu, tangu 1995-96, wakati Jaromir Jagr na Mario Lemieux kila mmoja kufika kilele hicho.
ref: Mchezaji wa Siku wa Leo ni Alex Ovechkin wa Washington Capitals. Alikuwa na goli mbili na saidizi mbili katika ushindi wa Washington wa 5-3 dhidi ya Atlanta Thrashers. Usaidizi wa kwanza wa usiku wa Ovechkin ulikuwa kwenye bao la ushindina mgeni Nicklas Backstrom; goli lake la pili katika usiku lilikuwa lake la 60 kwenye msimu, hivyo kuwa mchezaji wa kwanza kufunga magoli 60 au zaidi kwenye msimu tangu 1995-96, wakati Jaromir Jagr na Mario Lamieux kila mmoja alifikia hatua hiyo.

src: The Northern Rock bank had been nationalised in 2008 following the revelation that the company had received emergency support from the UK Government. Northern Rock had required support due to its exposure during the subprime mortgage crisis in 2007. Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group had a bid for the bank rejected prior to the bank’s nationalisation. In 2010, while nationalised, the current high street bank Northern Rock plc was split from the ‘bad bank’, Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin have only purchased the ‘good bank’ of Northern Rock, not the asset management company.
mt: Banki la Northern Rock lilikuwa limejulikana kama miliki kwa serikali ya Uingereza mnamo 2008 baada ya kuonyeshwa kwamba kampuni hiyo ilipata ushahidi wa kisera kwa kipindi cha kisasa. Northern Rock ilipata ushahidi kutokana na ujambazi wa wamiliki wa mabwepaji ya kifedha kwa wakati wa kisasa mnamo 2007. Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group ilipata bid kwa banki hii kabla ya banki hii kuwa miliki. Mnamo 2010, wakati banki hii ilikuwa miliki, Northern Rock plc ilikuwa imepinduliwa kutoka Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin wamepata Northern Rock tu, bila Northern Rock (Asset Management).
ref: Benki ya Mwamba wa Kaskazini ilifanywa ya kitaifa mnamo 2008 kufuatia ufunuzi kuwa kampuni hiyo ilipokea msaada wa dharura kutoka Serikali ya Uingereza. Benki ya Northern Rock ilihitaji msaada kwa sababu ya hatari za mzozo wa rehani wa 2007. Ofa ya Kikundi cha Virgin cha Bwana Richard Branson ya ununuzi wa benki hiyo ilikataliwa kabla ya kutaifishwa kwa benki hiyo. Katika mwaka wa 2010, benki ya sasa ya mtaa wa juu Northern Bank plc ilitenganishwa na ‘benki mbaya’, Northern Rock (Usimamizi wa Mali). Virgin wamenunua tu 'benki nzuri' ya Northern Rock, si kampuni ya udhibiti wa rasilimali.

src: Mr. Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate accord isolates the United States, which will now be the only developed nation not to ratify the agreement. Australia's former conservative government refused to ratify Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy with its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries like India and China were not bound by emissions targets.
mt: Hatma ya Mr. Rudd kufanya saini kwa kifaa cha mazingira cha Kyoto inaingiza Marekani, ambacho sasa itakuwa nchi pekee ya kujengwa kwa nchi zinazozingatia kifaa, ambako nchi za kisasa kama vile India na China hawakubali kufanya kifaa hicho.
ref: Uamuzi wa Bw. Rudd kusaini makubaliano ya hali ya hewa ya Kyoto unatenga Marekani, ambayo sasa itakuwa nchi ya pekee iliyostawi kutoridhia mkataba huo. Serikali ya awali ya kihafidhina ya Australia ilikataa kuridhia Kyoto, ikisema ingeharibu uchumi kwa utegemeaji wake mkubwa wa uuzaji nje wa makaa-mawe, wakati nchi kama India na China hazikufungwa na malengo ya uzalishaji wa vichafuzi.

src: Shooters in the supplementary pest control trial were to be closely supervised by rangers, as the trial was monitored and its effectiveness evaluated. In a partnership of NPWS and the Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, qualified volunteers were recruited, under the Sporting Shooters Association's hunting program. According to Mick O'Flynn, the Acting Director Park Conservation and Heritage with the NPWS, the four shooters selected for the first shooting operation received comprehensive safety and training instruction.
mt: Wanashabiki katika kipindi cha kushughulikia magonjwa ya kijani katika kipindi cha kushughulikia kwa kushabaki walikuwa wakikabidhiwa na wakulima, kama uchaguzi ulivyotambuliwa na uwezo wake ulivutambuliwa. Katika ushirikiano wa NPWS na Chama cha Wanashabiki cha Australia (NSW) Inc, wataalamu waliohitimu waliwekwa, katika programu ya shabaki ya Chama cha Wanashabiki cha Australia, waliwekwa kwa kushirikiana. Kulingana na Mick O'Flynn, Mkuu wa Park Conservation and Heritage na NPWS, wawili wawili waliwahi kushirikiana katika kipindi cha kwanza cha kushabaki walikuwa wakiwa na uongozi na mafunzo ya kisalama.
ref: Walenga shabaha katika jaribio la ziada la kudhibiti visumbufu walipaswa kusimamiwa na walinzi, kwani jaribio lingefuatiliwa na ufanisi wake kutathminiwa. Kwa kushirikiana na NPWS na Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, wajitoleaji waliohitimu waliandikishwa, chini ya mpango wa uwindaji wa Sporting Shooters Association. Kwa mujibu wa Mick O'Flynn, Kaimu Mkurugenzi wa Uhifadhi wa Mbuga na Urithi katika NPWS, walenga shabaha hao wanne walioteuliwa kwa operesheni ya kwanza ya upigaji risasi walipokea mafunzo na maagizo kamili ya usalama.

src: """Based on this fossil, that means the split is much earlier than has been anticipated by the molecular evidence. That means everything has to be put back,"" said researcher at the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-author of the study, Berhane Asfaw."
mt: "Kulingana na hifadhidhara hii, hivyo inamaanisha kuwa mchakato huo unafika karibu zaidi kuliko ulivyojulikana na maelezo ya molekuli. Hivyo, yote yameharibiwa," anasema mwanasayansi wa Shirika la Utafiti wa Bonde la Mto Rift katika Ethiopia na mmoja wa wataalamu wa taarifa, Berhane Asfaw.
ref: """Kwa kutegemea kisukuku hiki, hii inamaanisha mpasuko huo ni wa mapema zaidi kuliko ilivyotarajiwa na ushahidi wa kimolekuli. Hiyo inammanisha kuwa kila kitu kinafaa kurejeshwa, “alisema mtafiti katika Huduma ya Utafiti wa Bonde la Ufa Ethiopia na mwandishi mwenza wa utafiti huo, Berhane Asfaw."

src: At Thursday's keynote presentation of the Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the controller design for the company's new Nintendo Revolution console. Resembling a television remote, the controller uses two sensors placed near the user's television to triangulate its position in three-dimensional space. This will allow players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the device through the air.
mt: Katika kipindi cha kwanza cha michezo ya Tokyo, rais wa Nintendo Satoru Iwata alitangaza ujenzi wa kifaa cha kudhibiti kwa kipindi cha michezo cha Nintendo Revolution. src: At Thursday's keynote presentation of the Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the controller design for the company's new Nintendo Revolution console. Resembling a television remote, the controller uses two sensors placed near the user's television to triangulate its position in three-dimensional space. This will allow players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the device through the air.

src: Earlier the Chinese news agency Xinhua reported a plane to be hijacked. Later reports then stated the plane received a bomb threat and was diverted back to Afghanistan, landing in Kandahar. The early reports say the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan after being denied an emergency landing in Ürümqi.
mt: Awali habari kutoka China, Xinhua, iliripoti ndege kuwa imechomwa. Habari za baadaye zilitoa kwamba ndege ilipata uasi wa bomba na kufutwa tena katika Afghanistan, kwa kufika Kandahar. Habari za awali zilitoa kwamba ndege ilifutwa tena katika Afghanistan baada ya kuchukuliwa kwa nafasi ya kuhakikisha kufika Ürümqi.
ref: Mapema wakala wa taarifa wa Kichina Xinhua uliripoti utekwaji nyara wa ndege. Kisha ripoti za baadaye zilisema ndege ilipokea tishio la bomu na ikaelekezwa tena Afganistani, na kutua Kandahar. Ripoti za mapema zinasema ndege ilielekezwa tena Afganistani baada ya kunyimwa ruhusa ya kutua katika Urumki.

src: "On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him. Danius said, ""Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."""
mt: "Jumatatu, Sara Danius, mkuu wa kikao cha Tuzo ya Nobel kwa Elimu ya Kiswahili katika Chuo Kikuu cha Uswidi, alitangaza kwa umma katika programu ya redio ya Sveriges Radio nchini Uswidi kikao hicho, kwa sababu hakutambulika kwa Bob Dylan kwa kushinda Tuzo ya Nobel ya Elimu ya Kiswahili mwaka 2016, kimeacha kufanya kazi. Danius alisema, ""Sasa hatuna kazi yoyote. Nimepiga na kutoa barua kwa mshirika mwenye uwezo zaidi na kupata majibu mengi mengi. Kwa sasa, hilo ni kile ambacho ni kile cha kutosha."""
ref: "Mnamo Jumatatu, Sara Danius, katibu wa kudumu wa Kamati ya Nobel ya Fasihi katika Chuo cha Uswidi, alitangaza hadharani wakati wa kipindi cha redio kwenye Sveriges Radio katika Uswidi kwamba kamati hiyo, kwa kutoweza kumfikia Bob Dylan moja kwa moja kuhusu ushindi wa Tuzo la Nobel la Fasihi 2016, iliacha juhudi zake za kujaribu kumfikia. Danius alisema, ""Sasa hivi hatufanyi chochote. Nimepiga simu na kutuma barua pepe kwa mshirika wake wa karibu na kupata majibu ya kirafiki sana. Kwa sasa, hakika hiyo imetosha."""

src: "U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement. Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge ""a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."""

src: "In 1956 Słania moved to Sweden, where three years later he began work for the Swedish Post Office and became their chief engraver. He produced over 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. His work is of such recognized quality and detail that he is one of the very few ""household names"" among philatelists. Some specialize in collecting his work alone. His 1,000th stamp was the magnificent ""Great Deeds by Swedish Kings"" by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl in 2000, which is listed in the Guinness Book of World Records. He was also engaged in engraving banknotes for many countries, recent examples of his work including the Prime Ministerial portraits on the front of the new Canadian $5 and $100 bills."
mt: "Mwaka 1956 Słania alikuwa na umri wa miaka 22, alipofika nchini Uswidi, ambapo miaka tatu baadaye alianza kazi kwa Posta ya Uswidi na kuwa mkuu wa wakufunzi wake. Alifanya kazi kwa Posta ya Uswidi na nchi 28 nyingine. Kazi yake ina uzoefu na ujuzi wa kutosha, hivyo anajulikana kama mmoja kati ya wachache wanao jadili kama wanaishi katika nyumba yao. Wengine wanazalisha kazi yake pekee. Kazi yake ya kwanza ilikuwa ya kifahari cha 1000 cha Uswidi, ambacho kilikuwa na uzoefu mkubwa na ujuzi, ambao kimeorodheshwa katika kitabu cha rekodi za dunia kwa jina la ""Great Deeds by Swedish Kings"" na David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl mwaka 2000. Pia alifanya kazi ya kifahari cha banki kwa nchi nyingi, mfano mpya zaidi ya kazi yake ni picha za waziri wakuu wa Kanada kwenye kifahari cha $5 na $100."
ref: Mnamo 1956 Slania alihamia Uswidi, ambako miaka mitatu baadaye alianza kazi katika Ofisi ya Posta ya Uswidi na akawa mchoraji wao mkuu. Alizalisha stempu zaidi ya 1,000 kwa Uswidi na nchi nyingine 28. Kazi yake ni ya ubora na undani wa kutambulika sana hadi yeye ni mmoja wa wachache katika “majina ya kinyumbani” kati ya wanastempu. Watu wengine hushughulika na kuikusanya kazi yake pekee. Stempu yake ya 1,000 ilikuwa “Great Deeds by Swedish Kings” nzuri sana na David Klocker Ehrenstrahl mwaka wa 2000, ambayo imetajwa katika Guinness Book of World Records.. Pia alikuwa anashughulika na uchoraji wa noti za benki kwa nchi nyingi, mifano ya hivi karibuni ya kazi yake ikiwa ni pamoja na picha za Uwaziri Mkuu katika upande wa mbele wa noti mpya za dola 5 na dola 100 za Kanada.

src: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska. A power failure following a routine fire-command system test caused relief valves to open and crude oil overflowed near the Fort Greely pump station 9. The valves opening allowed a pressure release for the system and oil flowed on a pad to a tank that can hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons). As of Wednesday afternoon, the tank vents were still leaking probably from thermal expansion inside the tank. Another secondary containment area below the tanks capable of holding 104,500 barrels was not yet filled to capacity.
mt: 800 mile za Trans-Alaska Pipeline System ziliwakamuliwa baada ya kupoteza elfu kadhaa za barabara za mafuta ya asali kaskazini mwa Fairbanks, Alaska. Kifo cha kasi kutokana na testi ya kawaida ya mfumo wa kutoa mafuta kwa kutoa mafuta kwa kutoa mafuta kwa kutoa mafuta kwa kutoa mafuta kwa kutoa mafuta kwa kutoa mafuta kwa kutoa mafuta kwa kutoa mafuta kwa kutoa mafuta kwa kutoa mafuta kwa kutoa mafuta kwa kutoa mafuta kwa kutoa mafuta kwa kutoa mafuta kwa kutoa mafuta kwa kutoa mafuta kwa kutoa mafuta kwa kutoa mafuta kwa kutoa mafuta kwa kutoa mafuta kwa kutoa mafuta kwa kutoa mafuta kwa kutoa mafuta kwa kutoa mafuta kwa kutoa mafuta kwa kutoa mafuta kwa kutoa mafuta kwa kutoa mafuta kwa kutoa mafuta kwa kutoa mafuta kwa kutoa mafuta kwa kutoa mafuta kwa kutoa mafuta kwa kutoa mafuta kwa kutoa mafuta kwa kutoa mafuta kwa kutoa mafuta kwa kutoa mafuta kwa kutoa mafuta kwa kutoa mafuta kwa kutoa mafuta kwa kutoa mafuta kwa kutoa mafuta kwa kutoa mafuta kwa kutoa mafuta kwa kutoa mafuta kwa kutoa mafuta kwa kutoa mafuta kwa kutoa mafuta kwa kutoa mafuta kwa kutoa mafuta kwa kutoa mafuta kwa kutoa mafuta kwa kutoa mafuta kwa kutoa maf
ref: Maili 800 za Mfumo wa Trans-Alaska Pipeline zilifungwa kufuatia umwagikaji wa maelfu ya mapipa ya mafuta yasiyosafishwa kusini mwa Fairbanks, Alaska. Ukosefu wa umeme kufuatia jaribio la kawaida la amri ya moto ulisababisha vilango vya kutuliza kufunguka na mafuta yasiyosafishwa yalifurika karibu na kituo cha pampu cha Fort Greely. Ufunguzi wa vilango uliruhusu kuachiliwa kwa shinikizo kwa mfumo na mafuta yalitiririka kwenye pedi hadi kwenye tangi ambalo linaweza kubeba mapipa 55,000 (galoni milioni 2.3). Kufikia Jumatano alasiri, matundu ya tanki yalikuwa bado yanavuja labda kutokana na upanuzi wa kijoto ndani ya tanki. Eneo lingine ndogo chini ya tangi zenye uwezo wa kuhifadhi mapipa 104,500 bado halikuwa limejazwa hadi kiwango chake.

src: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees. The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped. Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.
mt: Korpusi wa U.S. wa Uinginezi alitambua kwamba mvua ya 6 inchi itaweza kubaguliwa katika mabonde yaliyobaguliwa kabla ya mvua ya Katarina. Kisiwa cha Tisa, ambako mvua ya Katarina ilibaguliwa kwa kina cha 20 futi, sasa ina maji ya kichwa kama mabonde ya karibu yalibaguliwa. Maji yamebakiwa kwenye mabonde ya sehemu 100 futi.
ref: Corps of Engineers cha Marekani kilikadiria kwamba inchi 6 za mvua huenda zikabomoa matuta ambayo yaliharibiwa awali. Wadi ya Tisa, ambayo ilishuhudia mafuriko ya hadi futi 20 kwa kimo wakati wa Kimbunga Katrina, sasa iko kwenye maji yanayofikia kiunoni kwani tuta lililokuwa karibu lilifurika. Maji yanamwagika juu ya tuta katika sehemu ya futi 100 upana.

src: Hamilton confirmed Howard University Hospital admitted the patient in stable condition. The patient had been to Nigeria, where some cases of the Ebola virus have occurred. The hospital has followed protocol for infection control, including separating the patient from others to prevent possible infection of others.
mt: Hamilton alivitupia Howard University Hospital alikataa kuficha wagonjwa katika hali ya kawaida. Wagonjwa alikuwa katika Nigeria, ambapo magonjwa ya Ebola yamekuwepo. Hospitali hii imefika katika matakwa ya kudhibiti magonjwa, ikiwemo kupanga wagonjwa kutoka wengine ili kupunguza magonjwa ya wengine.
ref: Hamilton alithibitisha kwamba Chuo cha Howard kilimpokea mgonjwa akiwa katika hali thabiti. Mgonjwa alikuwa Nijeria, ambako baadhi ya matukio ya virusi vya Ebola yametokea. Hospitali imefuata itifaki ya kudhibiti maambukizi, ikiwa ni pamoja na kutenga mgonjwa kutoka kwa wengine ili kuzuia uwezekano wa kuwaambukiza wengine.

src: Comets may possibly have been a source of water delivery to the earth along with organic matter that can form proteins and support life. Scientists hope to understand how planets form, especially how the Earth formed, since comets collided with the Earth long ago.
mt: Kometi zinaweza kuwa chanzo cha maji ya kuzunguka dunia pamoja na mengine yenye kujenga protini na kuhudumu maisha. Wanasayansi wanasubiri kujua jinsi gani yalivunja dunia, hasa jinsi dunia ilivunja, kwa sababu kometi zilivunja dunia muda mrefu.
ref: Kuna uwezekano kwamba nyotamkia zilikuwa chanzo cha kusafirisha maji katika dunia, pamoja na vitu vilivyo na kaboni vinavyoweza kuunda protini na kusaidia uhai. Wanasayansi wanatumai kuelewa jinsi sayari huundwa, hasa jinsi Dunia ilivyoundwa, kwani nyotamkia ziligongana na Dunia kitambo.

src: While authorities are unsure of the credibility of the threat, the Maryland Transportaion Authority made the closure with the urging of the FBI. Dump trucks were used to block tube entrances and assistance of 80 police were on hand to direct motorists to detours. There were no heavy traffic delays reported on the beltway, the city's alternate route.
mt: Kutokana na hali ya usalama, Mamlaka ya Usafirishaji ya Maryland ilifanya kufungua kwa kudhibiti ya FBI. Gari za kubadilisha mchanga zilitumika kufunga kwa kuingia kwa mabwepaji. src: "The photographer was transported to Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he subsequently died. He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said ""[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."" Entertainment news website TMZ understands the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police stop before crossing the road and continuing, prompting the California Highway Patrol police officer conducting the traffic stop to order him back across, twice. According to police, the driver of the vehicle that hit the photographer is unlikely to face criminal charges."
mt: "Mwakilishi alitumwa kwenye Hospitali ya Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, ambapo alifariki baada ya kipindi cha muda. Alitajwa kuwa na umri wa miaka 20. Katika ripoti, Bieber alisema "Mimi sikuwa hapa na sikuwa na kujitolea katika ajali hii ya kudhalilishwa, lakini mawaidi na mahubiri yangu ni kwa familia ya mwenyeji." Habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za habari za hab
ref: Mpigaji picha alichukuliwa hadi Kituo cha Matibabu cha Ronald Reagan, ambako baadaye alifariki. Aliripotiwa kuwa katika miaka yake ya 20. Katika taarifa, Bierber alisema “Ingawa sikuwako au kuhusika na ajali hii mbaya moja kwa moja, mawazo na maombi yangu yako kwa familia ya muathiriwa.” Tovuti ya habari za burudani TMZ inaelewa mpiga picha alisimamisha gari katika upande mwingine wa Sepulveda Boulevard na akajaribu kupiga picha za kizuizi cha polisi kabla ya kuvuka barabara na kuendelea, akamfanya afisa wa polisi wa California Highway Patrol aliyekuwa akiendesha kizuizi kumwamrisha kurudi katika upande mwingine, mara mbili. Kwa mujibu wa polisi, dereva wa gari lililomgonga mpigaji picha huenda akakabiliwa na mashtaka ya jinai.

src: "Arias tested positive for a mild case of the virus, Presidential Minister Rodrigo Arias said. The president's condition is stable, though he will be isolated at home for several days. ""Apart from the fever and a sore throat, I feel well and in good shape to carry out my work by telecommuting. I expect to return to all my duties on Monday,"" Arias said in a statement."
mt: "Arias alitambuliwa kuwa na magonjwa ya virusi ya kawaida, Mwakilishi Mkuu wa Rais Rodrigo Arias alisema. Hali ya rais ni salama, lakini atakapokaa nyumbani kwa muda. ""Kisa cha kipinduzi na kipinduzi cha mdomo, nimekuwa salama na kinafanya kazi kwa kutumia mitandao ya kijamii. Ninamshauri kuendelea na kazi yangu kwa kipindi cha wiki tatu,"" Arias alisema katika taarifa."
ref: "Arias alipima chanya kwa kesi ndogo ya virusi, Waziri wa Rais Rodrigo Arias alisema. Hali ya rais ni thabiti, ingawa atatengwa nyumbani kwa siku kadhaa. ""Bali na joto na vidonda vya koo, nahisi vizuri na hali njema kuendelea na kazi yangu kwa mawasiliano ya simu. Natarajia kurudi katika majukumu yangu yote Jumatatu,” Arias alisema katika taarifa."

src: At its peak, Tropical Cyclone Gonu, named for a bag of palm leaves in the language of the Maldives, reached sustained winds of 240 kilometers an hour (149 miles per hour) . By early today, winds were around 83 km/h, and it was expect to keep weakening.
mt: Kwa kilele chake, Tropical Cyclone Gonu, jina lake lilijulikana kwa kufanikiwa kwa ruzuku za barabara za miaka 240 kilomita kwa saa (149 mila kwa saa). Kwa wakati wa awali wa siku ya leo, barabara zilikuwa kama 83 km/h, na ilikubaliwa kuendelea kupungua.
ref: Katika kilele chake, Kimbunga cha Kitropiki cha Gonu, kilichopatiwa jina la begi la majani ya mtende kwa lugha ya Maldivi, kililifikia pepo imara za kilomita 240 kwa saa (maili 149 kwa saa). Kufikia mapema leo, pepo zilikuwa za kilomita 83 kwa saa, na zilitarajiwa kuzidi kudhoofika.

src: Red tide is caused by a higher than normal concentration of Karenia brevis, a naturally-occurring single-celled marine organism. Natural factors can intersect to produce ideal conditions, allowing this algae to increase in number dramatically. The algae produces a neurotoxin that can disable nerves in both humans and fish. Fish often die because of the high concentrations of the toxin in the waters. Humans can be affected by breathing affected water taken into the air by wind and waves.
mt: Red tide inaweza kuchukuliwa kama kipindi cha kuzingira kwa Karenia brevis, seli moja ya bahari. Sababu za kawaida zinaweza kuzingira kwa sababu hii, kwa hiyo kubadilisha kiasi cha seli hii kwa kasi. Seli hii inaathiri seli za sarafu za binadamu na samaki. Samaki mara nyingi hupotea kwa sababu kiasi cha athari hii kwenye maji ni kubwa. Binadamu hupata athari kwa kuzunguka maji yaliyotengenezwa na anga na maji.
ref: Wimbi jekundu husababishwa na mkusanyiko mkubwa kuliko kawaida wa Karenia brevis, kiumbe asilia cha seli moja kinachopatikana baharini. Sababu asilia zinaweza kukutana na kutoa hali ifaayo, na kuruhusu mwani huu kuongezeka sana kwa idadi. Mwani huo hutoa sumu ya neva ambayo inaweza kulemaza neva katika binadamu na samaki. Mara nyingi samaki hufa kwa sababu ya viwango vikubwa vya sumu ndani ya maji. Wanadamu waweza kuathiriwa kwa kupumua maji yaliyoathirika yaliyopelekwa hewani na upepo na mawimbi.

src: "Felicia, once a Category 4 storm on the Saffir-Simpson Hurricane Scale, weakened to a tropical depression before dissipating Tuesday. Its remnants produced showers across most of the islands, though as of yet, no damage or flooding has been reported. The precipitation, reaching 6.34 inches at a gauge on Oahu, was described as ""beneficial"". Some of the rainfall was accompanied by thunderstorms and frequent lightning."
mt: "Felicia, kama upevu wa kategoria 4 kwenye ukubwa wa Bahari ya Saffir-Simpson, kulazimika kuwa upevu wa kipindi cha kawaida kabla ya kufutika Jumatatu. ref: Felicia, iliyokuwa kwa wakati mmoja dhoruba ya Kategoria ya 4kwenye kiwango cha Vimbunga cha Saffir- Simpson, ilidhoofika hadi unyongovu wa kitropiki kabla ya kufifia Jumanne. Mabaki yake yalitoa rasharasha katika visiwa vingi, ingawa kufikia sasa, hakuna uharibifu au mafuriko yaliyoripotiwa. Usafirishaji wa joto uliofikia inchi 6.34 kwenye geji katika Oahu, ulielezewa kuwa na “ faida”. Mvua kiasi iliandamana na ngurumo na radi za mara kwa mara.

src: Piquet Jr. crashed in the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix just after an early pit stop for Fernando Alonso, bringing out the safety car. As the cars ahead of Alonso went in for fuel under the safety car, he moved up the pack to take victory. Piquet Jr. was sacked after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.
mt: Piquet Jr. alilazimika kwenye 2008 Singapore Grand Prix kwa kufika kwenye barabara kuu baada ya kushindana kwa Fernando Alonso, kufanya kufuzu kwa gari la kuhudhuria. Kama gari zilizotangulika zilikuwa zinakwenda kwa mafuta chini ya gari la kufuzu, Alonso alikuwa akifika kwenye barabara kuu kwa kushinda. Piquet Jr. alitolewa baada ya 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.
ref: Piquet mdogo alianguka katika Grand Prix ya Singapori mara tu baada ya kituo cha mapema cha matengenezo kwa Fernando Alonso, na kuleta gari la usalama. Huku magari yaliyokuwa mbele ya Alonso yakiingia kuwekwa mafuta chini ya gari la usalama, alienda mbele yao kuchukua ushindi. Piquet Jr. alifutwa kazi baada ya kipindi cha 2009 cha Hungarian Grand Prix.

src: A study published on Thursday in the journal Science reported on formation of a new bird species on the Ecuadorean Galápagos Islands. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.
mt: Uchunguzi uliochapishwa Jumatatu katika gazeti Science uliripoti kuhusu ujenzi wa spishi mpya ya ndege katika kisiwa cha Galápagos cha Ecuador. Watafiti kutoka Chuo Kikuu cha Princeton nchini Marekani na Chuo Kikuu cha Uppsala nchini Uswizi waliripoti spishi mpya iliyotengenezwa katika miaka miwili, wakati huu ulivyo naaminiwa kwa muda zaidi, kutokana na kuzaliwa kati ya ndege za kawaida za Darwin, Geospiza fortes, na ndege za kawaida za kinywaji, Geospiza conirostris.
ref: Utafiti uliochapishwa Alhamisi katika jarida la Science uliripoti kuhusu kuundwa kwa spishi mpya ya ndege katika Visiwa vya Galapagos vya Kiekuado. Watafiti kutoka Chuo Kikuu cha Princeton katika Marekani na Chuo Kikuu cha Uppsala katika Uswidi waliripoti spishi hiyo mpya iligeuka katika vizazi viwili pekee, ingawa mchakato huu ulikuwa unaaminika kuchukua muda mrefu zaidi, kwa sababu ya kuzaana kati ya wenyeji shorewanda wa Darwin, Geospiza fortes , na wahamiaji shorewanda wa dungusi kakati, Geospiza conirostris.

src: The artistic event is also part of a campaign by the Bucharest City Hall that seeks to relaunch the image of the Romanian capital as a creative and colourful metropolis. The city will be the first in southeastern Europe to host CowParade, the world's largest public art event, between June and August this year.
mt: Ujumbe wa sanaa pia ni sehemu ya kampeni ya Makao Makuu ya Bukareste ambayo inawasilisha picha ya mji huo kama mji wenye ujuzi na wenye rangi. Bukareste itakuwa mji wa kwanza katika mashariki mwa Uropa kushika CowParade, ujumbe wa sanaa wa kujitegemea duniani, kati ya Juni na Agosti mwaka huu.
ref: Tukio hilo la kisanaa pia ni sehemu ya kampeni ya Bucharest City Hall ambayo ina lengo la kuzindua taswira ya mji huo mkuu wa Romania kama jiji bunifu la kusisimua. Jiji litakuwa la kwanza katika Uropa kusini mashariki kuwa mwenyeji wa CowParade, tukio kubwa zaidi duniani la umma la sanaa, katikati mwa Juni na Agosti mwaka huu.

src: The aircraft had been headed to Irkutsk and was being operated by interior troops. An inquiry was established to investigate. The Il-76 has been a major component of both the Russian and Soviet military since the 1970s, and had already seen a serious accident in Russia last month. On October 7 an engine separated on takeoff, without injuries. Russia briefly grounded Il-76s after that accident.

src: Before The Simpsons Simon had worked on several shows in various positions. During the 1980s he worked on shows such as Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracy Ullman Show. In 1989 he helped create The Simpsons with Brooks and Groening, and was responsible for hiring the show's first writing team. Despite leaving the show in 1993 he kept the title of executive producer, and continued to receive tens of millions of dollars every season in royalties.
mt: Kabla ya The Simpsons Simon alifanya kazi katika vitabu mbalimbali katika nafasi mbalimbali. Katika miaka ya 1980 alifanya kazi katika vitabu kama vile Taxi, Cheers, na The Tracy Ullman Show. Mwaka 1989 alifanya kazi pamoja na Brooks na Groening katika kujenga The Simpsons, na alikuwa mwenye kujitegemea kwa kufanya kazi kwa timu ya kwanza ya kuchapisha. Hadi 1993 alikuwa mwenye kujitegemea kwa kufanya kazi, na alikuwa akipata dola milioni kadhaa kila mwaka katika mapato ya kibinafsi.
ref: Kabla ya The Simpsons Simon alikuwa amefanyia kazi maonyesho kadhaa katika nafasi mbalimbali. Katika miaka ya 1980 alishughulikia vipindi kama vile Taxi, Cheers, na Onyesho la Tracy Ullman. Mnamo 1989 alisaidia kuunda The Simpsons Pamoja na Brooks na Groening, na ndiye aliyehusika katika kuajiri timu ya kwanza ya uandishi ya kipindi. Licha ya kutoka kwenye onyesho mwaka wa 1993 alihifadhi cheo cha mtendaji mzalishaji, na kuendelea kupokea makumi ya mamilioni ya dola kwa kila msimu wa mrahaba.

src: Fluke wrote that the efforts by some to drown out women from speaking out about women’s health were unsuccessful. She came to this conclusion due to the multitude of positive comments and encouragement sent to her by both female and male individuals urging that contraception medication be considered a medical necessity.
mt: Fluke alieleza kwamba jitihada za wengine kuwadunga wanawake kutoka kwenye kutoa mawazo kuhusu afya ya wanawake zilikuwa isivyo. Alifika kwenye hali hii kutokana na uzoefu wake wa kujadili na wanaume na wanawake wengi wakifurahia na kuwahudumia kwa kujadili dawa za uzazi kuwa dhamana ya kijamii.
ref: Fluke aliandika kwamba juhudi za baadhi kuzamisha wanawake wasizungumze kuhusu uzima wa wanawake hazikufaulu. Alifikia hitimisho hili kutokana na wingi wa maoni chanya na kutiwa moyo kwake na wake kwa waume waliohimiza kuwa matibabu ya uzazi yachukuliwe kuwa mahitaji muhimu ya kimatibabu.

src: """It's going to behave like water. It's transparent just the way water is. So if you were standing by the shoreline, you would be able to see down to whatever pebbles or gunk that was on the bottom. As far as we know, there is only one planetary body that displays more dynamism than Titan, and its name is Earth,"" added Stofan."
mt: """Inaweza kuwa na tabia ya maji. Inaonekana kama maji. Kama unakaa karibu na pwani, utaweza kuona chini kwa kila kijivu au kifaa cha kawaida ambacho kipo chini. Kama tunavyojua, kuna pekee kwa mababu ya dunia ambayo ina tabia ya kudumu zaidi kuliko Titan, na jina lake ni Dunia,"" alisema Stofan."
ref: """Itakuwa na tabia kama za maji. Ni wazi kama vile maji yalivyo. Kwa hivyo kama ungesimama kwenye ukingo wa bahari, ungeweza kuona hadi changarawe na taka zilizo chini. Kadiri sisi tunavyojua, kuna chombo kimoja cha sayari ambacho huonyesha nguvu nyingi kuliko Titani, na jina lake ni Dunia,” aliongeza Stofan."

As far as we know, there is only one planetary body that displays more dynamism than Titan, and its name is Earth,"" added Stofan."

Kadiri sisi tunavyojua, kuna chombo kimoja cha sayari ambacho huonyesha nguvu nyingi kuliko Titani, na jina lake ni Dunia,” aliongeza Stofan."

src: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement. . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside. The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds. Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features. The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.
mt: Hii pia inashughulikia kwamba kama wengi wanasema, wadudu wengine wakubwa wana rangi, lakini pia inawapa ufumbuzi wa rangi na uainishaji wa rangi. Wanasayansi wanawasema rangi yake ilikuwa kijivu chafu juu na rangi ya kijivu au rangi ya kijani chafu chini. Utafiti huu pia unawapa ufumbuzi wa maendeleo ya rangi katika wadudu wengine wakubwa. Kwa sababu rangi hizi hazina mabasi, lakini zina nafasi za rangi na nafasi za rangi, wanasayansi wanasema mabasi yalikuwa yamejengewa baadaye, lakini rangi zilikuwa zimejengewa. Wanasayansi wanasema hii ni rangi ya kijani chafu ya wakati wa kujifungua, na si rangi ya kijani chafu ya wakati wa kujifungua.
ref: Hii haithibitishi tu kuwa baadhi ya dinosaria walikuwa na manyoya, nadharia ambayo tayari imezagaa, bali pia inatoa maelezo ambayo kijumla visukuku haviwezi, kama vile rangi na mpangilio wa pande-tatu. . Wanasayansi wanasema manyoya ya mnyama huyu yalikuwa ya rangi ya kahawia-nyekundu upande wa juu na hafifu au rangi ya karotini upande wa chini. Utambuzi huo pia unatoa ufahamu wa mageuko ya manyoya katika ndege. Kwa sababu manyoya ya dinosau hayana chimbuko uliyostawishwa vizuri, inayoitwa rachi, lakini huwa na sifa zingine za manyoya — barbu na barbule — watafiti waligundua rachi labda ni maendeleo ya baadaye ya uvumbuzi kuliko sifa hizi nyingine. Muundo wa manyoya unaonyesha kwamba hayakutumika katika kupeperuka bali yalitumiwa kudhibiti joto au uonyesho. Watafiti walipendekeza kwamba, ingawa huu ni mkia wa dinosauri mchanga, sampuli inaonyesha manyoya ya utu uzima na si manyoya laini ya ndani ya kifaranga. Watafiti walipendekeza kwamba, hata kama huu ni mkia wa dinosau mdogo, sampuli hiyo inaonyesha manyoya ya ukubwa na si manyoya ya kifaranga mdogo.

src: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection. One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death. In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.
mt: Kabla ya sasa, hakuna dawa iliyotambuliwa kwa kuchapisha saratani ya Ebola. Mmoja kati ya dawa za kujitafiti, ZMapp, ilikuwa inaonekana kuwa inafaa kwa kutibu ugonjwa huu, lakini utafiti wa rasmi ulisema inafaa zaidi kwa kutibu kifo kuliko kutafuta kifo. Katika PALM trial, ZMapp ilikuwa inatumika kama mifano, kwa maana wanasayansi walikuwa wakitumia kama mifano na kubadilisha dawa tatu nyingine na dawa moja kwa dawa hiyo.
ref: Huku chanjo moja ya majaribio ikionekana kupunguza vifo kutokana na Ebola, hadi kufikia sasa, hakuna dawa zimeonyeshwa dhahiri kufaa kutibu maambukizo yaliyoko. Kinywaji kimoja cha kingamwili, ZMapp, hapo awali kilionyesha ahadi uwanjani, lakini tafiti rasmi zilionyesha kilikuwa na faida kidogo kuliko ilivyotafutwa katika kuzuia kifo. Katika jaribio la PALM, Zmapp ilitumika kama kidhibiti, kumaanisha wanasayansi waliitumia kama msingi na kulinganisha matibabu mengine matatu nayo.

src: On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each. Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.
mt: Jumatano, wanasayansi kutoka Shule ya Daktari ya Stanford ya Uhispania wametoa taarifa juu ya njia mpya ya kujadiliana ambayo inaweza kubadilisha seli kwa aina: chipi kidogo ya kuchapisha ambayo inaweza kutengenezwa kwa njia ya printer za kawaida za kuchapisha kwa kujenga kwa kiasi cha senti moja kwa kila U.S. senti. Wanasayansi wanasema hii inaweza kutoa kujadiliana bila kujibu kwa wale wanaoathirika na magonjwa kama vile kansa ya mifupa, TB, HIV na malaria katika nchi zinazozalipika, ambapo mivulio ya magonjwa kama kansa ya mifupa inaweza kuwa nusu ya nchi zinazozalipika.
ref: Mnamo Jumatatu, wanasayansi kutoka Shule ya Tiba ya Chuo Kikuu cha Stanford walitangaza uvumbuzi wa kifaa kipya cha utambuzi ambacho kinaweza kupanga seli kwa aina: kidude kidogo kinachoweza kuchapwa, na ambacho kinaweza kutengenezwa kwa kutumia printa ya kawaida ya kupuliza rangi, yawezekana kwa takribani senti moja ya Marekani kwa kila moja. Watafiti wakuu wanasema hili linaweza kuleta ugunduzi wa mapema wa saratani, kifua kikuu, ukimwi na malaria kwa wagonjwa katika nchi zenye mapato ya chini, ambapo viwango vya kupona kwa magonjwa kama vile saratani ya matiti vinaweza kuwa nusu ya vile vya nchi tajiri.

src: On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each. Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.
mt: Jumatano, wanasayansi kutoka Shule ya Daktari ya Stanford ya Uhispania wametoa taarifa juu ya njia mpya ya kujadiliana ambayo inaweza kubadilisha seli kwa aina: chipi kidogo ya kuchapisha ambayo inaweza kutengenezwa kwa njia ya printer za kawaida za kuchapisha kwa kujenga kwa kiasi cha senti moja kwa kila U.S. senti. Watafiti wakuu wanasema hili linaweza kuleta ugunduzi wa mapema wa saratani, kifua kikuu, ukimwi na malaria kwa wagonjwa katika nchi zenye mapato ya chini, ambapo viwango vya kupona kwa magonjwa kama vile saratani ya matiti vinaweza kuwa nusu ya vile vya nchi tajiri.

src: Scientists have discovered landforms littered across the moon's surface called lobate scarps that have apparently resulted from the moon's shrinking very slowly. These scarps were found all over the moon and appear to be minimally weathered, indicating that the geologic events that created them were fairly recent. This theory contradicts the claim that the moon is completely devoid of geologic activity.
mt: Wanasayansi wamejifunza mifupa ya nchi zilizotabasamu kote juu ya nyota ya mwezi, ambazo zimeelezwa kuwa zimefanya kazi kwa kujitolea. Mifupa hii zimejulikana kote juu ya mwezi na zimeonekana kuwa zimekabili kwa hali ya hewa, ina maana kwamba mifumo ya kigeografia ambayo zimefanya kazi zimekuwa za kasi. Hali hii inaonesha kwamba mifumo ya kigeografia ya mwezi yamekuwa za kasi.
ref: Wanasayansi wamegundua miundo ya ardhi iliyojaa juu ya mwezi inayoitwa lobate scarps ambayo inaonekana imetokana na kunywea kwa mwezi polepole sana. Chakavu hizi zilipatikana kote kwenye mwezi na kuonekana kumomonyoka kidogo,kuashiria kwamba matukio ya kijiolojia ambayo yaliziunda yalikuwa ya hivi karibuni. Nadharia hii inapinga dai kwamba mwezi hauna shughuli za kijiolojia kamwe.

src: "Adekoya has since been in Edinburgh Sheriff Court charged with murdering her son. She is in custody pending indictment and trial, but any eyewitness evidence may be tainted because her image has been widely published. This is common practice elsewhere in the UK but Scottish justice works differently and courts have viewed publication of photos as potentially prejudicial. Professor Pamela Ferguson of the University of Dundee notes ""journalists do seem to be walking a dangerous line if publishing photos etc of suspects."" Crown Office, which is in overall charge of prosecutions, has indicated to journalists that no further comment will be made at least until indictment."
mt: "Adekoya ameendelea kufika mahakama ya Edinburgh kwa kujaribu kumuua mtoto wake. Anasimama kwenye mahakama kwa kujaribu kufanyika kwa kesi na kesi, lakini taarifa za wakati wa kesi zinaweza kuwa na tamaa kwa sababu picha zake zimeelezwa kwa wingi. Hii ni mchezo wa kawaida katika nchi nyingine katika Uingereza, lakini ushauri wa mahakama ya Skotlani unaelekezwa kwa wachaguzi kwamba habari zinazotolewa kuhusu wakati wa kesi zinaweza kuwa na tamaa. Ofisi ya Mamlaka, ambayo inaendesha kesi, imeeleza kwa wachaguzi kwamba habari zinazotolewa kuhusu kesi zinaweza kufanyika kwa kesi na kesi, lakini kesi zinazotolewa kuhusu kesi zinaweza kufanyika kwa kesi na kesi."
ref: "Tangu wakati huo Adekoya amekuwa katika Mahakama ya Edinburg Sheriff kwa mashtaka ya kumuua mwanaye. Yuko korokoroni akisubiri mashtaka na kesi, lakini ushahidi wowote wa walioshuhudia huenda ukaathirika vibaya kwa sababu picha yake imechapishwa sana mahali kwingi. Hii ni desturi kwingineko Uingereza lakini haki ya Kiskoti hufanya kazi kwa njia tofauti na mahakama zimeangalia uchapishaji wa picha kama wenye ubaguzi. Profesa Pamela Ferguson wa Chuo Kikuu cha Dundee anasema ""wanahabari wanaonekana kujihatarisha kwa kuchapisha picha n.k. za watuhumiwa."" Crown Office, ambayo husimamia mashtaka, imeashiria kwa wanahabari kwamba hakuna maoni ya ziada yatakayotolewa angalau hadi mashtaka yafanyike."

src: In addition to the crushing ice, extreme weather conditions have been hampering rescue efforts. Pittman suggested that conditions wouldn't improve until sometime next week. The amount and thickness of the pack ice, according to Pittman, is the worst it has been for sealers in the past 15 years.
mt: Kutoka kwa barabara za barafu, hali ya hewa ya kawaida imekuwa ikisababisha kushindwa kwa majungu ya kupona. Pittman alisema hali hii haingekuwa inabadilika hadi wakati wa wiki ijayo. Jumla na urefu wa barafu ya kawaida, kulinganisha na Pittman, ni kibaya zaidi kwa wale wanaoendesha wanyama wakati wa miaka 15.
ref: Pamoja na barafu iliyoponda, hali kali za hewa zimekuwa zikizuia juhudi za uokoaji. Pittman alipendekeza kwamba hali hazingeboreka hadi wakati fulani wiki ijayo. Kiasi na unene wa tando hilo la barafu, kulingana na Pittman, ndicho kibaya zaidi ambacho kimewahi kuwa kwa wawindaji kwa miaka 15 iliyopita.

src: "Roberts flatly refused to say about when he believes life begins, an important question when considering the ethics of abortion, saying that it would be unethical to comment on the specifics of likely cases. He did, however, reiterate his earlier statement that Roe v. Wade was the ""settled law of the land"", emphasizing the importance of consistent Supreme Court rulings. He also confirmed that he believed in the implied right to privacy which the Roe decision depended upon."
mt: "Roberts kwa kawaida hakupendekeza wakati anamwamini kuanzia nini, suala muhimu wakati wa kuelewa uhalisia wa kisheria wa kuua, akisema kwamba itakuwa uhalisia kushindwa kueleza kuhusu mifano ya kawaida. Alisema tena kwamba Roe v. Wade ilikuwa sheria ya kawaida ya nchi, akifurahia umuhimu wa maelezo ya mahakama ya juu. Pia alipendekeza kwamba alimwamini haki ya kujitahidi ambayo mshtuko wa Roe ulidhamiria."
ref: "Roberts alikataa kabisa kusema ni lini anaamini uhai huanza, swali muhimu inapozingatiwa maadili ya uavyaji mimba, akisema kwamba ingekuwa kinyume na maadili kutoa maoni kuhusu mambo maalum ya matukio ambayo yanawezekana. Hata hivyo, alirudia tamko lake la awali kwamba Roe dhidi ya Wade ilikuwa ""sheria iliyoafikiwa ya nchi"", akisisitiza umuhimu wa maamuzi thabiti ya Mahakama Kuu. Alithibitisha pia kuwa aliamini katika haki iliyodokezwa ya faragha ambayo uamuzi wa Roe ulitegemea."

src: At exactly 8:46 a.m. a hush fell across the city, marking the exact moment the first jet struck its target. Two beams of light have been rigged up to point skywards overnight. Construction is ongoing for five new skyscrapers at the site, with a transportation center and memorial park in the middle.
mt: Kwa saa ya 8:46 am, kila mahali katika mji huu, kuna hush, kama kile ambacho kiliambukiza kwa kwanza jeti kwa kile kilichokuwa kitakikwenda. Mabaki ya mawimbi mawili yamejengwa kwa kuchipua kwa kufikia anga. Kazi inakaribishwa kwa kujenga mabwawa mawili ya mizani katika eneo hilo, na mifumo ya usafirishaji na parki ya kumbukumbu katika kati.
ref: Saa 8:46 kamili, unyamavu ulitanda mjini kote, kuashiria wakati hasa ambapo ndege ya jeti ilipiga lengo. Miali miwili ya mwanga imeundwa ili kuelekea juu usiku kucha. Ujenzi wa ghorofa tano mpya unaendelea katika eneo, na kituo cha usafirishaji na mbuga ya ukumbusho zikiwa katikati.

src: "All of the cave entrances, which were named ""The Seven Sisters"", are at least 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet) in diameter. Infrared images show that the temperature variations from night and day show that they are likely caves. ""They are cooler than the surrounding surface in the day and warmer at night. Their thermal behavior is not as steady as large caves on Earth that often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but it is consistent with these being deep holes in the ground,"" said Glen Cushing of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and of Northern Arizona University located in Flagstaff, Arizona."
mt: "Zuio zote za kuingia kwa kisi, ambazo ziliitwa "The Seven Sisters", zimekuwa za kina 100 hadi 250 mita (328 hadi 820 futi) kwa ukubwa. Picha za infrared zinaonyesha kuwa vifungo vya kasi hivyo vimekuwa vya kina kiasi kwamba viko na umuhimu. "Vivyo hivyo vimekuwa vya kina kiasi kwamba viko na umuhimu. ref: "Milango yote ya pango, iliyopewa jina ""Dada Saba"", ina kipenyo cha angalau mita 100 hadi 250 (futi 328 hadi 820). Picha za miale isiyoonekana zinaonyesha kwamba utofauti wa joto kati ya usiku na mchana unaonyesha kwamba huenda ni mapango. ""Ni baridi kuliko maeneo ya karibu katika mchana na ni ya joto zaidi katika usiku. Tabia yazo ya kijoto si thabiti kama mapango makubwa katika Dunia ambayo mara nyingi hudumisha halijoto sawa kwa kadiri fulani, lakini inapatana nazo kuwa mashimo marefu ardhini,"" alisema Glen Cushing wa Timu ya Falakiolojia ya Utafiti wa Jiolojia wa Marekani (USGS) na wa Chuo Kikuu cha Arizona Kaskazini kilichoko Flagstaff, Arizona."

src: The man allegedly drove a three-wheeled vehicle armed with explosives into a crowd. The man suspected of detonating the bomb was detained, after sustaining injuries from the blast. His name is still unknown to authorities, although they do know he is a member of the Uighur ethnic group.
mt: Kijana alidhaniwa ameleta gari la tatu linaloendana na bomba kwenye kundi. Kijana aliyedhaniwa ameleta bomba alidhiniwa, baada ya kupata majeraha kutokana na bomba. Jina lake bado haujajulikana kwa wakati huu, ingawa wanasayansi wanajua kwamba ni mmoja wa kabila la Uighur.
ref: Inasemekana mwanamume huyo aliendesha gari lenye magurudumu matatu lililokuwa na vilipuzi kwenye umati. Mwanamume ambaye alishukiwa kulipua bomu alizuiliwa, baada ya kupata majeraha kutokana na mlipuko. Jina lake bado halijulikani kwa mamlaka, ingawa wanajua yeye ni memba wa kikundi cha kikabila cha Uighur.

src: South Africa have defeated the All Blacks (New Zealand) in a rugby union Tri Nations match at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa. The final score was a one-point victory, 21 to 20, ending the All Blacks' 15 game winning streak. For the Springboks, it ended a five-match losing streak. It was the final match for the All Blacks, who had already won the trophy two weeks ago. The final match of the series will take place at Ellis Park in Johannesburg next week, when the Springboks play Australia.
mt: Ufaransa wameona kifungo cha kwanza kwa kushinda timu ya New Zealand (Umoja wa Afrika) katika mchezo wa mpira wa kikapu wa Tri Nations katika uwanja wa Royal Bafokeng katika mji wa Rustenburg, Ufaransa. Kwa kifungo cha kwanza, 21 kwa 20, kufuta kifungo cha kushinda kwa kipindi cha 15 mchezo, kwa All Blacks. Kwa Springboks, kufuta kifungo cha kushinda kwa kipindi cha 5 mchezo. Kwa All Blacks, kufuta mchezo wa kwanza, waliwahi kushinda taji hilo wiki mbili zilizopita. Mchezo wa mwisho wa mfululizo huo utakapotokea katika uwanja wa Ellis Park katika mji wa Johannesburg wiki ijayo, wakati Springboks watacheza na Australia.
ref: Afrika Kusini wamewashinda All Blacks (Nyuzilandi) katika mechi ya muungano wa raga ya Mataifa Matatu katika Uwanja wa Royal Bafokeng katika Rustenburg, Afrika Kusini. Alama ya mwisho ilikuwa ushindi wa nukta moja, 21 hadi 20, na kumaliza mfuo wa ushindi wa michezo wa Weusi Wote. Kwa Springboksi, iliishia kuwa mfuo wa kupoteza mechi-tano Ilikuwa mechi ya mwisho kwa All Blacks, ambao tayari walikuwa wameshinda kombe wiki mbili zilizopita. Mechi ya mwisho ya msururu itafanyika katika Ellis Park mjini Johannesburg wiki ijayo, wakati Springboks watakapocheza dhidi ya Australia.

src: South Africa have defeated the All Blacks (New Zealand) in a rugby union Tri Nations match at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa. The final score was a one-point victory, 21 to 20, ending the All Blacks' 15 game winning streak. For the Springboks, it ended a five-match losing streak. It was the final match for the All Blacks, who had already won the trophy two weeks ago. The final match of the series will take place at Ellis Park in Johannesburg next week, when the Springboks play Australia.
mt: Ufaransa wameona kifungo cha kwanza kwa kushinda timu ya New Zealand (Umoja wa Afrika) katika mchezo wa mpira wa kikapu wa Tri Nations katika uwanja wa Royal Bafokeng katika mji wa Rustenburg, Ufaransa. Kwa kifungo cha kwanza, 21 kwa 20, kufuta kifungo cha kushinda kwa kipindi cha 15 mchezo, kwa All Blacks. Kwa Springboks, kufuta kifungo cha kushinda kwa kipindi cha 5 mchezo. Kwa All Blacks, kufuta mchezo wa kwanza, waliwahi kushinda taji hilo wiki mbili zilizopita. Mchezo wa mwisho wa mfululizo huo utakapotokea katika uwanja wa Ellis Park katika mji wa Johannesburg wiki ijayo, wakati Springboks watacheza na Australia.
ref: Afrika Kusini wamewashinda All Blacks (Nyuzilandi) katika mechi ya muungano wa raga ya Mataifa Matatu katika Uwanja wa Royal Bafokeng katika Rustenburg, Afrika Kusini. Alama ya mwisho ilikuwa ushindi wa nukta moja, 21 hadi 20, na kumaliza mfuo wa ushindi wa michezo wa Weusi Wote. Kwa Springboksi, iliishia kuwa mfuo wa kupoteza mechi-tano Ilikuwa mechi ya mwisho kwa All Blacks, ambao tayari walikuwa wameshinda kombe wiki mbili zilizopita. Mechi ya mwisho ya msururu itafanyika katika Ellis Park mjini Johannesburg wiki ijayo, wakati Springboks watakapocheza dhidi ya Australia.

src: The station maintained its attitude, despite the loss of a gyroscope earlier in the space station mission, until the end of the spacewalk. Chiao and Sharipov reported being a safe distance from the attitude adjustment thrusters. Russian ground control activated the jets and normal attitude of the station was regained.
mt: Kituo hicho kilibaki na hali yake, hata baada ya kupotea kwa gyroscopes kwenye misaada ya anga, hadi mwisho wa kazi ya anga. Chiao na Sharipov walirekodi kuwa wamepata nafasi ya kutoshelewa kutoka kwa mabavu ya hali ya anga. Kitaifa kwa kuzingatia mabavu ya hali ya anga ya Russia, mabavu hayo yalitumika na hali ya anga ya kituo hicho ilipata hali yake.
ref: Kituo kilidumisha mtazamo wake, licha ya upotezaji wa gurudumu tuzi mapema kwenye misheni ya kituo cha angani, hadi mwisho wa matembezi ya angani. Chiao na Sharipov waliripoti walikuwa katika umbali salama kutoka kwenye vifaa vya kurushia vya kurekebisha kimo. Udhibiti wa ardhi wa Urusi uliamsha jeti na mtazamo wa kawaida wa kituo ulipatikana tena.

src: The case was prosecuted in Virginia because it is the home to the leading internet service provider AOL, the company who instigated the charges. This is the first time a conviction has been gained using the legislation enacted in 2003 to curb bulk e-mail, aka spam, from unsolicited distribution into users mailboxes.
mt: Hatua hii ilikuwa inakabidhiwa katika Virginia kwa sababu ni nchi ya kwanza ya huduma za interneti kwa watumiaji, AOL, kampuni ambayo ilisababisha hatua hizo. Hii ni hatua ya kwanza ambayo imepata kwa kushirikiana na sheria iliyotolewa mwaka 2003 ili kupunguza barua za kawaida, aka spam, kutoka kwa usajili kutoka kwa watumiaji.
ref: Kesi hiyo ilishtakiwa huko Virginia kwa sababu ni nyumbani kwa mtoaji mkuu wa huduma ya intaneti AOL, kampuni iliyoanzisha mashtaka hayo. Hii ndio mara ya kwanza hukumu imepatikana kwa kutumia sheria iliyopitishwa mwaka wa 2003 ili kupunguza barua-pepe nyingi yaani taka kutoka kwa wasambazaji wasioombwa hadi kwenye masanduku ya watumiaji.
