src: 28-year-old Vidal had joined Barça three seasons ago, from Sevilla. Since moving to the Catalan-capital, Vidal had played 49 games for the club.
mt: Vidal alikuwa na umri wa miaka 28, alikuwa amejiunga na Barça kwa majonzi tatu, kutoka Sevilla. Tangu kufika katika mji wa Barcelona, Vidal alikuwa ameshinda 49 mechi kwa klabu hiyo.
ref: Vidal mwenye umri wa miaka 28 alikuwa amejiunga na Barca misimu mitatu iliyopita kutoka Sevilla. Tangu kuhamia katika mji mkuu wa Catalan, Vidal alikuwa amechezea klabu yake michezo 49.

src: Jarque was practicing during pre-season training at Coverciano in Italy earlier in the day. He was staying in the team hotel ahead of a match planned for Sunday against Bolonia. He was staying in the team hotel ahead of a match planned for Sunday against Bolonia.

src: No tsunami warning has been issued, and according to the Jakarta geophysics agency, no tsunami warning will be issued because the quake did not meet the magnitude 6.5 requirement. Despite there being no tsunami threat, residents started to panic and began to leave their businesses and homes.
mt: Hakuna ripoti ya hatari ya tsunami, na kulinganisha ofisi ya geofizik ya Jakarta, hakuna ripoti ya hatari ya tsunami kwa sababu magonjwa ya 6.5 siyo ya kutosha. Hata hivyo, wakazi wakapata hofu na kuanza kuacha biashara na nyumba zao.
ref: Hakuna ilani ya tsunami iliyotolewa, na kulingana na uwakala wa jeofizikia wa Jakarta, hakuna ilani ya tsunami itakayotolewa kwani mtetemeko haukufikia ukubwa unaohitajika wa 6.5. Licha ya kutokuwa na tishio la tsunami, wakazi walianza kuwa na hofu na wakaanza kuacha biashara na nyumba zao.

src: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else. The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow. The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.
mt: Wanafunzi waliangalia jinsi inavyofanya kazi Mithani kama vile nyota nyingine: Uvumbuzi wao ulitambulisha kwamba kila nyota katika mfumo huu inavyofanya kazi kwa mifumo yasiyotofautiana: Uvumbuzi huo ulitambulisha kwamba kazi ya nyota zote katika mfumo huo inatokana na uwezo wao, nafasi yao, na hakuna kitu kingine. Uwezo na nafasi zinatumika pamoja kwa kueleza kipimo cha Rossby, ambacho kinahusiana na mawimbi ya plasma. Kipimo cha Rossby kinachokwambia kiasi cha kawaida kwa nyota kuhusu mabadiliko ya magenzi.
ref: Walipata kuwa Jua lilifanya kazi kwa kanuni msingi sawa na za nyota nyingine: Shuguli za nyota zote kwenye mfumo zilipatikana kuendeshwa na mng'ao wao, mzunguko wao na hakuna jingine. Mng'ao na mzunguko hutumika pamoja ili kuamua namba ya Rossby ya nyota, ambayo inahusiana na mtiririko wa utegili. Jinsi idadi ya Rossby inavyokuwa ndogo, ndivyo nyota zinapungua kuwa wa utendaji kwa kuzingatia mabadiliko ya sumaku.

src: Out of 1,400 people polled prior to the 2010 federal election, those who oppose Australia becoming a republic grew by 8 per cent since 2008. Caretaker Prime Minister Julia Gillard claimed during the campaign of the 2010 federal election that she believed Australia should become a republic at the end of Queen Elizabeth II's reign. 34 per cent of those in the poll share this view, wanting Queen Elizabeth II to be Australia's last monarch. At the extremes of the poll, 29 per cent of those surveyed believe Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, while 31 per cent believe Australia should never become a republic.
mt: Kati ya watu 1,400 waliochunguzwa kabla ya uchaguzi wa uchaguzi wa kanda ya 2010, wale wanaoona Australia kuwa jamhuri kwa sasa yalikuwa na kasi ya 8% tangu 2008. Waziri Mkuu wa kawaida Julia Gillard alisema katika kampeni ya uchaguzi wa kanda ya 2010 kwamba aliona Australia kuwa jamhuri wakati wa mwisho wa ufalme wa Elizabeth II. 34% ya wale waliochunguzwa wanaona Elizabeth II kuwa mfalme wa mwisho wa Australia. Kati ya vikwazo vya chaguo, 29% ya wale waliochunguzwa wanavyoona Australia kuwa jamhuri wakati wa mwisho wa Elizabeth II, wakati 31% wanavyoona Australia kuwa jamhuri wakati wa mwisho wa Elizabeth II.
ref: Kwa watu 1,400 waliopiga kura ya maoni kabla ya uchaguzi wa 2010 wa shirikisho, wale wanaopinga Australia kuwa jamhuri waliongezeka kwa asilimia 8 tangu mwaka wa 2008. Kaimu Waziri Mkuu Julia Gillard alidai wakati wa kampeni ya uchaguzi wa ushirika wa 2010 kwamba aliamini Australia inafaa kuwa jamhuri mwishoni mwa utawala wa Malkia Elizabeth II. Asilimia 34 ya walio kwenye uchunguzi wanashiriki maoni haya, kumtaka Malkia Elizabeth wa II awe malikia wa mwisho wa Australia. Katika wingi wa kura, asilimia 29 ya wale waliofanyiwa utafiti wanaamini Australia inapaswa kuwa jamhuri haraka iwezekanavyo, huku asilimia 31 wakiamini Australia haipaswi kamwe kuwa jamhuri.

src: Leslie Aun, a spokesperson for the Komen Foundation, said the organization adopted a new rule that does not allow grants or funding to be awarded to organizations that are under legal investigation. Komen's policy disqualified Planned Parenthood due to a pending investigation on how Planned Parenthood spends and reports its money that is being conducted by Representative Cliff Stearns. Stearns is investigating whether taxes are used to fund abortions through Planned Parenthood in his role as chairman of the Oversight and Investigations Subcommittee, which is under the umbrella of the House Energy and Commerce Committee.
mt: Leslie Aun, mhariri wa Komen Foundation, alisema taasisi hiyo iliamua mabadiliko ya kisheria ambayo haina haki ya kuhakikisha kwa taasisi zinazopewa mapato au ufadhili kwa taasisi zinazozingatia sheria. Komen's policy ilisababisha kufuzu kwa Planned Parenthood kutokana na uchunguzi ulioendelea kuhusu jinsi Planned Parenthood inavyotumia na kutoa mapato yake ambao ulifanywa na Mheshimiwa Cliff Stearns. Stearns anavyofanya uchunguzi kuhusu jinsi kodi zinavyotumika kwa aboreshaji kwa Planned Parenthood katika nafasi yake kama mwenyekiti wa Kamati ya Uchunguzi na Utafiti, ambayo ni chini ya Kamati ya Ushahidi na Utafiti, ambayo ni chini ya Kamati ya Ushahidi na Utafiti, ambayo ni chini ya Kamati ya Ushahidi na Utafiti, ambayo ni chini ya Kamati ya Ushahidi na Utafiti, ambayo ni chini ya Kamati ya Ushahidi na Utafiti, ambayo ni chini ya Kamati ya Ushahidi na Utafiti, ambayo ni chini ya Kamati ya Ushahidi na Utafiti, ambayo ni chini ya Kamati ya Ushahidi na Utafiti, ambayo ni chini ya Kamati ya Ushahidi na Utafiti, ambayo ni chini ya Kamati ya Ushahidi na Utafiti, ambayo ni chini ya Kamati ya Ushahidi na Utafiti, ambayo ni chini ya Kamati ya Ushahidi na Utafiti, ambayo ni chini ya Kamati ya Ushahidi na Utafiti, ambayo ni chini ya Kamati ya Ushahidi na Utafiti, ambayo ni chini ya Kamati ya Ushahidi na Utafiti, ambayo ni chini ya Kamati ya Ushahidi na Utafiti, ambayo ni
ref: Leslie Aun, msemaji wa Shirika la Komen, alisema kuwa shirika hilo lilipitisha sheria mpya ambayo hairuhusu ruzuku au ufadhili kutolewa kwa mashirika ambayo yanafanyiwa upelelezi wa kisheria. Sera ya Komen ilisitisha Planned Parenthood kwa sababu ya uchunguzi unaosubiri jinsi Planned Parenthood hutumia na kuripoti pesa zake ambao unaongozwa na Mwakilishi Cliff Stearns. Stearns anapepeleza kama ushuru hutumika katika utoaji wa mimba kupitia uzazi uliopangwa katika jukumu lake kama mwenyekiti wa Usimamizi na Upelelezi kwenye kamati ndogo, ambayo iko chini ya kamati ya nyumba, nishati na biashara.

src: "The Madhya Pradesh Police recovered the stolen laptop and mobile phone. Deputy Inspector General D K Arya said, ""We have arrested five persons who raped the Swiss woman and recovered her mobile and laptop"". The accused are named as Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar and Vishnu Kanjar. Police superintendent Chandra Shekhar Solanki said the accused appeared in court with covered faces."
mt: "Polisi wa Madhya Pradesh waliweka laptopi iliyopotea na simu ya kawaida. Mkuu wa Polisi D K Arya alisema, ""Tumeipata wale wanao kufanya kosa kwa mwanamke kutoka Uswisi na kuweka simu yake na laptopi yake. Mtu mmoja aliyekuwa na muda wa kufanya kosa alikuwa Baba Kanjar, mwingine alikuwa Bhutha Kanjar, mwingine alikuwa Rampro Kanjar, mwingine alikuwa Gaza Kanjar na mwingine alikuwa Vishnu Kanjar. Mkuu wa Polisi Chandra Shekhar Solanki alisema wale wanao kufanya kosa walikuwa na wimbi wao wote."
ref: "Polisi wa Madhya Pradesh walikipata kipakatalishi na simu ya rununu iliyoibwa. Naibu Inspekta Jenerali D K Arya alisema, ""tumewakamata watu watano waliomnajisi mwanamke huyo Mswisi na tukapata rununu na kompyuta ndogo yake."" Washtakiwa wanatajwa kamaBaba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar, na Vishnu Kanjar. Mkuu wa polisi Chandra Shekar Solanki alisema mshtakiwa alitokea mahakamani na uso uliofunikwa."

src: ASUS Eee PC, earlier launched world-wide for cost-saving and functionality factors, became a hot topic in 2007 Taipei IT Month. But the consumer market on laptop computer will be radically varied and changed after ASUS was awarded in the 2007 Taiwan Sustainable Award by Executive Yuan of the Republic of China.
mt: ASUS Eee PC, ilianzishwa kwa kujadili duniani kwa sababu za kikwazo na kifaa, ilikuwa mada ya habari katika mwezi wa IT wa Taipei wa mwaka 2007. Lakini bazar la wakulima wa kompyuta za laptop itakuwa radikali na kubadilika baada ya ASUS kupewa tuzo katika Tuzo ya Usimamizi wa 2007 na Mamlaka ya Mawakala wa Jamhuri ya China.
ref: Tarakilishi ya ASUS Eee, iliyozinduliwa mapema dunia nzima kwa sababu za uokoaji fedha na utendaji, ikawa mada moto mnamo 2007 Mwezi wa Teknolojia na Mawasiliano wa Taipei. Lakini soko la watumiaji wa kompyuta ndogo litatofautiana na kubadilika sana baada ya ASUS kuzawadiwa tuzo la 2007 la Tuzo Endelevu la Taiwan na Mtendaji Yuan wa Jamhuri ya China.

src: The issue started on January 1st when dozens of local residents started complaining to the Obanazawa Post Office that they hadn't received their traditional and regular New Year cards. Yesterday, the post office released their apology to citizens and the media after discovering that the boy had hidden more than 600 postal documents, including 429 New Year postcards, which weren't delivered to their intended recipients.
mt: Kashfa ilianza tarehe 1 Januari wakati wakazi wengi wakabebana kwa ofisi ya barabara ya Obanazawa kwamba wamepoteza habari za mwaka mpya na za kawaida. Leo, ofisi ya barabara iliripoti ufupi kwa wakazi na vyombo vya habari baada ya kujua kwamba jamaa mmoja alikuwa amecheza kwa zaidi ya habari 600, ikiwemo habari 429 za mwaka mpya, ambazo hazikupatikana kwa wale waliokuwa wamekabidhi.
ref: Suala lilianza tarehe moja Januari wakati dazeni za wakaaji wa mtaa walipoanza kulalamikia Ofisi ya Posta ya Obanazawa kwamba hawakuwa wamepokea kadi zao za kiasili na za kawaida za Mwaka Mpya. Jana, ofisi ya posta iliomba radhi kutoka kwa wananchi na vyombo vya habari baada ya kugundua kwamba mvulana huyo alikuwa ameficha nyaraka zaidi ya 600 za posta, zikiwemo postkadi 429 za Mwaka Mpya, ambazo hazikufikishwa kwa wapokeaji waliokusudiwa.

src: Murray lost the first set in a tie break after both men held each and every serve in the set. Del Potro had the early advantage in the second set, but this too required a tie break after reaching 6-6. Potro received treatment to his shoulder at this point but managed to return to the game.
mt: Murray alipoteza kipa la kwanza katika mabao ya kushinda baada ya wote wawili kushika kila kipa katika kipa. Del Potro alikuwa na nafasi ya awali katika kipa cha pili, lakini hii pia ilipaswa kupata mabao ya kushinda baada ya kufika 6-6. Potro alipata ushahidi kwa kifua chake kwa muda huu, lakini alikwenda tena kwenye mchezo.
ref: Murray alipoteza seti ya kwanza kwa kuvunjwa kwa usawa baada ya wanaume wote kushikilia kila lishe kwenye seti. Del Potro ilikuwa na faida ya mapema katika seti ya pili, lakini hii pia ilihitaji kivunja usawabaada ya kufikia 6-6. Potro alipokea matibabu begani mwake kwa wakati huu lakini akamudu kurejea kwenye mchezo.

src: "Accompanied by those officials, he assured Texas citizens that steps were being taken to protect the public's safety. Perry specifically said, ""There are few places in the world better equipped to meet the challenge that is posed in this case."" The governor also stated, ""Today, we learned that some school aged children have been identified as having had contact with the patient."" He went on to say, ""This case is serious. Rest assured that our system is working as well as it should."""
mt: "Akikaribishwa na wataalamu hao, alisikitisha wakazi wa Texas kwamba hatua zinavyotolewa kwa ajili ya kutunza usalama wa umma. Perry hasikiti alisema, ""Kuna mahali pa duniani ambako kuna uwezo mkubwa zaidi wa kufanya kazi kwa ajili ya kushughulikia changamoto hii."" Gavana pia alisema, ""Leo, tulijua kwamba wale wadogo wa shule wamejulikana kuwa wamepata kwa kawaida na mgonjwa."" Alisema, ""Hali hii ni kubwa. Nawaamini kwamba mfumo yetu unavyofanya kazi kama inavyotakiwa.""
ref: "Akiongozana na maafisa hao, alihakikishia wananchi wa Texas kuwa hatua zilikua zinachukuliwa kulinda usalama wa umma. Perry alisema hasa, “Kuna sehemu chache duniani ambazo zina uwezo mzuri zaidi wa kukabiliana na changamoto iliyoko katika kesi hii.” Gavana pia alitamka, “Leo, tulifahamu kwamba baadhi ya watoto walio na umri wa kwenda shuleni wametambuliwa kama waliokuwa wametangamana na mgonjwa.” Aliendelea kusema, ""Kesi hii ni nzito. Kuwa na uhakika kwamba mfumo wetu unafanya kazi vyema kama inavyopaswa."""

src: Long before The Daily Show and The Colbert Report, Heck and Johnson envisioned a publication that would parody the news—and news reporting—when they were students at UW in 1988. Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World. Al Gore and General Tommy Franks casually rattle off their favorite headlines (Gore's was when The Onion reported he and Tipper were having the best sex of their lives after his 2000 Electoral College defeat). Many of their writers have gone on to wield great influence on Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert's news parody shows.
mt: Kabla ya The Daily Show na The Colbert Report, Heck na Johnson walikuwa wanasoma Chuo Kikuu cha Washington, na wao walikuwa wanasoma kwa ajili ya kutengeneza ripoti ya habari na ripoti ya habari, wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati
ref: Kwa muda mrefu kabla ya onyesho la kila siku na ripoti ya Colbert, Heck na Johnson walifikiria kuhusu uchapishaji ambao ungebuni habari na taarifa wakati walikua wanfunzi wa UW mwaka wa 1988. Tangu kuanzishwa kwake, Onion imekuwa milki halisi ya habari za dhihaka, ikiwa na toleo la chapa, tovuti ambayo iliwavutia wageni 5,000,000 wa kipekee katika mwezi wa Oktoba, matangazo ya kibinafsi, mtandao wa habari wa saa 24, podikasti, na atlasi ya dunia iliyozinduliwa hivi majuzi inayoitwa Our Dumb World. Al Gore na Jenerali Tommy Franks kwa kawaida walinjuga mbali vichwa vya habari (Gore alijipata kwenye vichwa vya habari wakati Onion aliripoti kuwa yeye na Tipper walishiriki ngono baada ya kushindwa kwenye uchaguzi wa chuo). Waandishi wao wengi wameendelea kutumia ushawishi mkubwa kwa maonyesho ya ucheshi ya habari ya Jon Stewart na Stephen Colbert .

src: The protest started around 11:00 local time (UTC+1) on Whitehall opposite the police-guarded entrance to Downing Street, the Prime Minister's official residence. Just after 11:00, protesters blocked traffic on the northbound carriage in Whitehall. At 11:20, the police asked the protesters to move back on to the pavement, stating that they needed to balance the right to protest with the traffic building up. Around 11:29, the protest moved up Whitehall, past Trafalgar Square, along the Strand, passing by Aldwych and up Kingsway towards Holborn where the Conservative Party were holding their Spring Forum in the Grand Connaught Rooms hotel.
mt: Kupigania kuanzia saa 11:00 (UTC+1) kwenye Whitehall kando ya kifungua cha polisi kwa kanda ya Downing, nyumba rasmi ya Waziri Mkuu. Kati ya saa 11:00 na 11:20, polisi walimwambia wapigania kubadilisha kwenye barabara, kwa sababu trafikiko lilikuwa likipanda. Kati ya saa 11:29 na 11:30, kupigania kubadilisha kwenye Whitehall, kufika kwenye Trafalgar Square, kupita kwenye Strand, kupita kwenye Aldwych na kupita kwenye Kingsway hadi Holborn, wakati wakubwa wa chama cha kisiasa cha kushirikiana kwenye Grand Connaught Rooms hotel.
ref: Maandamano yalianza takriban saa 5 saa za ndani (UTC+1) katika Whitehall mkabala na mlango wa Mtaa wa Downing unaolindwa na polisi, Makao rasmi ya Waziri Mkuu. Muda mfupi baada ya saa 5, waandamanaji walizuia trafiki kwenye njia ya kuelekea kaskazini katika Whitehall. Saa 11 dakika 20, polisi waliwataka waandamanaji warudi nyuma kando ya barabara, wakisema kwamba walihitaji kusawazisha haki ya kuandamana na msongamano wa magari. Karibu 11:29, maandamano yalisonga juu katika Whitehall, kupita Trafalgar Square, kupitia Strand, kupita karibu na Aldwych na juu katika Kingsway kuelekea Holborn ambapo Chama cha Conservative kiliendesha Mkutano wa Majira ya Mchipuo kwenye hoteli ya Grand Connaught Rooms.

src: """We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic,"" he added. Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days. Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes."
mt: "Sasa tunakwenda na wanyama wadogo wanaoishi miaka miwili na wana ugonjwa wa kifua kikuu, waliokuwa na ugonjwa huo," anasema. Dr. Ehud Ur, profesa wa dharura ya chuo kikuu cha Dalhousie katika mji wa Halifax, Nova Scotia na kaimu wa kikundi cha dharura na sayansi ya chama cha kifua kikuu cha Kanada anasikitika kwamba utafiti huu bado ni kipindi cha awali. Kama wataalamu wengine, anasikitika kuhusu ugonjwa wa kifua kikuu, akieleza kwamba utafiti huu hauna maana kwa wale wanao na ugonjwa huo.
ref: """Sasa tuna panya wenye umri wa miezi minne ambao hawana kisukari ambao awali walikuwa na kisukari"", aliongeza. Dak. Ehud Ur, profesa wa udaktari katika chuo kikuu cha Dalhousie kule Halifix, Nova Scotia na mwenyekiti wa kitengo cha kliniki na kisayansi kwenye ushirika wa ugonjwa wa kisukari nchini Canada alionya kuwa utafiti bado uko kwenye siku za mapema. Kama wataalam wengine, ana shaka kuhusu kama ugonjwa wa kisukari unaweza kutibiwa, akagundua kuwa matokeo haya hayana umuhimu kwa watu ambao tayari wana ugojwa wa kisukari wa aina 1."

src: The Twin Otter had been trying to land at Kokoda yesterday as Airlines PNG Flight CG4684, but had aborted once already. About ten minutes before it was due to land from its second approach it disapeared. The crash site was located today and is so inaccessable that two policemen were dropped into the jungle in order to hike to the scene and seek survivors. The search had been hampered by the same bad weather that had caused the aborted landing.
mt: Kokoda Twin Otter ilikuwa inatayarishia kujia ndege ya Airlines PNG Flight CG4684, lakini ilibatilisha mara moja. Kama mara moja ilikuwa inatayarishia kujia kwa mara ya pili, ilipotea kwa mara moja. Ndege ilipatikana leo na ni kama inaweza kujia kwa mara ya pili, ilipotea. Mipango ya kupima ilikuwa ikichanganywa na hali mbaya ya hewa iliyosababisha kubatilisha kwa mara ya kwanza.
ref: Twin Otter ilikuwa ikijaribu kutua jana kama ndege ya PNG CG4684, lakini tayari ilikuwa imeshindwa mara moja. Takribani dakika kumi kabla ya kutua kutoka kwa ujio wake wa pili ilipotea. Mahali pa ajali palipatikana leo na ni mahali pasipofikika kabisa hivi kwamba polisi wawili walishushwa msituni ili watembee waende kwenye eneo la tukio na kutafuta walionusurika. Utafutaji huo ulikuwa umetatizwa na hali hiyo hiyo mbaya ya hewa ambayo ilikuwa imesababisha kukatizwa kwa utuaji.

src: The Twin Otter had been trying to land at Kokoda yesterday as Airlines PNG Flight CG4684, but had aborted once already. About ten minutes before it was due to land from its second approach it disapeared. The crash site was located today and is so inaccessable that two policemen were dropped into the jungle in order to hike to the scene and seek survivors. The search had been hampered by the same bad weather that had caused the aborted landing.

src: Tropical Storm Danielle, fourth named storm of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season, has formed in the eastern Atlantic Ocean. The storm, located approximately 3,000 miles from Miami, Florida, has maximum sustained winds of 40 mph (64 kph). Scientists at the National Hurricane Center predict that Danielle will strengthen to a hurricane by Wednesday. As the storm is far from landfall, it remains difficult to assess potential impact to the United States or Caribbean.
mt: Kisilimu cha Danielle, kisilimu cha tatu cha mwaka wa 2010 wa majira ya kati ya mvua, imeundwa katika Bahari ya Atlantiki ya Mashariki. Kisilimu hiki, kilipojulikana kama kilipojaa katika kipindi cha 3,000 miles kutoka Miami, Florida, kilikuwa na barabara za anga za kasi zaidi za 40 mph (64 kph). Wanasayansi wa Kituo cha Mawimbi ya Bahari kutoka Washington, DC, wanamwita kwamba Danielle itakuwa na mvua kama kisilimu cha mvua kwa Jumatatu. Kwa sababu kisilimu hiki kimejaa kwa muda mrefu, bado ni vigumu kuelewa matokeo yake kwa nchi za Amerika au Bahari ya Karibi.
ref: Dhoruba ya Kitropiki Danielle, iliyotajwa kuwa dhoruba ya nne ya msimu wa vimbunga vya Atlantiki vya 2010, imejiunda mashariki mwa Bahari ya Atlantiki. Dhoruba hiyo, iliyo takribani maili 3,000 kutoka Miami, Florida, ina kiwango cha juu thabiti cha upepo cha maili 40 kwa saa (kilomita 64 kwa saa). Wanasayansi katika Kituo cha Kitaifa cha Vimbunga wanabashiri kwamba Danielle itaimarika kuwa kimbunga kufikia Jumatano. Wakati dhoruba bado haijafikia kuporomoka kwa ardhi, inabakia kuwa vigumu kupima athari zinazoweza kukumba Marekani au Karibian.

src: Dr. Lee also expressed his concern about reports that children in Turkey have now become infected with the A(H5N1) avian influenza virus without becoming ill. Some studies suggest that the disease must become less lethal before it can cause a global epidemic, he noted. There is concern that patients may continue to infect more people by going through their daily routines if the flu symptoms remain mild.
mt: Dr. Lee pia alieleza shaka yake juu ya ripoti za watoto wa nchi ya Uturuki wamepata ugonjwa wa A(H5N1) wa ugonjwa wa wanyama bila kupata ugonjwa. Mawaido mengine yanavyosema ugonjwa huu lazima uwe na uwezo mdogo kabla hauwezi kuunda majonzi ya kimataifa, alisema. Kuna shaka kwamba wagonjwa wataendelea kudhuru wengine kwa kufuata majonzi yao kama ugonjwa huu utakuwa mdogo.
ref: Dkt. Lee pia alieleza wasiwasi wake kuhusu ripoti kwamba watoto katika Uturuki sasa wameambukizwa virusi vya homa ya ndege A(H5N1) bila kuugua. Baadhi ya tafiti zinapendekeza kwamba ni lazima ugonjwa huo upunguze uwezo wa kuua kabla ya kusababisha janga la kimataifa, alisema. Kuna wasiwasi kuwa wagonjwa wanaweza kuendelea kuambukiza watu wengi kwa kuendelea na shughuli zao za kila siku kama dalili za homa hiyo zitabaki kuwa pole.

src: As of the night of August 9, the eye of Morakot was about seventy kilometres away from the Chinese province of Fujian. The typhoon is estimated to be moving toward China at eleven kph.
mt: Kama ilivyotambuliwa jioni ya tarehe 9 Agosti, macho ya Morakot yalikuwa karibu ashaba kilomita 70 kutoka wilaya ya Fujian ya China. Saratani hii inaangazwa kuwa inakwenda kwa China kwa takribani kilomita 11 kwa saa.
ref: Mnamo usiku wa Agosti 9, jicho la Marakot lilikuwa karibu kilomita sabini kutoka kwenye mkoa wa uchina wa Fujian. Kimbunga hicho kinakadiriwa kusonga kuelekea Uchina kwa kasi ya kilomita kumi na moja kwa saa.

src: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia. He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong. After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.
mt: Rais wa Marekani George W. Bush alifika Singapore asubuhi ya Novemba 16, kuanzia safari ya miezi miwili ya Asia. Alipewa karibu na Mwakilishi Mkuu wa Singapore Wong Kan Seng na alijadili masuala ya biashara na uhalifu na Mwakilishi Mkuu wa Singapore Lee Hsien Loong. Baada ya wiki kadhaa ya kushindwa katika uchaguzi wa kati, Bush alisema kuhusu ujenzi wa biashara katika Asia.
ref: Rais wa Marekani George W. Bush alifika Singapori asubuhi ya Novemba 16, hivyo kuanza ziara ya Asia ya wiki moja. Alisalimiwa na Naibu Waziri Mkuu wa Singapori Wong Kan Seng na wakajadili masuala ya biashara na ughaidi na Waziri Mkuu wa Singapori Lee Hsien Loong. Baada ya wiki ya kushindwa katika uchaguzi wa nusu muhula, Bush aliambia hadhira kuhusu upanuzi wa biashara katika Asia.

src: Today's announcement also extended the government's commitment made in March of this year to fund extra carriages. An additional 300 brings the total to 1,300 carriages to be acquired to relieve overcrowding.
mt: Ujumbe wa leo pia ulitengeneza uamuzi wa serikali uliofanywa mwezi wa Machi mwaka huu kufundisha magari ya kusafirisha zaidi. Magari ya kusafirisha 300 yalitengeneza jumla ya magari 1,300 yatakayotengenezwa ili kupunguza ukosefu wa magari.
ref: Tangazo la leo limeongeza kujitolea kwa serikali kulikofanyika Machi mwaka huu kufadhili mabehewa ya ziada. Mwongezo wa 300 unaleta jumla ya magari 1,300 kutafutwa ili kupunguza msongamano.

src: "She said, ""There is no intelligence to suggest that an attack is expected imminently. However, the reduction of the threat level to severe does not mean the overall threat has gone away."""
mt: "Alisema, ""Kuna hakika kuhusu kufikia kwa kushitakiwa kwa kipindi cha sasa. Lakini kupunguza uhalali wa hatari kwa kiasi cha kubwa hauhusisha hatari yote kwa ujumla."""
ref: "Alisema, ""Hakuna busara ya kupendekeza kuwa shambulio linatarajiwa kabisa. Hata hivyo, kupungua kwa kiwango cha vitisho kuwa kikubwa zaidi hakumaanishi tishio la jumla limeenda.”"

src: Martelly swore in a new Provisional Electoral Council (CEP) of nine members yesterday. It is Martelly's fifth CEP in four years. Last month a presidential commission recommended the prior CEP's resignation as part of a package of measures to move the country towards new elections. The commission was Martelly's response to widespread anti-regime protests that started in October. The sometimes-violent protests were triggered by failure to hold elections, some due since 2011.
mt: Martelly alimwajibika kwa CEP ya kwanza ya kipindi cha nne kwa siku moja. Mwezi uliopita, kundi la kifedha la rais alikuwa amesema kuhusu uhamisho wa CEP wa sasa kama sehemu ya pakiti ya mabadiliko ili kubaki kwa uchaguzi mpya. Kundi hilo lilikuwa kama ufumbuzi wa Martelly kwa mashambulizi yasiyokuwa na kasi yaliyochukuliwa kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa kasi kwa
ref: Martelly aliapisha Baraza mpya la muda la Uchaguzi la (CEP) la wanachama tisa jana. Ni CEP ya tano ya Martelly katika miaka minne. Mwezi uliopita tume ya rais ilipendekeza kujiuzulu kwa CEP iliyotangulia kama sehemu ya kifurushi cha hatua za kusogeza nchi kuelekea uchaguzi mpya. Tume ilikuwa jibu la Martelly kwa maandamano yaliyoenea dhidi ya utawala ambayo yalianza mnamo Oktoba. Maandamano hayo ambayo wakati mwingine huwa jeuri yalianzishwa na ukosefu wa kuwa na uchaguzi, ambapo mwingine ulichelewa tangu 2011.

src: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes. We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification. USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes. USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.
mt: USA Gymnastics inasikitika na kuheshimu kwa kiasi kikali kwa kutoa taarifa za kinafasi kuhusu kesi ya Larry Nassar. Tunaunga mkono kwa kiasi kikali kwa taarifa za kinafasi zilizotolewa na walezi wanaoona kwa kinafasi kuhusu kesi ya Nassar. USA Gymnastics inaunga mkono uchunguzi wa kutoa taarifa za kinafasi ambao kwa kiasi kikali utakuleta nuru kuhusu jinsi kesi ya kinafasi kama ilivyotajwa na walezi wanaoona kwa kinafasi kuhusu Nassar ilivyokuwa haijulikani kwa muda mrefu na kuheshimu kwa kiasi kikali kwa mabadiliko yatakayoweza kutoa faida. USA Gymnastics na USOC wana malengo moja tu — kuhakikisha kwa kiasi kikali kwa kutoa taarifa za kinafasi kuhusu kesi ya Nassar, na kwa kiasi kikali kwa kutoa taarifa za kinafasi kuhusu kesi ya Nassar, na kwa kiasi kikali kwa kutoa taarifa za kinafasi kuhusu kesi ya Nassar, na kwa kiasi kikali kwa kutoa taarifa za kinafasi kuhusu kesi ya Nassar, na kwa kiasi kikali kwa kutoa taarifa za kinafasi kuhusu kesi ya Nassar, na kwa kiasi kikali kwa kutoa taarifa za kinafasi kuhusu kesi ya Nassar, na kwa kiasi kikali kwa kutoa taarifa za kinafasi kuhusu kesi ya Nassar, na kwa kiasi kikali kwa kutoa taarifa za kinafasi kuhusu kesi ya Nassar, na kwa kiasi kikali kwa kutoa taarifa za kinafasi kuhusu kesi ya Nassar, na kwa kiasi kikali
ref: USA Gymnastics hukubali barua ya Kamati ya Olimpiki ya Marekani na hukubali hitaji kuu la familia ya Olimpiki la kukuza mazingira salama kwa wanariadha wetu wote. Tunakubaliana na taarifa ya USOC kwamba masilahi ya wanariadha na vilabu vyetu, na spoti yao, huenda yakashughulikiwa vyema kwa kusonga mbele na mabadiliko ya maana ndani ya shirika letu, badala ya kughairi vyeti. USA Gymnastics inaunga mkono uchunguzi huru ambao labda utafafanua jinsi unyanyasaji wa kiwango kama vile ulivyoelezewa kwa ujasiri sana na manusura wa Larry Nassar ungekosa kugunduliwa kwa muda mrefu hivyo na inakumbatia mabadiliko muhimu na ya kufaa. USA Gymnastics na USOC zina lengo moja — kuifanya spoti ya sarakasi, na nyingine, salama iwezekanavyo ili wanariadha wafuate ndoto zao katika mazingira salama, chanya na ya kuwezesha.

USA Gymnastics na USOC wana malengo moja tu — kuhakikisha kwa kiasi kikali kwa kutoa taarifa za kinafasi kuhusu kesi ya Nassar, na kwa kiasi kikali kwa kutoa taarifa za kinafasi kuhusu kesi ya Nassar, na kwa kiasi kikali kwa kutoa taarifa za kinafasi kuhusu kesi ya Nassar, na kwa kiasi kikali kwa kutoa taarifa za kinafasi kuhusu kesi ya Nassar, na kwa kiasi kikali kwa kutoa taarifa za kinafasi kuhusu kesi ya Nassar, na kwa kiasi kikali kwa kutoa taarifa za kinafasi kuhusu kesi ya Nassar, na kwa kiasi kikali kwa kutoa taarifa za kinafasi kuhusu kesi ya Nassar, na kwa kiasi kikali kwa kutoa taarifa za kinafasi kuhusu kesi ya Nassar, na kwa kiasi kikali kwa kutoa taarifa za kinafasi kuhusu kesi ya Nassar, na kwa kiasi kikali
ref: USA Gymnastics hukubali barua ya Kamati ya Olimpiki ya Marekani na hukubali hitaji kuu la familia ya Olimpiki la kukuza mazingira salama kwa wanariadha wetu wote. Tunakubaliana na taarifa ya USOC kwamba masilahi ya wanariadha na vilabu vyetu, na spoti yao, huenda yakashughulikiwa vyema kwa kusonga mbele na mabadiliko ya maana ndani ya shirika letu, badala ya kughairi vyeti. USA Gymnastics inaunga mkono uchunguzi huru ambao labda utafafanua jinsi unyanyasaji wa kiwango kama vile ulivyoelezewa kwa ujasiri sana na manusura wa Larry Nassar ungekosa kugunduliwa kwa muda mrefu hivyo na inakumbatia mabadiliko muhimu na ya kufaa. USA Gymnastics na USOC zina lengo moja — kuifanya spoti ya sarakasi, na nyingine, salama iwezekanavyo ili wanariadha wafuate ndoto zao katika mazingira salama, chanya na ya kuwezesha.

src: "The US Navy also said they were investigating the incident. They also said in a statement, ""The crew is currently working to determine the best method of safely extracting the ship"". An Avenger class mine countermeasures ship, the ship was on its way to Puerto Princesa in Palawan. It is assigned to the U.S. Navy’s Seventh Fleet and based in Sasebo, Nagasaki in Japan."
mt: "Jeshi la Bahari la Marekani pia lilisema kuwa wanaendesha uchunguzi kuhusu kipindi hicho. Pia walisema katika ripoti yao, ""Kikundi cha wafanyikazi wako sasa wanaendesha uchunguzi wa kufanya kazi bora ya kupata njia bora ya kupata kwa usalama kwa kifani kikubwa."" Kifani kikubwa kilikuwa kifani cha kushinda mabomu, kifani kilikuwa kwenye njia yake kuelekea Puerto Princesa katika Palawan. Kifani hicho kimeainishwa kama kifani cha kushinda mabomu cha kundi la kifani cha kushinda mabomu cha kundi la kifani cha kushinda mabomu cha kundi la kifani cha kushinda mabomu cha kundi la kifani cha kushinda mabomu cha kundi la kifani cha kushinda mabomu cha kundi la kifani cha kushinda mabomu cha kundi la kifani cha kushinda mabomu cha kundi la kifani cha kushinda mabomu cha kundi la kifani cha kushinda mabomu cha kundi la kifani cha kushinda mabomu cha kundi la kifani cha kushinda mabomu cha kundi la kifani cha kushinda mabomu cha kundi la kifani cha kushinda mabomu cha kundi la kifani cha kushinda mabomu cha kundi la kifani cha kushinda mabomu cha kundi la kifani cha kushinda mabomu cha kundi la kifani cha kushinda mabomu cha kundi la kifani cha kushinda mabomu cha kundi la kifani cha kushinda mabomu cha kundi la kifani cha kushinda mabomu cha kundi la kifani cha kushinda mabomu cha kundi la kifani cha kushinda mabomu cha kundi la kifani cha kushinda mabomu cha kundi la kifani cha kushinda mabomu cha kundi la k
ref: Jeshi la Wanamaji la Marekani pia limesema wanachunguza tukio hilo. Pia walisema katika taarifa, “Wafanyakazi sasa hivi wanafanya kazi kuamua mbinu bora ya kuondoa meli kwa usalama”. Ikiwa meli ya hatua za kupinga mabomu ya daraja la Avenger, meli hiyo ilikuwa ikielekea Puerto Princesa katika Palawan. Imewekwa kwenye kundi la Saba la meli za Nevi ya Marekani ya iliyoko Sasebo, Nagasaki huko Japani.

src: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria. The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan. Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.
mt: Kulipwa kwa habari za kwanza, Rais wa Marekani Donald Trump, katika ripoti iliyotolewa kwa kwa mawakala, alitangaza kwamba jeshi la Marekani litakwenda nje ya Syria. Ripoti hiyo ilitolewa baada ya Trump kufanya mawasiliano ya simu na Rais wa Uturuki Recep Tayyip Erdoğan. Uturuki pia utakwenda kujitegemea kwa wafanyikazi wanaocheza kama ISIS ambao, ripoti hiyo inasema, nchi za Ulaya zimepotea kujitetea.
ref: Mwishoni mwa Jumapili, Rais wa Marekani Donald Trump, katika taarifa iliyowasilishwa kupitia katibu wa uandishi wa habari, alitangaza kwamba vikosi vya Marekani vitaondoka Siria. Tangazo lilifanywa baada ya Trump kuwa na mazungumzo ya simu na Rais wa Uturuki Recep Tayyip Erdogan. Uturuki ilikua yachukua ulinzi wa wapiganaji wa ISIS waliotekwa ambao, tangazo lilisema kuwa, nchi za Ulaya zilikataa kurudi.

src: Coalition and Afghan troops moved into the area to secure the site and other coalition aircraft have been sent to assist. The crash occurred high up in mountainous terrain, and is believed to have been the result of hostile fire. Efforts to search for the crash site are being met by bad weather and harsh terrain.
mt: Kundi la ndege za kushinda na askari wa Afghanistan wameingia katika eneo hilo ili kudhibiti eneo hilo na ndege za kushinda za kundi nyingine zimechukuliwa ili kushirikiana. Anguko liliendelea kwenye eneo la mlima, na linadhaniwa kuwa ni kwa sababu ya mabomu. Kusafirisha kwa kufanya uchunguzi kwa eneo hilo unakabiliwa na hali ya hewa mbaya na mazingira magumu.
ref: Muungano na vikosi vya Afghani vilihamia eneo hilo ili kulisalimisha pamoja na ndege nyingine za muungano zimetumwa ili kusaidia. Kishindo hicho kilitokea juu zaidi kwenye milima, na inaaminika kilikuwa matokeo ya shambulizi la adui. Juhudi za kutafuta eneo la ajali zinapingwa na hali mbaya ya hewa na maeneo yenye mazingara magumu.

src: After the dam was built in 1963, the seasonal floods that would spread sediment throughout the river were halted. This sediment was necessary for creating sandbars and beaches, which served as wildlife habitats. As a result, two fish species have become extinct, and two others have become endangered, including the humpback chub. Although the water level will only rise a few feet after the flood, officials are hoping it will be enough to restore eroded sandbars downstream.
mt: Baada ya kujengwa kwa damu mwaka 1963, majanga ya mwaka yaliyosababisha kuenea kwa mafuta kote katika mto huu yalidhuru. Mafuta hayo yalikuwa ya kawaida kwa kujenga sandbari na pango, ambavyo vilikuwa vikali kwa maisha ya wanyama. Kama matokeo, spishi mbili za samaki zimekwisha, na spishi mbili zimekuwa za kujitakasa, ikiwemo samaki wa kichwa kikubwa. Hata hivyo, wakati wa majanga huu, maji yataendelea kuwa chini chini, ofisi zimeamini kuwa itakuwa kiasi cha kutatua sandbari zilizovamia chini.
ref: Baada ya bwawa kujengwa mwaka wa 1963, mafuriko ya msimu ambayo yangeenea kote yalisimamishwa. Mashapo yalikuwa muhimu kwa kuunda mafungu ya mchanga na pwani, ambazo zilitumika kama makao ya wanyamapori. Kama matokeo, spishi mbili za samaki zimetoweka, na nyingine mbili zimekuwa katika hatari, zikiwemo humpback chub. Ingawa kiwango cha maji kitaongezeka kwa futi chache tu baada ya mafuriko, maafisa wanatumai kwamba kitatosha kurejesha mafungu ya mchanga yaliyomomonyolewa katika sehemu ya chini ya mto.

src: "The United States embassy located in Nairobi, Kenya has issued a warning that ""extremists from Somalia"" are planning to launch suicide bomb attacks in Kenya and Ethiopia. The U.S. says it has received information from an undisclosed source that specifically mentions the use of suicide bombers to will blow up ""prominent landmarks"" in Ethiopia and Kenya."
mt: "Uwanja wa Marekani ulioko Nairobi, Kenya, umewaambia kwamba ""wachache kutoka Somalia"" wanaendana kufanya mauaji ya kisasa kwenye nchi za Kenya na Ethiopia. Marekani inasema kuwa imepata habari kutoka kwa mmoja wa wanasayansi ambaye anasema kuwa kwa kawaida wachache watafanya mauaji ya kisasa kwenye nchi za Ethiopia na Kenya."
ref: "Ubalozi wa Marekani ulio katika Nairobi, Kenya umetoa ilani kwamba ""watu wenye msimamo mkali kutoka Somalia"" wanapanga kufanya shambulio la bomu katika Kenya na Ethiopia. Amerika inasema imepokea habari kutoka kwa chanzo kisicho wazi ambacho kinataja haswa matumizi ya walipuaji mabomu wa kujitolea mhanga kulipua ""alamardhi maarufu"" nchini Ethiopia na Kenya."

src: "The famous Greek lawyers, Sakis Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulos have been imprisoned in the Athens' jail of Korydallus, as they were found guilty of graft and corruption. As a result of this, a big scandal within the Greek legal community has been raised through the exposure of illegal actions that judges, lawyers, solicitors and attorneys have done during the previous years. A few weeks ago, after the information published by the journalist Makis Triantafylopoulos in his popular Television show ""Zoungla"" in Alpha TV, the member of Parliament and lawyer, Petros Mantouvalos was abdicated as members of his office had been involved in illegal graft and corruption. Moreover, top judge Evangelos Kalousis is imprisoned as he found guilty of corruption and degenerate behaviour."
mt: "Wanaharakati wakuu wa Ugiriki, Sakis Kechagioglou na George Nikolakopoulos wamefungwa katika baraza la kisasa la Athena, kama waliwahi kupatikana wakijinyima na kujinyima. Kama matokeo ya hivyo, kundi la kujinyima na kujinyima kwenye jamii ya wakili katika Ugiriki lilitokea kwa kupatikana kwa kazi za kinyume za wakili, wakili, wakili na wakili waliyofanya katika miaka ya kwanza. Mwanzoni mwa wiki, baada ya habari zilizotolewa na mwandishi Makis Triantafylopoulos katika mchezo wake wa televisheni ""Zoungla"" katika Alpha TV, mwanasiasa na wakili, Petros Mantouvalos alitolewa kama wakili wa kawaida kama waliwahi kupatikana wakijinyima na kujinyima. Pia, jaji mkuu Evangelos Kalousis amefungwa kama alipatikana wakijinyima na kujinyima na kujinyima."
ref: "Mawakili maarufu wa Ugiriki, Sakis Kechagiogluo na George Nikolakopoulos wametiwa korokoroni katika jela ya Athens ya Korydallus, kwani walipatikana na hatia ya kula rushwa na ufisadi. Kama matokeo, sakata kubwa ndani ya jamii ya kisheria ya Ugiriki imeibuliwa kupitia kufunuliwa kwa vitendo haramu ambavyo majaji, mawakili, wanenea, na wanasheria wamefanya katika miaka iliyopita. Wiki chache zilizopita, baada ya taarifa iliyochapishwa na mwanahabari Makis Triantafylopoulos kwenye kipindi chake maarufu cha televisheni ""Zoungla"" katika Alpha TV, mbunge na Mwanasheria, Petros Mantouvalos alifanywa kujiuzulu kwani memba wa ofisi yake walikuwa wamehusika katika hongo haramu na ufisadi. Waaidha, hakimu mkuu Evangelos Kalousis alifungwa jela kwani alipatikana na hatia ya ufisadi na tabia mbaya."

src: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes. Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership. But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

Wachezaji wa kati wa kriketi, Sachin Tendulkar na Rahul Dravid, walicheza vizuri na kushirikiana katika masafa mia moja. src: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes. Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership. But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: "Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month. ""He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."" The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media."

src: "Not all were supportive of the inclusion of the women’s ranks. 2004 Olympic silver medallist Amir Khan said, ""Deep down I think women shouldn’t fight. That’s my opinion."" Despite his comments he said he will be supporting the British competitors at the 2012 Olympics being held in London."
mt: "Hakuna wote wakifurahia kujumuisha rangi za wanawake. Mshindi wa fedha wa medali ya fahamu za Olimpiki za mwaka 2004 Amir Khan alisema, ""Kwa hakika nimeamini kwamba wanawake hawawezi kushindana. Hii ni mafanikio yangu."" Bado alisema atakayependa kushirikiana na washindi wa nchi ya Uingereza katika Olimpiki za mwaka 2012 zitakazozunguka London.
ref: "Si wote waliunga mkono kuingizwa kwa vyeo vya wanawake. Daktari wa medali ya fedha ya Olimpiki ya 2004 Amir Khan alisema, ""Chini kabisa nadhani wanawake hawapaswi kupigana. Huo ni maoni yangu."" Licha ya maoni yake alisema ataunga mkono washindani wa Kiingereza katika Olimpiki za 2012 ambazo zinafanyika nchini London."

src: Peter Lenz, a 13-year-old motorcycle racer, has died after being involved in a crash at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway. While on his warm-up lap, Lenz fell off his bike, and was then struck by fellow racer Xavier Zayat. He was immediately attended to by the on-track medical staff and transported to a local hospital where he later died. Zayat was unhurt in the accident.
mt: Peter Lenz, mwanamke mwenye umri wa miaka 13, amefariki baada ya kujitokeza katika ajali katika kipindi cha moto cha Indianapolis Motor Speedway. Wakiwa katika kipindi cha kujitokeza, Lenz alipotea kwenye moto yake, na kisha kushambuliwa na mwanamke mwingine mwenye moto, Xavier Zayat. ref: Peter Lenz, mwendeshaji wa pikipiki za mashindano mwenye umri wa miaka 13, alifariki baada ya kuhusika katika ajali kwenye Motor Speedway ya Indianapolis. Wakati akiwa kwenye mazoezi yake ya matayarisho, Lenz alianguka kutoka kwa baiskeli yake, kisha akagongwa na mwanariadha mwenzake Xavier Zayat. Mara moja alihudumiwa na wafanyikazi wa matibabu ya kufuatilia na kusafirishwa hadi hospitali ya eneo hilo ambapo baadaye alifariki. Zayat hakujeruhiwa katika ajali hiyo.

src: Travelling by plane can be a scary experience for people of all ages and backgrounds, particularly if they've not flown before or have experienced a traumatic event. It is not something to be ashamed of: it is no different from the personal fears and dislikes of other things that very many people have. For some, understanding something about how aircraft work and what happens during a flight may help to overcome a fear which is based on the unknown or on not being in control.
mt: Kuendesha ndege ni jambo kujitakisa kwa watu wote waliopo na waliopo katika mazingira tofauti, hasa kama wameenda kwa mara ya kwanza au wamekuwa na matukio ya kujitakisa. Hilo si jambo kujitakisa: ni kama jambo la kujitakisa kwa mambo mengine ambayo wengi wengi wanao. Kwa wengine, kujua mengi kuhusu njia za ndege na yale yanayotokea wakati wa kufika kwa ndege hupunguza kujitakisa ambalo linafanyawa kwa sababu ya ukweli au kwa sababu ya kutokuwa na ushawishi.
ref: Kusafiri kwa ndege kunaweza kuwa uzoefu wa kuogofya kwa watu wa umri na malezi yote, hasa kama hawajasafiri kwa ndege tena au walipatwa na tukio la kufadhaisha. Si jambo la kuaibikia: si tofauti sana na hofu ya kibinafsi na isiyopenda vitu vingine ambayo watu wengi wako nayo. Kwa wengine, kuelewa jinsi ndege inavyofanya kazi na kinachotokea wakati wa ndege kuruka inaweza kusaidia kushinda hofu ambayo msingi wake ni mambo yasiyojulikana ama kutokuwa kwenye udhibiti.

src: Nowadays air travel is only rarely booked directly through the airline without first searching and comparing prices. Sometimes the same flight can have vastly differing prices at various agregators and it pays to compare search results and to also look at the website of the airline itself before booking.
mt: Kwa sasa usafiri wa ndege unaweza kubaki kwa siku chache bila kubadilishwa kwa ndege bila kwanza kuchunguza na kupitisha bei. Kwa mara nyingi ndege moja anaweza kuwa na bei za kawaida tofauti kwenye mawasilisho mbalimbali na inabidi kuchunguza matokeo ya uchunguzi na pia kuchangamka katika tovuti ya ndege binafsi kabla ya kupanga.
ref: Siku hizi usafiri wa ndege huhifadhiwa moja kwa moja mara chache kupitia kampuni ya ndege bila kwanza kutafuta na kulinganisha bei. Wakati mwingine safari moja inaweza kuwa na bei zinazotofautiana sana katika wajumuishaji tofauti na ina faida kulinganisha matokeo ya utafutaji na pia kuangalia tovuti ya kampuni ya ndege yenyewe kabla ya kuhifadhi.

src: Courier companies are well paid for delivering things quickly. Frequently, time is very important with business documents, merchandise or spare parts for an urgent repair. On some routes, the larger companies have their own planes, but for other routes and smaller firms there was a problem. If they sent things by air freight, on some routes it may have taken days to get through unloading and customs. The only way to get it through faster was to send it as checked luggage. Airline regulations will not allow them to send luggage without a passenger, which is where you come in.
mt: Wafanyibiashara wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wanaojia kwa muda wana
ref: Kampuni za uchukuzi hulipwa vizuri kwa kufikisha vitu haraka. Mara kwa mara, muda ni muhimu sana kwa hati za kibiashara, bidhaa, au vipuli kwa ukarabati wa haraka. Katika baadhi ya njia, kampuni kubwa zina ndege zao wenyewe, lakini kwa njia nyingine na kampuni ndogo kulikuwa na shida. Kama wangetuma vitu kwa mizigo ya ndege, katika baadhi ya njia huenda ingechukua siku kadhaa kukamilisha upakuaji na forodha. Njia pekee ya kuipitisha kwa haraka ilikuwa kuituma kama mzigo uliokaguliwa. Kanuni za kampuni za ndege hazitazikubalia kutuma mzigo bila abiria, ambapo ndipo unaingilia.

src: You should choose your Frequent Flyer airline in an alliance carefully. Although you may think it is intuitive to join the airline you fly most, you should be aware that privileges offered are often different and frequent flyer points may be more generous under a different airline in the same alliance.
mt: Unaweza kuchagua ndege yako ya kawaida kwa kushirikiana na ndege yako kwa kujua. Hata ukiwa na uamuzi kuwa ndege yako ni ndege ambayo unavyo ndege zaidi, unapaswa kuwa na fahamu kwamba haki zinazotolewa zinaweza kuwa tofauti na mawaidha yaliyotolewa na ndege nyingine katika kushirikiana hilo.
ref: Unafaa kuchagua kampuni ya Usafiri wa Mara Nyingi katika muungano kwa makini. Ingawa unaweza kudhani ni bora zaidi kujiunga na kampuni ya ndege unayotumia zaidi, unapaswa kujua kuwa marupurupu yanayotolewa mara nyingi ni tofauti na pointi za usafiri wa mara kwa mara huenda zikawa karimu zaidi chini ya kampuni tofauti katika muungano mmoja.

src: Drink alcoholic drinks with moderation. Alcohol affects everyone differently, and knowing your limit is very important. Possible long term health events from excessive drinking can include liver damage and even blindness and death. The potential danger is increased when consuming illegally produced alcohol. Illegal spirits can contain various dangerous impurities including methanol, which can cause blindness or death even in small doses.
mt: Uweze kula pombe kwa kasi. Pombe inaathiri kila mtu kwa njia tofauti, na kujua hatua yako ni muhimu sana. Hatua za afya za muda mrefu kutokana na kupika pombe kwa kasi zinaweza kuwa naathari ya mifugo ya maji ya mume na pengine kufa. Kusababisha hatari ni kubwa zaidi wakati wa kupika pombe ambayo haijapewa ushahidi. Pombe ya kisheria inaweza kutoa vikwazo mbalimbali vya kibinafsi kama vile methanol, ambavyo inaweza kutoa uzi au kufa wakati wa kipindi cha chini.
ref: Kunywa vinywaji vyenye pombe kwa kiasi tu. Pombe inaathiri kila mtu kwa njia tofauti, na kujua kiwango chako ni muhimu sana. Matukio ya kiafya ya muda mrefu kutokana na kunywa kupita kiasi yanaweza kujumuisha uharibifu wa ini na hata upofu na kifo. Kuwepo kwa hatari huongezeka wakati wa kunywa pombe iliyotengenezwa kiharamu. Mivinyo isiyo halali inaweza kuwa na uchafu mwingi hatari pamoja na methanoli, ambayo inaweza kusababisha upofu au kifo hata kwa kiasi kidogo.

src: Drink alcoholic drinks with moderation. Alcohol affects everyone differently, and knowing your limit is very important. Possible long term health events from excessive drinking can include liver damage and even blindness and death. The potential danger is increased when consuming illegally produced alcohol. Illegal spirits can contain various dangerous impurities including methanol, which can cause blindness or death even in small doses.
mt: Uweze kula pombe kwa kasi. Pombe inaathiri kila mtu kwa njia tofauti, na kujua hatua yako ni muhimu sana. Hatua za afya za muda mrefu kutokana na kupika pombe kwa kasi zinaweza kuwa naathari ya mifugo ya maji ya mume na pengine kufa. Kusababisha hatari ni kubwa zaidi wakati wa kupika pombe ambayo haijapewa ushahidi. Pombe ya kisheria inaweza kutoa vikwazo mbalimbali vya kibinafsi kama vile methanol, ambavyo inaweza kutoa uzi au kufa wakati wa kipindi cha chini.
ref: Kunywa vinywaji vyenye pombe kwa kiasi tu. Pombe inaathiri kila mtu kwa njia tofauti, na kujua kiwango chako ni muhimu sana. Matukio ya kiafya ya muda mrefu kutokana na kunywa kupita kiasi yanaweza kujumuisha uharibifu wa ini na hata upofu na kifo. Kuwepo kwa hatari huongezeka wakati wa kunywa pombe iliyotengenezwa kiharamu. Mivinyo isiyo halali inaweza kuwa na uchafu mwingi hatari pamoja na methanoli, ambayo inaweza kusababisha upofu au kifo hata kwa kiasi kidogo.

src: The Canal District (Dutch: Grachtengordel) is the famous 17th-century district surrounding the Binnenstad of Amsterdam. The whole district is designated as a UNESCO World Heritage Site for its unique cultural and historical value, and its property values are among the highest of the country.
mt: Kanda ya Kanali (Kiholanzi: Grachtengordel) ni kanda ya kujitambulisha ya karne ya 17 inayofunika kanda ya Binnenstad ya Amsterdam. Kanda yote inajulikana kama Mita za Dunia kwa ajili ya thamani yake ya kisiasa na ya kihistoria, na thamani yake ya kiuchumi ni kati ya juu zaidi ya nchi.
ref: Wilaya ya Canal (Kiholanzi: Grachtengordel) ni wilaya maarufu ya karne ya 17 inayozunguka Binnenstad ya Amsterdam. Wilaya nzima imeteuliwa kama Pahali pa Urithi wa Shirika la Umoja wa Mataifa la Elimu, Sayansi na Utamaduni kwa thamani yake ya kipekee ya kitamaduni na kihistoria, na thamani yake ya mali ni kati ya zile za juu zaidi ya nchi.

src: Phnom Krom, 12 km southwest of Siem Reap. This hilltop temple was built at the end of the 9th century, during the reign of King Yasovarman. The gloomy atmosphere of the temple and the view over the Tonle Sap lake make the climb to the hill worthwhile. A visit to the site can be conveniently combined with a boat trip to the lake. The Angkor Pass is needed to enter the temple so do not forget to bring your passport along when heading to Tonle Sap.
mt: Phnom Krom, 12 km kaskazini magharibi ya Siem Reap. Hii kijiji cha tempi yalitengenezwa mwisho wa karne ya 9, wakati wa ukasi wa Mfalme Yasovarman. Hali ya hewa ya tempi na picha ya ziwa la Tonle Sap kubwa kushinda kujenga barabara kwa kijiji. Ziwani kwa maboti kwa ziwa la Tonle Sap inaweza kubadilishwa na safari ya maboti kwa ziwa la Tonle Sap. Pass ya Angkor lazima iwe na kila mtu anayotembea kwa kijiji ili kufanya kazi yake.
ref: Phnom Krom, kilomita 12 kusini magharibi mwa Siem Reap. Hekalu hili la kilimani lilijengwa mwishoni mwa karne ya 9, wakati wa utawala wa Mfalme Yasovarman. Mazingira yenye huzuni ya hekalu na mwonekano wa ziwa la Tonle Sap ulifanya ukweaji kilima kuwa wa maana. Ziara katika eneo hilo inaweza kujumuishwa kwa urahisi na safari ya ziwa katika boti. Kibali cha Angkor kinahitajika ili kuingia katika hekalu kwa hivyo usisahau kubeba pasipoti yako unapoelekea Tonle Sap.

src: Antarctica is the coldest place on Earth, and surrounds the South Pole. Tourist visits are costly, demand physical fitness, can only take place in summer Nov-Feb, and are largely limited to the Peninsula, Islands and Ross Sea. A couple of thousand staff live here in summer in some four dozen bases mostly in those areas; a small number stay over winter. Inland Antarctica is a desolate plateau covered by 2-3 km of ice. Occasional specialist air tours go inland, for mountaineering or to reach the Pole, which has a large base.
mt: Antarktika ni mahali pa baridi zaidi duniani, na kufunika mchanga wa kati. Zitendo za kibiashara zinazozingatia ni ghali sana, zina uwezo wa kujituma, zinazozingatia ni kati ya Novemba na Februari, na zinazozingatia ni kwa kiasi kikubwa zinazozingatia ni kwa kisiwani, kisiwa na Bahari ya Ross. Jumla ya watu milioni mbili wanaishi hapa katika mwezi wa kati katika kisiwa chache kama vile kisiwani, kisiwa na Bahari ya Ross. Kati ya Antarktika ni mchanga wa kati ulio na baridi kubwa sana. Kwa kawaida zitendo za kibiashara zinazozingatia zinazozingatia ni kwa kisiwani, kisiwa na Bahari ya Ross, kwa kawaida zinazozingatia ni kwa kisiwani, kisiwa na Bahari ya Ross, kwa kawaida zinazozingatia ni kwa kisiwani, kisiwa na Bahari ya Ross, kwa kawaida zinazozingatia ni kwa kisiwani, kisiwa na Bahari ya Ross, kwa kawaida zinazozingatia ni kwa kisiwani, kisiwa na Bahari ya Ross, kwa kawaida zinazozingatia ni kwa kisiwani, kisiwa na Bahari ya Ross, kwa kawaida zinazozingatia ni kwa kisiwani, kisiwa na Bahari ya Ross, kwa kawaida zinazozingatia ni kwa kisiwani, kisiwa na Bahari ya Ross, kwa kawaida zinazozingatia ni kwa kisiwani, kisiwa na Bahari ya Ross, kwa kawaida zinazozingatia ni kwa kisiwani, kisiwa na Bahari ya Ross, kwa kawaida zinazozingatia ni kwa kisi
ref: Antaktika ndio mahali baridi zaidi Duniani na huzunguka Nguzo la Kusini. Ziara za watalii ni za gharama kubwa, zinahitaji usawa wa kimwili, zinaweza kufanyika tu katika msimu wa joto wa Novemba-Februari, na kwa njia kubwa zinafanyika tu Peninsula, Visiwani na Bahari ya Ross. Maelfu machache ya wafanyakazi huishi hapa wakati wa kiangazi kwenye dazeni nne za makazi aghalabu katika maeneo hayo; idadi ndogo hukaa wakati wa msimu wa baridi. Bara la Antaktiki ni jangwa la ukiwa lililofunikwa na kilomita 2-3 za barafu. Safari za anga za mara kwa mara za wataalam huenda bara, kwa upandaji milima au kufikia Nchani, ambayo ina msingi mkubwa.

src: Pre-modern observatories are usually obsolete today, and remain as museums, or sites of education. As light pollution in their heyday was not the kind of problem it is today, they are usually located in cities or at campuses, easier to reach than those built in modern times. Most modern research telescopes are enormous facilities in remote areas with favorable atmospheric conditions.
mt: Obsevatoria za awali zinazozalishwa kabla ya miaka ya 1900, zipo kwa kawaida kama makumbusho, au kama makao ya elimu. Kama mawimbi ya nyota katika miaka yao hayakuwa kama hivyo, kama hivyo, zipo katika miji au katika vyuo vikuu, zinazozalishwa kwa wingi kuliko hizo zilizozalishwa katika miaka ya sasa. Teleskopi za kufundisha za sasa zipo kwa kawaida katika makao yao ya kigeni, ambapo hali ya hewa ni nzuri, ambayo inaweza kuzingatia.
ref: Uchunguzi kabla ya kisasa kwa kawaida hautumiki leo, na hubaki kama makavazi, ama sehemu za elimu. Kwani uchafuzi wa mwanga nyakati zao haukuwa shida kama ilivyo leo, mara nyingi wako mijini au katikavyuo vikuu, rahisi kufikia kuliko zile zimejengwa siku za kisasa. Darubini nyingi za utafiti za kisasa ni vifaa kuu katika maeneo ya mbali yaliyo na hali nzuri za angahewa.

src: There are many beaches, due to Auckland's straddling of two harbours. The most popular ones are in three areas. North Shore beaches (in North Harbour district) are on the Pacific Ocean and stretch from Long Bay in the north to Devonport in the south. They are almost all sandy beaches with safe swimming, and most have shade provided by pohutukawa trees. Tamaki Drive beaches are on the Waitemata Harbour, in the upmarket suburbs of Mission Bay and St Heliers in Central Auckland. These are sometimes-crowded family beaches with a good range of shops lining the shore. Swimming is safe.
mt: Kuna vitu vingi vya bahari, kwa sababu Auckland inakabiliwa na mabwawa mawili. Bahari zinazozunguka ni kwenye mabwawa ya Kaskazini. Bahari za kawaida zinazozunguka ni kwenye mabwawa ya Kaskazini. Bahari za kawaida zinazozunguka ni kwenye mabwawa ya Kaskazini. Bahari za kawaida zinazozunguka ni kwenye
ref: Kuna fukwe nyingi, kutokana na kukaliwa magamaga kwa kwa bandari mbili na Auckland. Maarufu zaidi ziko katika sehemu tatu. Fukwe za pwani ya Kaskazini (katika wilaya ya Kaskazini mwa Bandari) ziko kwenye Bahari ya Pasifiki na zinyooka kutoka Long Bay kaskazini hadi Devonport kusini. Karibu fukwe zote ni za mchanga na uogeleaji salama na nyingi yake huwa na kivuli chini ya miti ya pohutukawa. Pwani za Tamaki Drive ziko katika Bandari ya Waitemata, kwenye maeneo ya kifahari ya Mission Bay na St. Heliers katika Auckland ya Kati. Hizi ni pwani za kifamilia ambazo wakati mwingine hujaa watu, zilizo na masafa ya maduka katika ufuo. Uogeleaji ni salama.

src: Please remember that you are essentially visiting a mass grave site, as well as a site that has an almost incalculable meaning to a significant portion of the world's population. There are still many men and women alive who survived their time here, and many more who had loved ones who were murdered or worked to death there, Jews and non-Jews alike. Please treat the site with all of the dignity, solemnity and respect it deserves. Do not make jokes about the Holocaust or Nazis. Do not deface the site by marking or scratching graffiti into structures.
mt: Kwa kuzingatia kwamba unakwenda kwenye nchi ya kubeba jeni, pamoja na nchi ambayo ina maana ya kutosha kwa sehemu kubwa ya wakazi wa dunia, kuna wengi wanaishi hivi sasa wanaishi hapa, na wengi wengine wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wanaishi wana
ref: Tafadhali kumbuka kuwa hasa unatembelea mahali penye kaburi la watu wengi, na pia mahali ambapo pana maana isiyoweza kutabiriwa kwa sehemu kubwa ya idadi ya watu ulimwenguni. Kungali kuna wanaume na wanawake wengi walio hai walioishi muda wao hapa, na wengine wengi ambao wapendwa wao waliuawa au walifanyishwa kazi hadi kufa, Wayahudi na wasio Wayahudi vilevile. Tafadhali tendea mahali hapo kwa hadhi yote, utaratibu na heshima inayostahiki. Usifanye utani juu ya Maangamizo au Wanazi. Usiumbue tovuti kwa kuashiria au kukata michoro kwenye miundo.

src: Auxiliary languages are artificial or constructed languages created with the intent of facilitating communication between peoples who would otherwise have difficulty communicating. They are separate from lingua francas, which are natural or organic languages that become dominant for one reason or another as means of communication between speakers of other languages.
mt: Lugha za kifungo ni lugha za kuchapisha au za kujengwa zilizotengenezwa kwa ajili ya kusaidia ushirikiano kati ya watu wanaoingia katika masuala ambayo wao wengi hawakubali kwa kushirikiana. Zinadifidia na lugha za kawaida, ambazo ni lugha za asili au za kudumu zilizojulikana kwa sababu zinazidi kuwa lugha ya kawaida kati ya lugha za kawaida.
ref: Lugha saidizi ni lugha bandia au za kubuniwa zinazoundwa kwa lengo la kusaidia mawasiliano kati ya watu ambao vinginevyo wangepata shida ya kuwasiliana. Wao ni tofauti na lingua Francas, ambayo ni lugha asilia au ya kikaboni ambazo huwa maarufu kwa sababu moja au nyingine kama njia ya mawasiliano kati ya wasemaji wa lugha nyingine.

They are separate from lingua francas, which are natural or organic languages that become dominant for one reason or another as means of communication between speakers of other languages.
mt: Lugha za kifungo ni lugha za kuchapisha au za kujengwa zilizotengenezwa kwa ajili ya kusaidia ushirikiano kati ya watu wanaoingia katika masuala ambayo wao wengi hawakubali kwa kushirikiana. Zinadifidia na lugha za kawaida, ambazo ni lugha za asili au za kudumu zilizojulikana kwa sababu zinazidi kuwa lugha ya kawaida kati ya lugha za kawaida.
ref: Lugha saidizi ni lugha bandia au za kubuniwa zinazoundwa kwa lengo la kusaidia mawasiliano kati ya watu ambao vinginevyo wangepata shida ya kuwasiliana. Wao ni tofauti na lingua Francas, ambayo ni lugha asilia au ya kikaboni ambazo huwa maarufu kwa sababu moja au nyingine kama njia ya mawasiliano kati ya wasemaji wa lugha nyingine.

src: If crossing the Northern Baltic in winter, check the cabin location, as going through ice causes quite horrible noise for those most affected. Saint Petersburg cruises include time in town. Cruise passengers are exempted from visa requirements (check the terms).
mt: Kama unataka kufika kwenye kanda ya Kaskazini ya Baltik kwenye mwezi wa baridi, tafakari kuhusu mahali pa kambi, kwa sababu kufika kwenye barafu inaleta saa za kushangaa kwa wale wanaoathirika zaidi. Mabasi ya Saint Petersburg yanajumuisha saa za kufika kwenye mji. Wageni wa mabasi hawana haki ya kupata visa (tathmini).
ref: Kama unavuka Northern Baltic katika msimu wa baridi, kagua eneo la kibanda, kwani kupita katika theluji husababisha kelele mbaya kwa wale wanaoathirika zaidi. Safari za baharini za Mtakatifu Petersburge hujumuisha muda wa mjini. Abiria hawa wameepushwa na mahitaji ya visa (angalia masharti).

src: Barcelona's official languages are Catalan and Spanish. About a half prefer to speak Catalan, a vast majority understands it, and virtually everyone knows Spanish. However, most signs are indicated only in Catalan because it is established by law as the first official language. Yet, Spanish is also widely used in public transport and other facilities. Regular announcements in the Metro are made only in Catalan, but unplanned disruptions are announced by an automated system in a wide variety of languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.
mt: Lugha rasmi za Barcelona ni Kataluni na Kihispania. Kati ya nusu wanataka kusema Kataluni, wengi wana uzozi wa lugha hiyo, na wengi wote wanajua Kihispania. Lakini, zaidi ya nusu za nyota zinatambuliwa tu katika Kataluni kwa sababu ni lugha rasmi kwanza. Lakini, Kihispania pia inatumika kwa kasi katika mabasi na maduka mengine. Tathmini za kawaida katika Metro zinatolewa tu katika Kataluni, lakini tathmini za kawaida zinazozalishwa zinatolewa na mfumo wa kawaida katika lugha nyingi kama vile Kihispania, Kiingereza, Kifaransa, Kiarabu na Kijapani.
ref: Lugha rasmi za Baselona Kikatalani na Kihispania. Takribani nusu yao wanapendelea kuongea Kikatalani, idadi kubwa wanaielewa, na karibu kila mtu anajua Kihispania. Hata hivyo, ishara nyingi huonyeshwa kwa Kikatalani kwa sababu imewekwa kisheria kama lugha rasmi ya kwanza. Kihispania bado hutumika sana katika uchukuzi wa umma na maeneo mengine. Matangazo ya mara kwa mara katika Metro hufanywa tu kwa Kitalani, lakini usumbufu usiopangwa hutangazwa kwa mifumo otomatiki kwa kutumia lugha mbalimbali zikiwemo Kihispania, Kiingereza, Kifaransa, Kiarabu na Kijapanisi.

src: In developed countries today, providing deluxe bed and breakfasts has been raised to a sort of art-form. At the top end, B&Bs obviously compete mainly on two main things: bedding and breakfast. Accordingly, at the finest such establishments one is apt to find the most luxurious bedding, maybe a handmade quilt or an antique bed. Breakfast may include seasonal delights of the region or the host's speciality dish. The setting might be an historic old building with antique furnishings, manicured grounds and a swimming pool.

Kikao kinaweza kuwa kwenye jumba nzee la kihistoria lililo na vyombo vya kale, uwanja wenye nyasi zilizokatwa vizuri na bwawa la kuogelea.

src: The city of Beijing in China will be the host city of the Olympic Winter Games in 2022, which will make it the first city to have hosted both the summer and winter Olympics. Beijing will host the opening and closing ceremonies and the indoor ice events. Other skiing events will be at the Taizicheng ski area in Zhangjiakou, about 220 km (140 miles) from Beijing.
mt: Shahar ya Beijing nchini China itakuwa mji mkuu wa Michezo ya Bara ya Majira ya Baridi ya 2022, ambayo itakuwa mji wa kwanza kujitegemea kwa Michezo ya Majira ya Baridi na ya Majira ya Baridi. ref: Mji wa Beijing nchini Uchina utakuwa mji mwenyeji wa mashindano ya Olimpiki ya Msimu wa Baridi mwaka wa 2022, ambayo itaifanya Beijing kuwa mji wa kwanza kuwa mwenyeji wa Olimpiki ya majira ya joto na baridi. Beijing itakuwa mwenyeji wa sherehe za kufungua na kufunga na matukio ya ndani kwenye barafu. Matukio mengine ya kuteleza kwenye theluji yatakuwa katika eneo la Taizicheng katika Zhangjiakou, takribani kilomita 220 (maili 140) kutoka Beijing.

src: Bird flu, or more formally avian influenza, can infect both birds and mammals. Fewer than a thousand cases have ever been reported in humans, but some of them have been fatal. Most have involved people who work with poultry, but there is also some risk to birdwatchers.
mt: Ugonjwa wa ndege, au kwa lugha rasmi inavumwa kama influenza ya wanyama, inaweza kufaika na wanyama na wanyama wadogo. Kati ya miaka mia tatu tu, kuna kesi chache zinazotajwa kati ya binadamu, lakini kuna wengine wanaokufa. Zaidi yake zilikuwa kwa wale wanao kazi na wanyama, lakini kuna pia hatari kwa wanaoangalia wanyama.
ref: Homa ya ndege inaweza kuambukiza ndege na pia mamalia. Kesi chache chini ya elfu zimewahi kuripotiwa kwa wanadamu, lakini baadhi yazo zilipelekea kifo. Mengi yamehusisha watu ambao hufanya kazi na kuku, lakini pia kuna hatari kiasi kwa watazama ndege.

src: Vikings used the Russian waterways to get to the Black Sea and Caspian Sea. Parts of these routes can still be used. Check possible need for special permits, which may be difficult to get. The White Sea–Baltic Canal connects the Arctic Ocean to the Baltic Sea, via Lake Onega, Lake Ladoga and Saint Petersburg, mostly by rivers and lakes. Lake Onega is also connected to Volga, so coming from the Caspian Sea through Russia is still possible.
mt: Vikings walitumia maji ya Urusi kuelekea Bahari ya Kati na Bahari ya Kaisaari. Sehemu za njia hizi zinaweza kutumika. Tafakari kama unahitaji ruhusa za kawaida, ambazo zinaweza kuwa zikitukana. Kanali ya Bahari ya Kaskazini–Bahari ya Baltiki inaunganisha Bahari ya Atlantiki na Bahari ya Baltiki, kupitia Maziwa ya Onega, Maziwa ya Ladoga na Sanaa Petersburg, kwa kawaida kwa maji na maziwa. Maziwa ya Onega pia inaunganishwa na Volga, hivyo kuelekea Bahari ya Kaisaari kupitia Urusi bado ni wazi.
ref: Maharamia wa Skandinavia walitumia njia za majini za Kirusi kufika kwenye Bahari Nyeusi na Bahari ya Kaspi. Sehemu za njia hizo bado zinaweza kutumika. Angalia uwezekano wa kuhitaji vibali maalum, ambavyo huenda ikawa vigumu kuvipata. Mfereji kati ya Bahari Nyeupe na Baltic huunganisha Bahari kuu ya Atiki na Bahari ya Baltic, kupitia Ziwa Onega, Ziwa Ladoga na Saint Petersburg, mara nyingi kwa mito na maziwa. Ziwa Onega limeunganishwa na Volga, kwa hivyo bado inawezekana kusafiri kutoka Bahari Caspian kupitia Urusi.

src: An immigration checkpoint is usually the first stop when disembarking from a plane, a ship, or another vehicle. In some cross-border trains inspections are done on the running train and you should have valid ID with you when boarding one of those trains. On night sleeper trains, passports may be collected by the conductor so that you do not have your sleep interrupted.
mt: Kituo cha kuingia nchi kwa wageni ni kawaida kwanza kwa wale wanaoondoka kutoka ndege, meli, au gari nyingine. Katika treni za kufurudia nchi, usafirishaji wa kufurudia nchi unaweza kufanywa katika treni inayofurudia nchi na lazima uwe na ID yenye uhalali wakati wa kuendesha moja ya hizo treni. Katika treni za kusafiria kwa usiku, pasipori zinaweza kubaki na meneja ili usisahau.
ref: Kituo cha kukaguliwa kwa wahamiaji kwa kawaida ndipo mahali pa kwanza kusimama unaposhuka kwenye ndege, meli ama gari jingine. Katika baadhi ya garimoshi zinazovuka mipaka ukaguzi hufanywa terni likiwa kwenye mwendo na hivyo unapaswa kuwa na kitambulisho halali unapopanda mojawapo ya treni hizo. Kwenye treni za kulala usiku, pasipoti zinaweza kukusanywa na kondakta ili usingizi wako usitatizwe.

src: "Singapore is generally an extremely safe place to be and very easy to navigate, and you can buy almost anything after arriving. But being placed in the ""high tropics"" just a few degrees north of equator you will need to deal with both heat (always) and strong sun (when the sky is clear, more rarely)."
mt: "Singapore ni nchi kwa kawaida inayokuwa na hali ya kisalama na inayokuwa rahisi kuelekea, na unaweza kupata zaidi baada ya kutia ndege. Lakini kwa kuwa katika "tropiki za juu" kama vile kwa kawaida kwenye kanda ya kati ya kundi la kumi na mbili za kanda ya kawaida, unahitaji kufanya kazi na baridi (kila wakati) na anga (wakati angani ni salama, zaidi mara chache)."
ref: Singapori kwa ujumla ni mahali salama zaidi kuwa na rahisi sana kuabiri, na unaweza kununua karibu chochote baada ya kuwasili. Lakini kwa kuwekwa katika “tropiki za juu” digrii chache tu kaskazini mwa istiwai utahitaji kukabiliana na joto jingi (kila wakati) na jua kali (wakati anga ni safi, nadra zaidi).

src: German pastries are quite good, and in Bavaria, are quite rich and varied, similar to those of their southern neighbor, Austria. Fruit pastries are common, with apples cooked into pastries year round, and cherries and plums making their appearances during the summer. Many German baked goods also feature almonds, hazelnuts, and other tree nuts. Popular cakes often pair particularly well with a cup of strong coffee. If you want some small though rich pastries, try what depending on region are called Berliner, Pfannkuchen or Krapfen.

src: German pastries are quite good, and in Bavaria, are quite rich and varied, similar to those of their southern neighbor, Austria. Fruit pastries are common, with apples cooked into pastries year round, and cherries and plums making their appearances during the summer. Many German baked goods also feature almonds, hazelnuts, and other tree nuts. Popular cakes often pair particularly well with a cup of strong coffee. If you want some small though rich pastries, try what depending on region are called Berliner, Pfannkuchen or Krapfen.

src: If you want to see the world on the cheap, for necessity, lifestyle or challenge, there are some ways to do that. Basically, they fall into two categories: Either work while you travel or try and limit your expenses. This article is focused on the latter. For those willing to sacrifice comfort, time and predictability to push expenses down close to zero, see minimum budget travel. The advice assumes that travellers do not steal, trespass, participate in the illegal market, beg, or otherwise exploit other people for their own gain.
mt: Kama unataka kuona dunia kwa bei chafu, kwa lazima, maisha yako au kwa kushindwa, kuna njia kadhaa za kufanya hivyo. Kwa kawaida, zinaweza kufunguliwa katika makundi mawili: Kama unataka kufanya kazi wakati wa safari au kama unataka kubadili mawaido yako. Habari hii inahusiana na kile cha pili. Kwa wale wanaoacha ukombozi, wakati na uhalisia ili kupunguza mawaido kwa karibu na zero, tafakari hii inahusiana na safari ya mawaido ya kipekee. Mawaido yake inasemekana kuwa watalazimika kushindwa, kufuta, kufanya biashara ya kinyume, kuchimba, au kufanya jambo lolote lingine kwa nafasi yako.
ref: Ikiwa unataka kuuona ulimwengu kwa urahisi, kwa umuhimu, mtindo wa maisha au chamgamoto, kuna baadhi ya njia za kufanya hivyo. Kimsingi wao huwa katika vikundi viwili: fanya kazi ukiwa safarini ama jaribu upunguze gharama zako. Nakala hii inaangazia wa mwisho. Kwa wale walio tayari kuacha starehe, muda na utabiri ili kupunguza garama hadi sufuri, angalia usafiri wa bajeti ndogo. Ushauri huo unachukulia kuwa wasafiri hawaibi, hawana uingiliaji, hawashiriki katika soko haramu, hawaombi, au kunyonya watu wengine kwa faida yao.
