Nyanda hizi za juu mara nyingi huitwa ""vidde"" kumaanisha nafasi pana, wazi isiyo na miti, eneo lisilo na mipaka. Katika Rogaland na Agder kwa kawaida huitwa ""hei"" kumaanisha ardhi iliyotengwa isiyo na miti na mara nyingi hufunikwa na mimea ya vichakani."

src: The tourist season for the hill stations generally peaks during the Indian summer. However, they have a different kind of beauty and charm during winter, with many hill stations receiving healthy amounts of snow and offering activities such as skiing and snowboarding.
mt: Mwaka wa masika kwa mabonde kwa kawaida inapata kasi kubwa wakati wa kiangazi ya India. Lakini wao wana uwezo wa kujitolea na kuwa na uzo na uwezo wao wakati wa baridi, na mabonde mengi yanapata kiasi cha barafu na kutoa shughuli kama vile skii na snowboarding.
ref: Msimu wa watalii kwa vituo vya vilimani kwa jumla hupata shughuli nyingi wakati wa kiangazi cha Kihindi. Hata hivyo, vina urembo na haiba ya aina fulani wakati wa msimu wa baridi, na vituo vingi vya vilima hupata viwango vya kutosha vya theluji na kutoa shughuli kama utelezaji na utelezaji kwa vibao.

src: Be assured that once you hit the marinas everything will be pretty obvious. You will meet other boat hitchhikers and they will share their information with you. Basically you'll be putting up notices offering your help, pacing the docks, approaching people cleaning their yachts, trying to make contact with sailors in the bar, etc. Try to talk to as many people as possible. After a while everyone will know you and will give you hints as to which boat is looking for someone.
mt: Utaamini kwamba wakati unapokwenda marinas zote utakuwa na habari za kutosha. Utakutana na wale wanaofanya kazi kwenye meli na wataleta habari zao nayo. Kwa kawaida utakuwa unapendekeza huduma yako, kupanga marinas, kufika kwa wale wanaofanya kazi kwenye meli, kufika kwenye bar, na kufanya kila kitu ili kuweza kujenga na wale wanaofanya kazi kwenye meli. Baada ya muda wote watajua wewe na wataleta habari kuhusu meli ambayo inahitaji mtu.
ref: Kuwa na uhakika ya kwamba unapofika bandarini, kila kitu kitakuwa dhahiri. Utapatana na waombajilifti wa machua wengine na watashiriki habari nawewe. Kimsingi utakuwa unaweka matangazo kuhusu msaada wako, kutembea katika gati, kuongelesha watu wanaosafisha mashua zao, kujaribu kuwasiliana na mabaharia kwenye baa, na kadhalika. Jaribu kuongea na watu wengi iwezekanavyo. Baada ya muda mfupi kila mtu atakujua na watakutolea vidokezo kuhusu ni boti ipi inayotafuta mtu.

src: Hong Kong Island gives the territory of Hong Kong its name and is the place that many tourists regard as the main focus. The parade of buildings that make the Hong Kong skyline has been likened to a glittering bar chart that is made apparent by the presence of the waters of Victoria Harbour. To get the best views of Hong Kong, leave the island and head for the Kowloon waterfront opposite. The great majority of Hong Kong Island's urban development is densely packed on reclaimed land along the northern shore. This is the place the British colonisers took as their own and so if you are looking for evidence of the territory's colonial past, this is a good place to start.
mt: Hong Kong Island inaleta jina la eneo la Hong Kong na ni mahali ambapo watalii wengi wanavyoona kama kitafiti. Mipaka ya nyumba ambazo zimejengwa kwenye mji huo inaweza kujulikana kwa uwezo wa maji ya Bahari ya Victoria. Kwa kuona miji ya Hong Kong, tafuta kwa mabwepaji ya Kowloon ambao ni kando ya bahari. Kwa kawaida, maeneo yote ya miji ya Hong Kong yamejengwa kwenye mabaki ya bahari kwenye mabwepaji ya kaskazini. Hii ni mahali ambapo wakoloni wa Britania walikuwa wakifanya kazi na hivyo kama unavyoangalia historia ya utawala wa Britania, hii ni mahali pa kwanza.
ref: Kisiwa cha Hong Kong hulipatia eneo la Hong Kong jina lake na ni mahali ambapo watalii wengi huangazia sana. Msururu wa majengo yanayojenga wingu la Hong Kong umeoanishwa na chati ya baa inayopendeza na ambayo yamkini imeundwa kwa uwepo wa maji ya Bandari ya Viktoria. Ili kujionea Hong Kong vizuri zaidi, ondoka kiswani kisha uelekee upande wa mwambao wa Kowloon ulio mkabala. Mengi ya maendeleo ya mji ya Visiwa vya Hong Kong yamesongamana katika ardhi iliyorejeshwa katika ufuo wa kaskazini. Hapa ndipo mahali wakoloni wa Kiingereza walichukulia kuwa pao na kwa hivyo kama unatafuta ushahidi wa zama za kikoloni wa eneo, hapa ni mahali pazuri pa kuanza.

src: Hong Kong Island gives the territory of Hong Kong its name and is the place that many tourists regard as the main focus. The parade of buildings that make the Hong Kong skyline has been likened to a glittering bar chart that is made apparent by the presence of the waters of Victoria Harbour. To get the best views of Hong Kong, leave the island and head for the Kowloon waterfront opposite. The great majority of Hong Kong Island's urban development is densely packed on reclaimed land along the northern shore. This is the place the British colonisers took as their own and so if you are looking for evidence of the territory's colonial past, this is a good place to start.

src: Stirrups are supports for the rider's feet that hang down on either side of the saddle. They provide greater stability for the rider but can have safety concerns due to the potential for a rider's feet to get stuck in them. If a rider is thrown from a horse but has a foot caught in the stirrup, they could be dragged if the horse runs away. To minimize this risk, a number of safety precautions can be taken. First, most riders wear riding boots with a heel and a smooth, quite narrow, sole. Next, some saddles, particularly English saddles, have safety bars that allow a stirrup leather to fall off the saddle if pulled backwards by a falling rider.
mt: Stirrups ni mifuko ya kifua kwa mabwana wanaocheza kwa kifua. Mifuko hii yamekabidhiwa kwa mabwana wanaocheza kwa kifua ili kuwezesha uaminifu kwa mabwana wanaocheza kwa kifua bali pengine mifuko hii yamekuwa na maswala ya kisalama kwa sababu mabwana wanaocheza kwa kifua wanaendelea kushindwa kwa sababu mabwana wanaocheza kwa kifua wanaendelea kupotea kwa sababu mabwana wanaocheza kwa kifua wanaendelea kupotea kwa sababu mabwana wanaocheza kwa kifua wanaendelea kupotea kwa sababu mabwana wanaocheza kwa kifua wanaendelea kupotea kwa sababu mabwana wanaocheza kwa kifua wanaendelea kupotea kwa sababu mabwana wanaocheza kwa kifua wanaendelea kupotea kwa sababu mabwana wanaocheza kwa kifua wanaendelea kupotea kwa sababu mabwana wanaocheza kwa kifua wanaendelea kupotea kwa sababu mabwana wanaocheza kwa kifua wanaendelea kupotea kwa sababu mabwana wanaocheza kwa kifua wanaendelea kupotea kwa sababu mabwana wanaocheza kwa kifua wanaendelea kupotea kwa sababu mabwana wanaocheza kwa kifua wanaendelea kupotea kwa sababu mabwana wanaocheza kwa kifua wanaendelea kupotea kwa sababu mabwana wanaocheza kwa kifua wanaendelea kupotea kwa sabab
ref: Vikuku ni nguzo zinazoshikilia miguu ya mwendeshaji ambazo huning’inia chini katika pande zote mbili za matandiko. Zinampa mpanda farasi utulivu mkubwa lakini zinaweza kuwa na wasiwasi wa kiusalama kwa sababu ya uwezo wa miguu ya mpanda farasi kukwama ndani yake. Ikiwa mwendeshaji farasi atatupwa kuotka kwa farasi lakini mguu wake ufungiwe kwenye tandiko, wanaweza kukokotwa ikiwa farasi atatoroka. Ili kupunguza hatari hii, hatua kadhaa za usalama zinaweza kuchukuliwa. Kwanza, waendeshaji wengi huvaa kiatu cha buti kilicho juu na laini, chembamba kabisa, soli. Kisha, matandiko mengine, hasa matandiko ya Kiingereza yana fito za kiusalama ambzo huruhusu ngozi ya kuvutwa kuangukia tandiko kama kama itavutwa nyuma na mpanda farasi anayeanguka.

src: A hospitality exchange network is the organization that connects travelers with locals in the cities they are going to visit. Joining such a network usually just requires filling out an online form; although some networks offer or require additional verification. A listing of available hosts is then provided either in print and/or online, sometimes with references and reviews by other travelers. Couchsurfing was founded in January 2004 after computer programmer Casey Fenton found a cheap flight to Iceland but did not have a place to stay. He emailed students at the local university and received an overwhelming number of offers for free accommodation.
mt: Jumuiya ya mawasiliano ya michezo ni mfumo unaosambaza watalii na wakulima katika miji yatakayotembea. Kuingia kwenye mfumo huu kwa kawaida hufanyika kwa kutumia mfumo wa kawaida wa kujaza formu ya kawaida; wakati mwingine mfumo huo unaweza kutoa au kutuza ushahidi na maoni ya watalii wengine. Orodha ya wakulima wanaofaa kushiriki katika mfumo huo inaweza kutolewa katika kipindi na pia kwenye mitandao ya kawaida, mara nyingi na ushahidi na maoni ya watalii wengine. Couchsurfing ilianzishwa mnamo Januari 2004 baada ya Casey Fenton kutambua uhalali wa kipato cha kufika kwa kipindi cha kawaida kwa nchi ya Iceland lakini hakupata mahali pa kufika. Alielea waliokwenda shule ya chuo kikuu na kupata kasi ya kipato cha kufika.
ref: Kubadilishana mitandao ya ukarimu ndio shirika linalounganisha wasafiri na wenyeji kwenye miji wanayoizuru. Kujiunga na mtandao kama huo kwa kawaida kunahitaji tu kujaza fomu ya mtandaoni; hata hivyo mitandao mingine itatoa ama kuhitaji uhakiki zaidi. Orodha ya wenyeji wanaopatikana hutolewa kwa kuchapishwa kwenye nakala na/au mitandaoni, wakati mwingine pamoja na marejeleo na hakiki kutoka kwa wasafiri wengine. Kulala kwenye nyumba za watu kwa muda kulianzishwa mnamo Januari 2004 baada ya mtengenezaji wa programu za kompyuta Casey Fenton kupata safari ya ndege ya bei nafuu kuelekea Aislandi lakini hakuwa na mahali pa kukaa. Akawatumia wanafunzi wa chuo kikuu chaa ndani barua pepe na akapata matoleo mengi sana ya malazi ya bure.

src: Hostels cater primarily to young people – a typical guest is in their twenties – but you can often find older travellers there too. Families with children are a rare sight, but some hostels do allow them in private rooms.

src: Boomerang throwing is a popular skill that many tourists want to acquire. If you want to learn throwing a boomerang that comes back to your hand, make sure you have a suitable boomerang for returning. Most boomerangs available in Australia are in fact non-returning. It is best for beginners to not try throwing in windy
mt: Utafiti wa boomerang ni ujuzi wa kipindi ambao watalii wengi wanataka kujifunza. Kama unataka kujifunza kuchipua boomerang ambao kwa kawaida unakwenda kwa mkono, jifunze kwanza kuhusu boomerang ambao ni sawa kwa ujumbe. Boomerang zinazofahamika zaidi nchini Australia zina uwezo wa kufika kwa kawaida. Ni bora kwa wale wanaoanza kuchipua kuchagua boomerang ambao hauwezi kufika.
ref: Utupaji wa bumarengi ni ujuzi maarufu ambao watalii wengi wanataka kupata. Ukitaka kujua kutupa bumarengi inayorudi kwa mkono yako, hakikisha uko na bumerang’i sahihi itakayorudi. Bumerangi nyingi zinazopatikana Australia si za kurudi tena. Ni vizuri kwa wanaoanza wasijaribu kuzirusha wakati wa upepo

src: With 17,000 islands to choose from, Indonesian food is an umbrella term covering a vast variety of regional cuisines found across the nation. But, if used without further qualifiers, the term tends to mean the food originally from the central and eastern parts of the main island Java. Now widely available throughout the archipelago, Javanese cuisine features an array of simply seasoned dishes, the predominant flavorings the Javanese favor being peanuts, chillies, sugar (especially Javanese coconut sugar) and various aromatic spices.
mt: Na kwa kuangalia kwa kiasi kikubwa, chakula cha Indonesia ni neno la kawaida kwa kuchukua kwa kiasi kikubwa kwa chakula cha kawaida cha kipindi cha kisasa cha nchi hizi zinazopatikana katika nchi hizi. Lakini, kama kawaida, neno hili linamaanisha chakula cha kawaida cha kipindi cha kisasa cha nchi hizi zinazopatikana katika nchi hizi. Chakula cha Javanese ni chakula cha kawaida cha kipindi cha kisasa cha nchi hizi zinazopatikana katika nchi hizi. ref: Kukiwa na visiwa 17,000 vya kuchagua, chakula cha Indonesia ni jina la kijumla linalosimamia aina kubwa ya vyakula vinavyopatikana kote nchini. Lakini, llikitumiwa bila vivumishi zaidi, neno hilo huelekea kumaanisha chakula ambacho mwanzoni kilitoka sehemu za kati na mashariki mwa kisiwa kikuu cha Java. Chakula kinachopatikana sana katika maeneo mapana ya funguvisiwa, ni vyakula vya Kijavanese vilivyotayarishwa kwa ustadi sahili, ladha yake ya kimsingi ikiwa ni njugu karanga, pilipili, sukari (hususan sukari ya nazi ya Javanese) na viungo tofauti vinavyonukia.

src: For those unfamiliar with medical jargon, the words infectious and contagious have distinct meanings. An infectious disease is one that is caused by a pathogen, such as a virus, bacterium, fungus or other parasites. A contagious disease is a disease which is easily transmitted by being in the vicinity of an infected person. Many governments require visitors entering, or residents leaving, their countries to be vaccinated for a range of diseases. These requirements may often depend on what countries a traveller has visited or intends to visit.
mt: Kwa wale ambao hawajui lugha ya daktari, maneno ya infectious na contagious yana maana tofauti. Magonjwa ya infectious ni yale ambayo yanachukuliwa na pathogen, kama vile virusi, bakteria, funguli au wadudu wengine. Magonjwa ya contagious ni yale ambayo yanaweza kubadilishwa kwa kufika katika kijijini ya mtu ambaye anachukuliwa. Zaidi ya nchi zinatakiwa watumiaji wanaoingia, au wanaoondoka, kuhudhuria vifungaji vya magonjwa ya kawaida. Hizi madhara yanaweza kufuata nchi ambazo mtu anavyoendesha, au ambazo anataka kufika.
ref: Kwa wale wasioelewa lugha ya kimatibabu, jina maambukuzi na kuambukizwa yana maana tofauti. Ugonjwa wenye maambukizi ni ule unaosababishwa na pathojeni, kama vile kirusi, bakteria, kuvu au vimelea wengine. Ugonjwa ambukizi ni ugonjwa ambao unasambazwa kwa urahisi kwa kuwa karibu na mtu aliyeambukizwa. Serikali nyingi zinahitaji wageni wanaoingia, au wenyeji wanaoondoka kwenye nchi zao kuchanjwa dhidi ya magonjwa tofauti. Mara nyingi mahitaji haya huenda yakategemea ni nchi gani msafiri amezuru au anakusudia kuzuru.

Zaidi ya nchi zinatakiwa watumiaji wanaoingia, au wanaoondoka, kuhudhuria vifungaji vya magonjwa ya kawaida. Hizi madhara yanaweza kufuata nchi ambazo mtu anavyoendesha, au ambazo anataka kufika.

Ugonjwa wenye maambukizi ni ule unaosababishwa na pathojeni, kama vile kirusi, bakteria, kuvu au vimelea wengine. Ugonjwa ambukizi ni ugonjwa ambao unasambazwa kwa urahisi kwa kuwa karibu na mtu aliyeambukizwa. Serikali nyingi zinahitaji wageni wanaoingia, au wenyeji wanaoondoka kwenye nchi zao kuchanjwa dhidi ya magonjwa tofauti. Mara nyingi mahitaji haya huenda yakategemea ni nchi gani msafiri amezuru au anakusudia kuzuru.

src: Personal VPN (virtual private network) providers are an excellent way of circumventing both political censorship and commercial IP-geofiltering. They are superior to web proxies for several reasons: They re-route all Internet traffic, not only http. They normally offer higher bandwidth and better quality of service. They are encrypted and thus harder to spy on.
mt: Wakala wa VPN (network ya kibinafsi) binafsi ni njia nzuri ya kupata usalama kwa kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kufichua na kuf
ref: Watoaji wa VPN (mtandao pepe wa kibinafsi) ya kibinafsi ni njia bora ya kukwepa uzuiaji wa kisiasa na uchujaji wa kibiashara wa IP kulingana na eneo. Ni bora kuliko wakala wa tovuti kwa sababu kadhaa: Huelekeza upya trafiki yote ya intaneti, si http pekee. Kwa kawaida huwa wanatoa upana wa bendi wa juu na huduma bora zaidi. Wamesimbwa kwa hivyo ni vigumu kuwapeleleza.

src: Because calls are routed over the Internet, you do not need to use a phone company located where you live or where you travel. There is also no requirement that you obtain a local number from the community in which you live; you can obtain a satellite Internet connection in the wilds of Chicken, Alaska and select a number which claims you're in sunny Arizona. Often, you have to buy a global number separately that allows PSTN phones to call you. Where the number is from makes a difference for people calling you.
mt: Kwa sababu mawasiliano yanatolewa kwenye mtandao wa kompyuta, huna haja ya kutumia kampuni ya simu iliyopo enzi yako au enzi yako ya kufanya biashara. Pia, huna haja ya kupata namba ya kijiji kutoka kwa jamii ambayo unavyoishi; unaweza kupata kipa kipya kwenye kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha kipindi cha k
ref: Kwa sababu simu hupitishwa kwenye intaneti, huhitaji kutumia kampuni ya simu iliyo mahali unakoishi au unakosafiri. Pia hakuna sharti kwamba upate nambari ya kienyeji kutoka kwa jamii unakoishi; unaweza kupata unganisho la mtandao wa satelaiti kwenye porini ya Chicken, Alaska na uchague nambari inayodai uko katika Arizona yenye jua. Mara nyingi, unafaa kununua kando nambari ya kimataifa ambayo inakubali simu za PSTN kukupigia. Mahali nambari hiyo imetoka huleta tofauti kwa watu wanaokupigia.

src: Pronunciation is relatively easy in Italian since most words are pronounced exactly how they are written The main letters to watch out for are c and g, since their pronunciation varies based on the following vowel. Also, make sure to pronounce r and rr differently: caro means dear, whereas carro means chariot.

Pia, hakikisha kutamka r na rr tofauti: caro inamaanisha mpenzi, ilhali carro inamaanisha gari la kuvurutwa na farasi.

src: İzmir is the third largest city in Turkey with a population of around 3.7 million, the second biggest port after Istanbul, and a very good transport hub. Once the ancient city of Smyrna, it is now a modern, developed, and busy commercial center, set around a huge bay and surrounded by mountains. The broad boulevards, glass-fronted buildings and modern shopping centers are dotted with traditional red-tiled roofs, the 18th century market, and old mosques and churches, although the city has an atmosphere more of Mediterranean Europe than traditional Turkey.
mt: İzmir ni mji wa tatu kwa wingi katika nchi ya Uturuki na wingi wa wakazi ni kama 3.7 milioni, porti ya pili baada ya Istanbul, na mji wa kibiashara kikubwa. Kwa sasa ni mji wa kisasa, ulioendelea na kubadilika kwa wingi, uliopo kwenye kisiwa cha Marmara, kwenye bahari ya Aegean, na kwenye mlima wa Yamanlar. Barabara za kawaida, magharizi ya kawaida, na vituo vya biashara vya kisasa, vimevutia kwa nyumba za kifalme, soko la kifalme, na kanisa na masajid ya kifalme, bali mji huu unachangia kwa wingi kwa Ulaya ya Magharibi kuliko Uturuki.
ref: Izmir ni mji wa tatu kwa ukubwa nchini Uturuki na idadi ya watu ya takribani milioni 3.7, bandari ya pili kwa ukubwa baada ya Istanbul, na kitovu kizuri sana cha uchukuzi. Uliokuwa mji wa kale wa Smyma, sasa ni wa kisasa, ulioendelea, na wa kibiashara wenye shughuli nyingi, ulioewekwa kuzunguka kituo kikubwa na umezungukwa na milima. Njia pana, majengo yenye vioo sehemu za mbele na vituo vya kisasa vya kibiashara vimejaa paa za vigae vyekundu vya jadi, soko la karne ya 18, misikiti na makanisa ya zamani, ingawa jiji lenyewe lina anga ya Uropa kuliko Uturuki ya jadi.

src: Cherry blossom viewing, known as hanami, has been a part of Japanese culture since the 8th century. The concept came from China where plum blossoms were the flower of choice. In Japan, the first cherry blossom parties were hosted by the emperor only for himself and other members of the aristocracy around the Imperial Court.
mt: Kuona na kuchimba kwa mburudzo, ambacho kinajulikana kama hanami, ni sehemu ya utamaduni wa Japani tangu karne ya 8. Mfano uliofika kutoka China ulikuwa kwa mburudzo wa mabega. Katika Japani, washindi wa kwanza wa kufanya mazungumzo kwa mburudzo walikuwa na mfalme pekee kwa ajili yake na wenzake wengine wa utawala wa mahakama.
ref: Utazamaji wa maua ya cheri, inayojulikana kama hanami, imekuwa sehemu ya utamaduni wa Kijapani tangu karne ya 8. Dhana hiyo ilitoka Uchina ambapo maua ya plamu ndiyo yaliyokuwa maua yaliyopendelewa. Huko Japani, sherehe za kwanza za maua ya mcheri ziliandaliwa na maliki kwa ajili yake mwenyewe na washiriki wengine wa upatanishi waliozunguka Mahakama ya Imperi.

src: Jerusalem is the capital and largest city of Israel, though most other countries and the United Nations do not recognize it as Israel's capital. The ancient city in the Judean Hills has a fascinating history spanning thousands of years. The city is holy to the three monotheistic religions - Judaism, Christianity and Islam, and serves as a spiritual, religious, and cultural center. Due to the religious significance of the city, and in particular the many sites of the Old City area, Jerusalem is one of the main tourist destinations in Israel. Jerusalem has many historic, archeological and cultural sites, along with vibrant and crowded shopping centers, cafés, and restaurants.
mt: Jerusalem ni mji mkuu na mji mkubwa zaidi wa Israel, bali nchi nyingi zaidi na Umoja wa Mataifa hawaridhishii kuwa ni mji mkuu wa Israel. Mji huo katika milima ya Yuda una historia ya kihistoria inayofikia miaka elfu nyingi. Mji huo ni mchakato wa dini kwa dini mbili - Ukristo, Uislamu na Uyahudi, na kufanya kazi kama mchakato wa dini, dini na utamaduni. Kwa sababu ya maana ya dini ya mji, na hasa kwa nafasi za Kale ya mji, Jerusalem ni moja kati ya miji ya kujitegemea katika Israel. Jerusalem ina nafasi za kihistoria, kihistoria na kisiasa, pamoja na barabara za kujitegemea, kanda za kuchoma, na vyakula.
ref: Yerusalemu ni mji mkuu na mkubwa zaidi wa Israeli, ijapokuwa nchi nyingine nyingi na Umoja wa Mataifa haziutambui kama mji mkuu wa Israeli. Mji wa kale katika Vilima vya Judea una historia ya kusisimua ya maelfu ya miaka. Mji ni mtakatifu kwa dini tatu zinazomwamini Mungu mmoja - Dini ya Kiyahudi, Ukristo na Uislamu, na hutumika kama kituo cha kiroho, kidini, na kitamaduni. Kwa sababu ya umuhimu wa kidini wa mji huo, na hususan sehemu nyingi za maeneo ya Mji wa Zamani, Yerusalemu ni mojawapo ya sehemu kuu zinazowavutia watalii nchini Israeli. Yerusalemu ina sehemu nyingi za kihistoria, akiolojia na kitamaduni, pamoja na vituo vya ununuzi, mahoteli na migahawa mahariri na iliyojaa.

src: The Kruger National Park (KNP) lies in the north-east of South Africa and runs along the border of Mozambique in the east, Zimbabwe in the north, and the southern border is the Crocodile River. The park covers 19,500 km² and is divided in 14 different ecozones, each supporting different wildlife. It is one of the main attractions of South Africa and it is considered the flagship of South African National Parks (SANParks). As with all South African National Parks, there are daily conservation and entry fees for the park. It may also be beneficial for one to buy a Wild Card, which provides entry to either selections of parks in South Africa or all of the South African National Parks.
mt: Pariki ya Kruger (KNP) inapatikana katika mashariki ya Afrika Kusini na kufika kando ya mpaka wa Msumbiji katika mashariki, Zimbabwe katika kaskazini, na mpaka wa kusini ni Mto Mamba. Pariki hii ina eneo la 19,500 km² na inajulikana kama moja ya mizizi ya Pariki za Kitaifa za Afrika Kusini (SANParks). Kama na kila Pariki ya Kitaifa ya Afrika Kusini, kuna kodi ya kila siku ya kudhibiti na kuingia kwa pariki. Inaweza kuwa na faida kwa mtu kuchukua Kadi ya Jangwani, ambayo inaingia kwa kila pariki ya Kitaifa ya Afrika Kusini.
ref: Mbuga ya Kitaifa ya Kruger (KNP) iko kaskazini-mashariki mwa Afrika Kusini na inapakana na Msumbiji upande wa mashariki, Zimbabwe upande wa kaskazini, na Mto wa Mamba upande wa kusini. Mbuga hiyo inachukua kilomita 19,500 mraba na imegawanywa katika maeneo 14 tofauti ya ekolojia , kila moja ikisaidia wanyama tofauti wa porini. Ni mojawapo ya vivutio vya Afrika Kusini na huzingatiwa kuwa kuu kati ya Mbuga za Kitaifa za Afrika Kusini (SANParks). Kama ilivyo na Mbuga zote za Wanyama za Kitaifa Kusini mwa Afrika, kuna malipo ya kila siku ya uhifadhi na kiingilio. Inaweza kuwa manufaa kwa mtu kununua Kadi Mbugani, ambayo hutoa kiingilio kwa baadhi ya mbuga za Afrika Kusini au Mbuga zote za Kitaifa za Afrika Kusini.

src: The Kruger National Park (KNP) lies in the north-east of South Africa and runs along the border of Mozambique in the east, Zimbabwe in the north, and the southern border is the Crocodile River. The park covers 19,500 km² and is divided in 14 different ecozones, each supporting different wildlife. It is one of the main attractions of South Africa and it is considered the flagship of South African National Parks (SANParks). As with all South African National Parks, there are daily conservation and entry fees for the park. It may also be beneficial for one to buy a Wild Card, which provides entry to either selections of parks in South Africa or all of the South African National Parks.
mt: Pariki ya Kruger (KNP) inapatikana katika mashariki ya Afrika Kusini na kufika kando ya mpaka wa Msumbiji katika mashariki, Zimbabwe katika kaskazini, na mpaka wa kusini ni Mto Mamba. Pariki hii ina eneo la 19,500 km² na inajulikana kama moja ya mizizi ya Pariki za Kitaifa za Afrika Kusini (SANParks). Kama na kila Pariki ya Kitaifa ya Afrika Kusini, kuna kodi ya kila siku ya kudhibiti na kuingia kwa pariki. Inaweza kuwa na faida kwa mtu kuchukua Kadi ya Jangwani, ambayo inaingia kwa kila pariki ya Kitaifa ya Afrika Kusini.
ref: Mbuga ya Kitaifa ya Kruger (KNP) iko kaskazini-mashariki mwa Afrika Kusini na inapakana na Msumbiji upande wa mashariki, Zimbabwe upande wa kaskazini, na Mto wa Mamba upande wa kusini. Mbuga hiyo inachukua kilomita 19,500 mraba na imegawanywa katika maeneo 14 tofauti ya ekolojia , kila moja ikisaidia wanyama tofauti wa porini. Ni mojawapo ya vivutio vya Afrika Kusini na huzingatiwa kuwa kuu kati ya Mbuga za Kitaifa za Afrika Kusini (SANParks). Kama ilivyo na Mbuga zote za Wanyama za Kitaifa Kusini mwa Afrika, kuna malipo ya kila siku ya uhifadhi na kiingilio. Inaweza kuwa manufaa kwa mtu kununua Kadi Mbugani, ambayo hutoa kiingilio kwa baadhi ya mbuga za Afrika Kusini au Mbuga zote za Kitaifa za Afrika Kusini.

src: Towering above the north end of Machu Picchu is this steep mountain, often the backdrop to many photos of the ruins. It looks a bit daunting from below, and it is a steep and difficult ascent, but most reasonably fit persons should be able to make it in about 45 minutes. Stone steps are laid along most of the path, and in the steeper sections steel cables provide a supporting handrail. That said, expect to be out of breath, and take care in the steeper portions, especially when wet, as it can become dangerous quickly. There's a tiny cave near the top that must be passed through, it is quite low and a rather tight squeeze.

Kwa kawaida, kila mwanamke anaweza kufika kwa muda wa dakika 45
ref: Juu ya mwisho wa kaskazini mwa Machu Picchu ni mlima ulio na mwinuko, mara nyingi ni uwanja wa nyuma wa picha nyingi za magofu. Inaonekana kutisha kutoka chini, na ni mwinuko mkali na mgumu, lakini watu wanaokusudiwa kuwa na hali nzuri ya mwili wanapaswa kuwa na uwezo wa kuupanda kwa dakika kama 45. Hatua za mawe zimewekwa kando ya idadi kubwa ya vijia, na katika sehemu za mteremko nyaya za chuma hutoa reli za kushikiliwa inayounga mikono. Hilo likiwa limesemwa, tarajia kuishiwa na pumzi, na kuwa mwangalifu katika sehemu zenye mwinuko mno, haswa wakati wa unyevunyevu, kwa sababu inaweza kuwa hatari haraka. Kuna pango ndogo karibu na juu ambalo lazima lipitwe, liko chini kabisa na la kubana sana.

src: Majorcan cuisine, like that of similar zones in the Mediterranean, is based on bread, vegetables and meat (specially pork), and uses olive oil throughout. A simple popular dinner, especially during the summer, is the Pa amb Oli: Bread with olive oil, tomato, and any available condiments such as cheese, tunafish, etc.

ref: Vyakula vya Majokan, kama vile vya sehemu nyingine kwenye kanda ya bahari ya Mediterranean, vimetengenezwa kwa mkate, mboga na nyama (hasa ya nguruwe), na hutumia mafuta ya mizeituni nyakati zote. Chakula rahisi cha jioni, hasa wakati wa kiangazi, huwa ni Pa ambi Oli: Mkate wa mafuta ya mizeituni, nyanya, na viungo vingine vinavyopatikana kama vile jibini na samakituna.

src: A Hangi Meal is cooked in a hot pit in the ground. The pit is either heated with hot stones from a fire, or in some places geothermal heat makes areas of ground naturally hot. The hangi is often used to cook a traditional roast style dinner. Several places in Rotorua offer geothermal hangi, while other hangi can be sampled in Christchurch, Wellington and elsewhere.
mt: Meza ya Hangi inakuzwa katika kambi ya moto kwenye ardhi. Kambi hii inaweza kuzwa kwa kutumia mawe ya moto kutoka kwa moto, au katika nchi nyingine mawingu ya moto yamekuwa yanayosababisha sehemu za ardhi kuwa moto. Hangi ni kawaida kwa kuzwa chakula cha kawaida cha kuchoma. Sehemu nyingi za Rotorua zinatoa hangi ya mawingu, wakati mwingine hangi zinaweza kutumiwa katika Christchurch, Wellington na mahali mengine.
ref: Mlo wa Hangi hupikiwa kwenye shimo lenye joto ardhini. Shimo hilo huchomwa kwa mawe moto kutoka kwa moto, au katika baadhi ya maeneo nishati ya jua huyafanya maeneo ya ardhi kiasilia kuwa moto. Hangi hutumika mara nyingi kupikia chajio cha mtindo wa kuchoma. Sehemu kadhaa katika Rotorua hutoa hangi ya jotoardhi, wakati hangi nyingine zinaweza kupatikana katika Christchurch, Wellington na kwingineko.

src: While visiting the monasteries, women are required to wear skirts covering the knees and have their shoulders covered, too. Most of the monasteries do provide wraps for women who come unprepared, but if you bring your own, especially one with bright colors, you'll get a smile from the monk or nun at the entrance. Along the same line, men are required to wear trousers covering the knees. This too can be borrowed from the stock at the entrance but that clothing isn't washed after every user so you may not feel comfortable wearing these skirts. One size fits all for men!
mt: Wakati wa kufika katika monasteri, wanawake wanaendana kwa kilele cha kipimo na kufanya kichwa chao kikabiliwe, pia. Kama kawaida, zaidi ya monasteri zinaleta kipande kwa wanawake ambao hawana kipande, lakini kama unachukua kipande chako, hasa kile ambacho kina rangi za kijivu, utapata mawazo ya mmonaki au mmonaki katika kuingia. Kwa mujibu wa huo, wanaume wanaendana kwa kilele cha kipimo. Hii pia inaweza kutolewa kutoka kwa kipande cha kuingia, lakini kipande hiki hauwachukuliwa baada ya kila mtumiaji, hivyo hujifanya kuwa na haki ya kufanya kipande hiki.
ref: Wakati wa kutembelea nyumba za watawa, wanawake wanatarajiwa kuvaa sketi zinazofunika magoti na pia wafunike mabega yao. Nyingi za monasteri hutoa kanga kwa wanawake wanaokuja bila, lakini ukija na kanga yako, haswa iliyo na rangi kali, utapata tabasamu kutoka kwa monaki au sista kwenye kiingilio. Vile vile, wanaume wanahitajika kuvaa suruali zinazofunika magoti. Hii pia inaweza kuombwa kutoka kwa akiba kwenye lango lakini nguo hizo hazifuliwi baada ya kila mtumiaji kwa hivyo huenda usijihisi mwenye starehe unapovaa sketi hizo. Saizi moja hutosha wote kwa wanaume!

src: If you visit the Arctic or Antarctic areas in the winter you will experience the polar night, which means that the sun doesn't rise above the horizon. This offers a good opportunity to see the Aurora borealis, as the sky will be dark more or less around the clock. As the areas are sparsely populated, and light pollution therefore often not a problem, you will also be able to enjoy the stars.
mt: Kama unavyoendesha kwa kipindi cha baridi katika maeneo ya kaskazini au kusini, utapata nafasi ya kuona usiku wa kaskazini, ambao una maana ya kuwa jua haukutana juu ya mstari. Hii inawafanya waweze kuona Aurora borealis, kwa sababu anga itakuwa kibwagwa kwa kipindi kikubwa. Kama maeneo hayo ni magonjwa, na hali ya hewa inawafanya hali ya hewa isipokwama, utaweza kuona nyota.
ref: Ukitembelea maeneo ya Aktiki na Antaktiki msimu wa baridi utapata tajriba ya usiku wa pola, ambayo ina maana kuwa jua halichomozi juu ya upeo wa macho. Hii inatoa fursa nzuri ya kuona mwanga wa Aurora, kwani anga itakuwa giza kwa kadiri fulani mchana na usiku. Kwa kuwa maeneo hayo hayana idadi kubwa ya watu, na uchafuzi kidogo aghalabu huwa si tatizo, pia utaweza kufuruhia nyota.

src: In remote locations, without cell phone coverage, a satellite phone may be your only option. A satellite phone is not generally a replacement for a mobile phone, as you have to be outdoors with clear line of sight to the satellite to make a phone call. The service is frequently used by shipping, including pleasure craft, as well as expeditions who have remote data and voice needs. Your local telephone service provider should be able to give more information about connecting to this service.
mt: Katika eneo la kigeni, bila huduma ya simu ya kawaida, simu ya anga ni jukumu lake pekee. Simu ya anga si kawaida ni mchakato wa kubadilisha simu, kama unaweza kuwa nje na ushahidi wa kawaida kwa anga ili kufanya simu. Huduma hii inatumika mara nyingi na meli, ikiwemo meli za kujitegemea, pamoja na kuhusika katika kazi za kigeni, ambazo zinahitaji habari na simu za kawaida. Mwakilishi wa huduma ya simu ya kawaida wako wako waweza kuwafundisha zaidi kuhusu kuelekeza kwenye huduma hii.
ref: Katika sehemu za mbali, bila signali za simu za mkononi, simu ya setilaiti huenda ikawa chaguo lako la pekee. Simu ya satelaiti sio kwa ujumla mbadala wa simu ya rununu, kwani lazima uwe nje wazi na kuona laini za satelaiti ili kupiga simu. Huduma hutumika mara kwa mara na usafirishaji, vikiwemo vyombo vya anasa, vilevile safari zilizo na mahitaji ya data na sauti ya mbali. Mtoaji wako wa huduma za simu anastahili aweze kutoa habari zaidi kuhusu kuunganishwa na huduma hii.

src: The capital of Moldova is Chişinău. The local language is Romanian, but Russian is widely used. Moldova is a multi-ethnic republic that has suffered from ethnic conflict. In 1994, this conflict led to the creation of the self-proclaimed Transnistria Republic in eastern Moldova, which has its own government and currency but is not recognised by any UN member country. Economic links have been re-established between these two parts of Moldova despite the failure in political negotiations. The major religion in Moldova is Orthodox Christian.
mt: Chuo Kikuu cha Stanford ni chuo kikuu cha Marekani kilichopo mjini Stanford, California. Chuo hiki kimekuwa chini ya utawala wa familia ya Stanford tangu mwaka 1891. ref: Mji mkuu wa Moldova ni Chisinau. Lugha ya ndani ni Kiroma, lakini Kirusi inatumika sana. Moldova ni taifa lenye makabila mngi ambayo yameteseka kutokana na migogoro ya kikabila. Mnamo 1994, migogoro hii ilipelekea kuundwa na kujitangaza kwa Taifa la Transnistria mashariki mwa Moldova, ambalo lina serikali na sarafu yake, lakini halitambuliwa na taifa lolote wanachama wa Umoja wa Mataifa. Viungo vya kiuchumi vimeanzishwa tena kati ya sehemu hizi mbili za Moldova licha ya kutofaulu kwa majadiliano ya kisiasa. Dini kuu katika Moldova ni Ukristo wa Kiorthodoksi.

ref: Mji mkuu wa Moldova ni Chisinau. Lugha ya ndani ni Kiroma, lakini Kirusi inatumika sana. Moldova ni taifa lenye makabila mngi ambayo yameteseka kutokana na migogoro ya kikabila. Mnamo 1994, migogoro hii ilipelekea kuundwa na kujitangaza kwa Taifa la Transnistria mashariki mwa Moldova, ambalo lina serikali na sarafu yake, lakini halitambuliwa na taifa lolote wanachama wa Umoja wa Mataifa. Viungo vya kiuchumi vimeanzishwa tena kati ya sehemu hizi mbili za Moldova licha ya kutofaulu kwa majadiliano ya kisiasa. Dini kuu katika Moldova ni Ukristo wa Kiorthodoksi.

src: "Since Montevideo is south of the Equator, it is summer there when it's winter in the Northern Hemisphere and vice versa. Montevideo is in the subtropics; in the summer months, temperatures above +30°C are common. The winter can be deceptively chilly: temperatures rarely go below freezing, but the wind and humidity combine to make it feel colder than what the thermometer says. There are no particular ""rainy"" and ""dry"" seasons: the amount of rain stays roughly the same throughout the year."
mt: "Kwa sababu Montevideo ni kusini ya Dhoruba, ni mwaka wa baridi huko wakati wa mwaka wa baridi katika nchi za kaskazini na kwa upana. Montevideo ni katika nchi za kati; katika mwezi wa baridi, kiasi cha +30°C ni kawaida. Mwaka wa baridi hauwezi kujadili kama kawaida: kiasi cha baridi hauwezi kufika chini ya baridi, lakini anga na umwagaji wanaoendelea kushambulia kama kawaida. Hakuna mionzi yoyote ya ""baridi"" na ""baridi"": kiasi cha mvua unapendelea kujitegemea kwa mwaka mzima."
ref: Kwa kuwa Montevideo imo kusini mwa Ikweta, huko huwa ni msimu wa kiangazi wakati Nyanda ya Kaskazini ni baridi na kinyume chake. Montevideo iko upande wa sabutropiki; katika miezi ya kiangazi, hali ya joto zaidi ya +30ºC ni hali ya kawaida. Msimu wa baridi unaweza kuwa baridi kidanganyifu: kadiri ya joto kwa mara chache sana huenda chini ya kiwango cha kugandisha, lakini upepo na unyevu huchanganyika na kufanya kuwe na baridi zaidi kuliko ile ambayo kipimajoto kinasema. Hakuna vipindi maalum vya “mvua” au “ukavu”: kiwango cha mvua hubaki takribani sawa mwaka mzima.

src: "Unwanted murals or scribble is known as graffiti. While it's far from a modern phenomenon, most people probably associate it with youth vandalizing public and private property using spray paint. However, nowadays there are established graffiti artists, graffiti events and ""legal"" walls. Graffiti paintings in this context often resemble artworks rather than illegible tags."

ref: "Michoro ya kuta au maandishi yasiyotakikana yanajulikana kama grafiti. Huku ikiwa mbali na tukio la kisasa, watu wengi labda huishirikisha na vijana kuharibu mali ya kibinafsi na ya umma kutumia rangi ya kunyunyizia. Walakini, siku hizi kuna wasanii wa grafiti waliobobea, hafla za michoro na kuta “halali”. Uchoraji wa grafiti kwenye muktadha huu mara nyingi hufanana na kazi za kisanaa badala ya vitambulisho visivyosomeka. """

src: For some festivals, the vast majority of the attendants to music festivals decide to camp on site, and most attendants consider it a vital part of the experience. If you want to be close to the action you're going to have to get in early to get a camping site close to the music. Remember that even though music on the main stages may have finished, there may be sections of the festival that will keep playing music until late into the night. Some festivals have special camping areas for families with young children.
mt: Kwa mifaniko mingi ya tamasha, wengi wengi wa wale wanaoendesha tamasha la muziki wanaamua kuwakamata katika eneo la tamasha, na wengi wengi wanaamini ni sehemu muhimu ya matukio. Kama unataka kuwa karibu na matukio unatakiwa kufika mapema ili kupata eneo la wakamata karibu na muziki. Kutambua kwamba wakati wengi wa muziki kwenye sehemu kuu itakapokwisha, kuna sehemu za tamasha ambazo zitakwenda mpaka siku nyingi.
ref: Kwa baadhi ya tamasha, idadi kubwa ya wanaohudhuria tamasha za muziki huamua kukita kambi kwenye eneo, na wengi wao hukuchukulia kuwa sehemu muhimu ya tajriba hiyo. Ikiwa ungetaka kuwa karibu na matukio utahitajika kurauka mapema ili upate eneo la kukita kambi karibu na muziki. Kumbuka kuwa hata muziki kwenye jukwaa kuu ukimalizika, kunaweza kuwa na sehemu za tamasha ambazo zitaendelea kucheza muziki hadi usiku wa manane. Tamasha kadhaa zina maeneo maalumu ya kukita kambi kwa familia zenye watoto wadogo.

src: Given how remote many of the pueblos are, you won't be able to find a significant amount of nightlife without traveling to Albuquerque or Santa Fe. However, nearly all of the casinos listed above serve drinks, and several of them bring in name-brand entertainment (primarily the large ones immediately surrounding Albuquerque and Santa Fe). Beware: small-town bars here are not always good places for the out-of-state visitor to hang out. For one thing, northern New Mexico has significant problems with drunk driving, and the concentration of intoxicated drivers is high close to small-town bars.
mt: Kwa sababu zaidi ya makabila yamejengwa kwenye maeneo yasiyokuwa karibu, hauwezi kupata kipindi cha usiku bila kuendesha Albuquerque au Santa Fe. Lakini, kila moja ya kasi zilizotajwa juu ya juu zinazitupa pombe, na baadhi yao wanaingiza michezo ya jina (kwa kawaida kasi kubwa zilizotajwa juu ya juu zilizopo karibu na Albuquerque na Santa Fe). Uangamizi: baraza za kijiji hapa hawakuwa kwa mwananchi wa kawaida kwa kufanya kazi. Kwa moja kwa sababu, New Mexico kaskazini ina maswala mengi ya kuchukua pombe, na kipindi cha wachukue pombe kimejaa kiasi kikubwa karibu na baraza za kijiji.
ref: Kwa kuzingatia umbali wa wapueblo wengi, hutaweza kupata maisha ya usiku ya maana bila kusafiri kwenda Albakuku au Santa Fe. Walakini, karibu kasino zote zilizoorodheshwa hapo juu hutoa vinywaji, na kadhaa huleta chapa tajika za burudani (kimsingi zile kubwa zinazozingira Albukuku na Santa Fe moja kwa moja). Jihadhari: Baa za mji mdogo hapa sio mahali pazuri kwa mgeni wa nje ya nchi kutangamana. Kwa jambo moja, kaskazini mwa New Meksiko mna shida kubwa ya uendeshaji gari kwa ulevi, na idadi kubwa ya madereva walevi iko karibu sana na baa za miji midogo.

src: "The main local beer is 'Number One', it is not a complex beer, but pleasant and refreshing. The other local beer is called ""Manta"". There are many French wines to be had, but the New Zealand and Australian wines might travel better. The local tap water is perfectly safe to drink, but bottled water is easy to find if you are fearful. For Australians, the idea of 'flat white' coffee is foreign. A short black is 'espresso', cappuccino comes heaped high with cream (not froth), and tea is served without milk. The hot chocolate is up to Belgian standards. Fruit juices are pricey but excellent."
mt: "Bia la kawaida ni 'Number One', siyo bia yenye uwezo mdogo, lakini ni rahisi na rahisi. Bia la kawaida nyingine ni 'Manta'. Kuna vino vingi vya Ufaransa kwa kutumika, lakini vino vya Uajemi na Australia vimekuwa vikifika zaidi. Maji ya kawaida ya barabara ni salama kwa kutumika, lakini maji ya kawaida ya kikapu ni rahisi kwa kutumika ikiwa unachofanya. Kwa wakulima wa Australia, mawazo ya 'flat white' kwa kahawa ni kibaya. Karamu ya kawaida ni 'espresso', karamu ya kawaida ni 'espresso', na chai inatolewa bila maziwa. Chokole ya kawaida ni sawa na uwezo wa Ubeliji. Mafuta ya mimea ni ghali lakini ni bora."
ref: Bia kuu katika eneo ni ‘Number One’, sio bia tata, ila ni zuri na hufariji. Hio bia nyingine ya mtaa huitwa ‘Manta’. Kuna aina nyingi za mvinyo wa Kifaransa inavyopatikana, lakini mvinyo wa New Zealand na Australia waweza safiri bora. Maji ya ndani ya bomba ni salama kabisa kwa kunywa, lakini maji ya chupa ni rahisi kupata iwapo una hofu. Kwa Waaustralia, wazo la kahawa ‘nyeupe’ ni la kigeni. Nyeusi fupi ni ’espresso’, cappuccino inakuja imerundikwa zaidi na malai (si povu) na chai inaandaliwa bila maziwa. Kinywaji moto cha chokoleti kinafikia viwango vya Ubelgiji. Sharubati za matunda ni bei ghali lakini ni bora.

src: "The Guaraní were the most significant indigenous group inhabiting what is now Eastern Paraguay, living as semi-nomadic hunters who also practised subsistence agriculture. The Chaco region was home to other groups of indigenous tribes such as the Guaycurú and Payaguá, who survived by hunting, gathering and fishing. In the 16th century Paraguay, formerly called ""The Giant Province of the Indies"", was born as a result of the encounter of Spanish conquerors with the native indigenous groups. The Spaniards started the colonization period which lasted for three centuries. Since the foundation of Asunción in 1537, Paraguay has managed to keep a lot of its indigenous character and identity."
mt: "Guaraní walikuwa kikundi kikubwa cha kabila cha asili ambacho kiliishi katika sehemu ya Mashariki ya Paraguay, waliishi kama wanyangawe wanaoendesha uchumi wa kipindu, waliendesha kilimo cha kudumu. Sehemu ya Chaco ilikuwa nyumbani kwa kikundi cha kabila cha asili kama vile Guaycurú na Payaguá, waliendesha uchumi wa kipindu, kilimo na uvuvi. Katika karne ya 16, Paraguay, iliyotajwa kama "Mkoa wa Kibantu kubwa wa Mashariki", ilianza kujengwa kwa kuzingatia wakazi wa asili. Wakati wa kuanzishwa kwa Asunción mnamo 1537, Paraguay ilikuwa na nafasi kubwa ya kujitambua na kujitunza kabila lake.
ref: "Waguaraní walikuwa kundi lenye maana zaidi ambalo linakaa kule ambako sasa kunaitwa Paragwai Mashariki, wakiishi kama wawindaji wahamahama ambao pia walikuwa wakilima mazao ya kujikimu. Eneo la Chako lilikuwa nyumbani mwa vikundi vingine vya kienyeji kama vile Guaycurú na Payaguá, ambao waliishi kwa uwindaji, ukusanyaji na uvuvi. Katika karne ya 16, Parague, iliyojulikana awali kama ""Jitu la Mkoa wa Indi"", ilizaliwa kufuatia makabiliano kati ya washindi wa Kihispania na makundi asilia. Wahispania walianza kipindi cha ukoloni ambacho kilidumu kwa karne tatu. Tangu msingi wa Asuncion mnamo 1537, Paraguai imeweza kudumisha sifa na utambulisho wake wa kienyeji."

src: "Parisians have a reputation for being egocentric, rude and arrogant. While this is often only an inaccurate stereotype, the best way to get along in Paris still is to be on your best behavior, acting like someone who is ""bien élevé"" (well brought up). It will make getting about considerably easier. Parisians' abrupt exteriors will rapidly evaporate if you display some basic courtesies."
mt: "Wananchi wa Paris wana uhusiano wa kuwa na uwezo, kujitetea na kuwa na uwezo. Kwa kawaida huu ni stereotipu ambao si sahihi, lakini njia bora ya kuendesha kwa Paris ni kuwa katika uwezo zako, kuwa katika uwezo zako, kuwa katika uwezo zako. ref: Waparisi wana sifa ya kujipenda, jeuri na wenye kiburi. Wakati hii mara nyingi ni aina ya dhana tu isiyofaa, njia nzuri ya kupatana kule Paris bado ni kuwa katika tabia yako njema, kufanya kama mtu ambaye ni “bien e’lev’e” (amelelewa vizuri). Itafanya kupatana rahisi mno. Umbo za nje za ghafla za Parisiani zitayeyuka haraka ikiwa unaonyesha ustahifu kadhaa za kimsingi.

src: MetroRail has two classes on commuter trains in and around Cape Town: MetroPlus (also called First Class) and Metro (called Third Class). MetroPlus is more comfortable and less crowded but slightly more expensive, though still cheaper than normal metro tickets in Europe. Every train has both MetroPlus and Metro coaches; the MetroPlus coaches are always on the end of the train nearest Cape Town.
mt: MetroRail ina majina mbili kwa ndege za kijiji katika mji wa Cape Town: MetroPlus (pia inajulikana kama Klasa ya kwanza) na Metro (inajulikana kama Klasa ya tatu). MetroPlus ni zaidi salama na bila kasi lakini kiasi kidogo zaidi kuliko Metro, bali ni chini kuliko tiketi za metro za kawaida nchini Ulaya. Kila ndege ina majengo yote ya MetroPlus na Metro; majengo ya MetroPlus yamekamilika kwa kila ndege kwa kila muda.
ref: MetroRail ina daraja mbili katika treni za abiria ndani na karibu na Cape Town: MetroPlus (pia huitwa Daraja la Kwanza) na Metro (huitwa Daraja la Tatu). MetroPlus ina starehe zaidi na haina msongamano lakini ni ya bei ghali kiasi, ingawa bado ni ya bei ya chini kuliko tiketi za kawaida za reli huko Uropa. Kila treni ina kochi za MetroPlus na Metro; kila wakati kochi za MetroPlus huwa katika upande wa treni ulioko karibu na Cape Town.

src: Travellers may encounter animal pests that they are not familiar with in their home regions. Pests can spoil food, cause irritation, or in a worse case cause allergic reactions, spread venom, or transmit infections. Infectious diseases themselves, or dangerous animals that can injure or kill people by force, do not usually qualify as pests.
mt: Watu wanaendesha biashara waweza kupata wanyama wabaya ambao wanaishi katika eneo la nyuma. ref: Wasafiri wanaweza kukutana na wadudu wa wanyama ambao hawawatambui kutoka maeneo yao ya nyumbani. Wadudu waharibifu wanaweza kuharibu chakula, kusababisha maudhi, au katika hali mbaya kusababisha athari za mzio, kueneza sumu au kusambaza maambukizi. Maradhi yenyewe ya kuambukiza, au wanyama hatari ambao wanaweza kujeruhi au kuua watu kwa nguvu, kwa kawaida hawahitimu kama wanyama-vipenzi.

src: Every corner store is filled with a confusing array of pre-paid phone cards that can be used from pay phones or ordinary telephones. While most cards are good for calling anywhere, some specialise in providing favourable call rates to specific groups of countries. Access to these services is often through a toll-free telephone number that can be called from most phones without charge.
mt: Kila duka la biashara linajaa mchakato wa kupiga simu unaotumia kadhaa za kupiga simu za kwanza ambazo zinaweza kutumika kutoka kwa simu za kawaida au za kawaida. Kwa kawaida kadhaa za kupiga simu zinaweza kutumika kutoka kwa nchi zote, lakini kadhaa zinazungumzia tarifa za kupiga simu bora kwa kundi la nchi. Eneo la huduma hizi kwa kawaida ni namba ya simu ya kawaida ambayo inaweza kutumiwa kutoka kwa simu za kawaida bila gharama.
ref: Kila duka la karibu limejawa na aina nyingi za kukanganya za kadi za simu za kulipia kabla ambazo zinaweza kutumika katika simu za kulipia au simu za kawaida. Huku kadi nyingi zikiwa nzuri kwa kupiga simu kila mahali, nyingine ni maalumu kwa kutoa gharama za chini za kupiga simu kwa vikundi mahususi vya mataifa. Ufikiaji wa huduma hizi mara nyingi ni kupitia nambari ya simu isiyolipishwa ambayo inaweza kupigwa kutoka simu nyingi bila malipo.

src: The Plitvice Lakes national park is heavily forested, mainly with beech, spruce, and fir trees, and features a mixture of Alpine and Mediterranean vegetation. It has a notably wide variety of plant communities, due to its range of microclimates, differing soils and varying levels of altitude. The area is also home to an extremely wide variety of animal and bird species. Rare fauna such as the European brown bear, wolf, eagle, owl, lynx, wild cat and capercaillie can be found there, along with many more common species
mt: Uwanja wa taifa wa Ziwa za Plitvice ni kivuli kikubwa, hasa na mchanga, na kinafanya mchanganyiko wa vegetesheni za Alpeni na ya Bahari ya Kati. Ina jumla ya vichakavu vingi, kwa sababu ya rangi yake ya mikokoto, mabaki na kilele cha kimo cha juu. Eneo hilo pia ni nyumbani kwa jumla ya spishi za wanyama na wadudu. Spishi za wanyama kama vile kifaru, mbwa mwitu, kondoo, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shetani, shet
ref: Mbuga ya Kitaifa ya Plitvice Lakes ina misitu sana, hususan mifune, misonobari, na miti ya misonobari, na mchanganyiko wa uoto wa safu ya milima ya Alp na mediterania. Ina aina anuwai za jamii za mimea, kutokana na masafa yake ya hali ndogondogo za anga, mchanga tofauti na kutofautiana kwa viwango vya urefu. Eneo hilo pia ni nyumbani mwa aina nyingi sana mbalimbali za spishi za wanyama na ndege. Wanyama nadra kama vile Dubu wa hudhurungi wa Ulaya, mbwa mwitu, tai, bundi, simba-mangu, paka mwitu na kware wa Ulaya wanaweza kupatikana huko, pamoja na spishi nyingine nyingi za kawaida.

src: "The media companies routinely lie about the purpose of this, claiming that it is to ""prevent piracy"". In fact, region codes have absolutely no effect on illegal copying; a bit-for-bit copy of a disk will play just fine on any device where the original will. The actual purpose is to give those companies more control over their markets; it's all about money spinning."
mt: "Makampuni ya habari yanavyoleta mawazo kuhusu hili, yanavyoleta mawazo kwamba ni kwa ajili ya kutokana na ""kufa kwa kipimo"". Kwa hakika, kodi za sehemu zinazoweza kufanya kazi kwa kufa kwa kipimo; kopi za biti za kawaida za diski itakayopigwa kwa kawaida itakapendelea vizuri kwenye kila kitu ambako original itakapendelea. ref: Kampuni za midia daima hudanganya kuhusu madhumuni ya hili, zikidai kwamba ni kwa “kuzuia uharamu”. Kwa kweli, misimbo ya mikoa hazina athari kabisa kwa unakilishaji haramu; nakala ndogo ndogo za diski zitacheza tu vizuri kwenye kifaa chochote kinachocheza nakala halisi. Lengo halisi ni kuzipatia kampuni hizo udhibiti zaidi wa masoko yake; yote ni kuhusu kutengeneza pesa.

src: While immigration check is usually absent or a formality when you arrive in your homeland, customs control can be a hassle. Make sure you know what you can and cannot bring in and declare anything over the legal limits.
mt: Kutokana na kwamba kufanya uchunguzi wa utumiaji wa nchi yako ni kawaida au ni kifungu wakati unapokwenda nyumbani, kufanya uchunguzi wa kifungu kwa bidhaa zako ni kosa. Utaalamu utakufa ukiwajibika kwa kufanya uchunguzi wa bidhaa zako kwa wingi zaidi ya wazi.
ref: Wakati kuangaliwa kwa uhamiaji kawaida haupo au ni urasmi ukifika katika nchi yako, udhibiti wa forodha unaweza kuwa shida. Hakikisha unajua kile unachoweza na hauwezi kuleta kisha kutangaza kitu chochote juu ya mipaka ya kisheria.

src: Cochamó Valley - Chile's premier climbing destination, known as the Yosemite of South America, with a variety of granite big walls and crags. Summits include breath-taking views from peaks. Climbers from all parts of the world are continually establishing new routes amongst its endless potential of walls.

ref: Bonde la Cochamo – eneo kuu la makusudio ya ukweaji nchini Chile, lijulikanalo kama Yosemite ya Marekani Kusini, na kuta kubwa anuwai za matale na majabali. Mikutano huwa na mandhari za kusisimua kutoka vileleni. Wapanda mlima kutoka pande zote za ulimwengu wanaendelea kuanzisha njia mpya kati ya uwezo wake wa kuta.

src: If you want to fly around the world completely in the Southern Hemisphere, the choice of flights and destinations is limited due to the lack of transoceanic routes. No airline alliance covers all three ocean crossings in the Southern Hemisphere (and SkyTeam covers none of the crossings). However, Star Alliance covers everything except the eastern South Pacific from Santiago de Chile to Tahiti, which is a LATAM Oneworld flight. This flight is not the only option if you want to skip the South Pacific and the west coast of South America. (see below)
mt: Kama unataka kupanda kote katika hemisferi ya kusini, hakuna chaguzi za ndege na nchi zinazozingatia kwa sababu ya kutofautiana kwa njia za kuzunguka mabwawa. Hata hivyo, chama cha Star Alliance linazunguka kote isipokuwa bahari ya kusini mashariki kutoka Santiago de Chile hadi Tahiti, ambayo ni ndege ya LATAM Oneworld. Hii ni ndege pekee kama unataka kupoteza bahari ya kusini na pwani ya kusini mwa Amerika. (angalia chini)
ref: Ikiwa unataka kusafiri kuzunguka ulimwengu katika Kizio cha Kusini, machaguo ya ndege na mahali si mengi kwa sababu ya ukosefu wa ndege zinazosafiri kuvuka bahari. Hakuna muungano wa ndege unaohudumia vivukio vyote vitatu vya bahari katika Ulimwengu wa Kusini (na hakuna kivukio ambacho SkyTeam inahudumia). Hata hivyo, Star Alliance hushughulikia kila kitu isipokuwa South Pacific ya mashariki kutoka Santiago de Chile kwenda Tahiti, ambayo ni safari ya LATAM Oneworld. Safari hii ya ndege siyo chaguo la pekee kama unataka kuruka Pasifiki Kusini na pwani ya magharibi ya Marekani Kusini. (tazama chini)

src: If you want to fly around the world completely in the Southern Hemisphere, the choice of flights and destinations is limited due to the lack of transoceanic routes. No airline alliance covers all three ocean crossings in the Southern Hemisphere (and SkyTeam covers none of the crossings). However, Star Alliance covers everything except the eastern South Pacific from Santiago de Chile to Tahiti, which is a LATAM Oneworld flight. This flight is not the only option if you want to skip the South Pacific and the west coast of South America. (see below)
mt: Kama unataka kupanda kote katika hemisferi ya kusini, hakuna chaguzi za ndege na nchi zinazozingatia kwa sababu ya kutofautiana kwa njia za kuzunguka mabwawa. Hata hivyo, chama cha Star Alliance linazunguka kote isipokuwa bahari ya kusini mashariki kutoka Santiago de Chile hadi Tahiti, ambayo ni ndege ya LATAM Oneworld. Hii ni ndege pekee kama unataka kupoteza bahari ya kusini na pwani ya kusini mwa Amerika. (angalia chini)
ref: Ikiwa unataka kusafiri kuzunguka ulimwengu katika Kizio cha Kusini, machaguo ya ndege na mahali si mengi kwa sababu ya ukosefu wa ndege zinazosafiri kuvuka bahari. Hakuna muungano wa ndege unaohudumia vivukio vyote vitatu vya bahari katika Ulimwengu wa Kusini (na hakuna kivukio ambacho SkyTeam inahudumia). Hata hivyo, Star Alliance hushughulikia kila kitu isipokuwa South Pacific ya mashariki kutoka Santiago de Chile kwenda Tahiti, ambayo ni safari ya LATAM Oneworld. Safari hii ya ndege siyo chaguo la pekee kama unataka kuruka Pasifiki Kusini na pwani ya magharibi ya Marekani Kusini. (tazama chini)

src: Internationally, there are nearly 200 running tour organizations. Most of them operate independently. The Global Running Tours successor, Go Running Tours networks dozens of sightrunning providers on four continents. With roots in Barcelona's Running Tours Barcelona and Copenhagen's Running Copenhagen, it was quickly joined by Running Tours Prague based in Prague and others.
mt: Kimataifa, kuna zaidi ya 200 kundi la runing. Zaidi ya wengi wanaendeshwa kwa kujitegemea. Mwongozo wa Running Tours Global, Go Running Tours inaunganisha zaidi ya kundi la runing 20 katika nchi zifuatazo: Afrika, Asia, Australia, Uropa na Amerika. Na mwenyewe, kundi la runing la Barcelona, kundi la runing la Copenhagen, kundi la runing la Prague na kundi la runing la Berlin.
ref: Kimataifa, kuna mashirika karibu 200 ya ziara za mbio. Nyingi kati yazo hufanya kazi kwa uhuru. Mrithi wa Global Running Tours, Go Running Tours huunganisha makundi mengi ya kutoa huduma ya ukimbiaji na utazamaji kwenye mabara manne. Kwa mizizi ya Running Tours huko Barcelona na Copenhagen’s Running kwa Copenhagen, ilijumuishwa haraka na Running Tours huko Prague na wengineo.

src: "Safaris are perhaps the greatest tourism draw in Africa and the highlight for many visitors. The term safari in popular use refers to overland travel to view the stunning African wildlife, particularly on savanna. Some animals, such as elephants and giraffes, tend to approach closely to cars and standard equipment will allow good viewing. Lions, cheetahs and leopards are sometimes shy and you will see them better with binoculars. A walking safari (also called a ""bush walk"", ""hiking safari"", or going ""footing"") consists of hiking, either for a few hours or several days."
mt: "Safari ni kama ilivyotambuliwa ni kipindi cha kujenga ushirika kwa wageni kwa ajili ya kuona wanyama wanaoendesha Afrika, hasa katika savanna. Wanyama wengine, kama vile tembo na ngiri, kwa kawaida wanaendesha kwa karibu na gari na uwezo wa kawaida utawasaidia kuona vizuri. Simba, cheeta na pumba zinaweza kuwa na upeo na utawasaidia kuona vizuri kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa kwa k
ref: "Pengine safari ndizo kivutio kikubwa zaidi cha watalii katika Afrika na angazio la wageni wengi. Neno safari linamaanisha kusafiri kuona Wanyama wa pori wa Afrika wanaoshangaza, haswa kwenye savanna Baadhi ya wanyama, kama vile ndovu na twiga, huelekea kusogea kukaribia magari na vifaa vya kawaida vitaruhusu utazamaji mwema. Simba, duma na chui wakati mwingine huwa na aibu na utawaona bora na darubini. Safari ya miguu (ijulikanayo kama ""matembezi kichakani"", ""safari ya kukwea"", au kwenda ""kwa miguu"") hujumuisha ukweaji, iwe kwa saa chache au siku kadhaa."

src: Tours are cheaper for larger groups, so if you're by yourself or with just one friend, try to meet other people and form a group of four to six for a better per-person rate. However, this shouldn't really be off your concern, because often tourists are shuffled around to fill the cars. It seems actually to be more a way of tricking people into believing they have to pay more.
mt: Maombaji wanaopata huduma kwa kundi kubwa, hivyo kama unakwenda peke yako au pamoja na mmoja tu, pata wengine na kufanya kundi la nne hadi sita kwa kila mtu kwa kodi bora. Lakini hii haisababishwi kwa kujali, kwa sababu mara nyingi watawala wanaangalia kama wewe unaweza kufanya kundi la nne hadi sita ili kufanya kodi yako kubwa zaidi.
ref: Ziara huwa bei nafuu kwa vikundi vikubwa, kwa hivyo kama uko peke yako au na rafiki mmoja tu, jaribu kukutana na watu wengine na kuunda kikundi cha watu wanne hadi sita kwa bei bora kwa mtu mmoja. Hata hivyo, kwa kweli hii haifai kukosa kukupa wasiwasi, kwa sababu mara nyingi watalii huchanganywachanganywa ili kuyajaza magari. Inaonekana kweli kuwa njia zaidi ya kuwadanganya watu kuamini wanapaswa kulipa zaidi

src: While San Francisco's economy is linked to it being a world-class tourist attraction, its economy is diversified. The largest employment sectors are professional services, government, finance, trade, and tourism. Its frequent portrayal in music, films, literature and popular culture has helped make the city and its landmarks known throughout the world. San Francisco has developed a large tourist infrastructure with numerous hotels, restaurants, and top-notch convention facilities. San Francisco is also one of the best places in the nation for other Asian cuisine: Korean, Thai, Indian, and Japanese.
mt: Kutokana na uwezo wake wa kuwa kituo cha kujitegemea, uchumi wa San Francisco unatambulika kwa kuwa ni kituo cha kujitegemea cha dunia. Uchumi wake unajumuisha huduma za kisheria, usafirishaji, biashara, biashara na utalii. ref: Huku uchumi wa San Francisco ukiunganishwa nayo kuwa kivutio cha watalii cha kimataifa, uchumi wake ni mseto. Sekta kubwa zaidi za ajira ni huduma za kitaalamu, serikali, fedha, biashara, na utalii. Kuonyeshwa kwake mara kwa mara katika muziki, filamu, fasihi na utamaduni maarufu kumesaidia kuufanya mji huo na minara yake ijulikane ulimwenguni kote. San Francisko imekuza miundombinu kubwa ya watalii ambayo ni hoteli mikahawa, na vifaa vingi, vya kongamano vya hali ya juu. San Francisco pia ni mojawapo ya mahali bora nchini kwa vyakula vya Kiasia: Korea, Thai, India, na Japani.

src: Booking in advance gives the traveller peace of mind that they will have somewhere to sleep once they arrive at their destination. Travel agents often have deals with specific hotels, although you may find it possible to book other forms of accommodation, like camping grounds, through a travel agent. Travel agents usually offer packages that include breakfast, transportation arrangements to/from the airport or even combined flight and hotel packages. They can also hold the reservation for you if you need time to think about the offer or procure other documents for your destination (e.g. visa). Any amendments or requests though should be coursed through the travel agent first and not directly with the hotel.
mt: Kuagana kabla ya kuchukua kitu hiki huwezesha mwanamitaji kuwa na amani ya kwamba atakuwa na mahali pa kufurika wakati atakapopanda ndege. Wafanyibiashara wa mitihani mara nyingi wanafanya makubaliano na hoteli za kawaida, ingawa unaweza kuona kuwa unaweza kubadilisha hoteli nyingine, kama vile kampi, kwa kwa wafanyibiashara wa mitihani. Wafanyibiashara wa mitihani mara nyingi wanawajumuisha pakiti ambazo zinahusisha chakula, usafirishaji wa kufikia na pia pakiti za ndege na hoteli. Wanaweza pia kuhifadhi usajili wako kama unahitaji wakati wa kujifunza pakiti au kupata vitambulisho vya kufika (k.m. visa). Kila mabadiliko au mapitio bado lazima iwe kwa wafanyibiashara wa mitihani kwanza na sio kwa hoteli.
ref: Kuhifadhi mapema humpatia msafiri amani ya akili kwamba atapata mahali pa kulala atakapofika. Kampuni za uwakala wa usafiri mara nyingi huwa na ofa na hoteli maalum, ingawa unaweza kupata uwezekano wa kuhifadhi aina nyingine za malazi, kama mahali pa kupiga kambi, kupitia wakala wa usafiri. Kampuni za wakala wa usafiri kwa kawaida hutoa vifurushi vya ofa ambavyo hujumuisha kiamshakinywa, mipango ya uchukuzi kwenda/kutoka kwenye uwanja wa ndege au hata vifurushi vya ndege na hoteli vilivyochanganywa. Pia wanaweza kukuwekea uhifadhi iwapo unahitaji muda wa kufikiria kuhusu ofa hiyo au kupata hati nyingine za mahali unapokwenda (k.m. visa). Marekebisho au maombi yoyote lazima yafuatwe kupitia wakala wa kusafiri kwanza na si moja kwa moja na hoteli.

src: Real-time text translator apps – applications that are capable of automatically translating whole segments of text from one language into another. Some of the applications in this category can even translate texts in foreign languages on signs or other objects in the real world when the user points the smartphone towards those objects. The translation engines have improved dramatically, and now often give more or less correct translations (and more seldom gibberish), but some care is due, as they still may have gotten it all wrong. One of the most prominent apps in this category is Google Translate, which allows offline translation after downloading the desired language data.
mt: App za kutafsiri kwa kipindi cha real-time – app zinazoweza kutafsiri sehemu kwa sehemu za kifungu cha kitala moja kwa nyingine. Kuna app nyingi katika kundi hili zinaweza kutafsiri kifungu cha kitala moja kwa nyingine katika ulimwengu wa asili wakati mtumiaji anapiga simu yake kuelekea kifungu hicho. Mafunzo ya mifumo ya kutafsiri yameimarishwa kwa wingi, na sasa mara nyingi hutafsiri kwa kipindi cha kutosha (na mara nyingi hutafsiri kwa kipindi cha kufikiria), lakini kuna haja ya kujitahidi, kwa sababu zaidi mara zinaweza kufikiri kwa kipindi cha kutosha.
ref: Programu za utafsiri wa matini kwa wakati halisi – programu-tumizi ambazo zina uwezo wa kutafsiri sehemu nzima za matini kutoka lugha moja kwa nyingine kiotomatiki. Baadhi ya programu-tumizi katika kategoria hii zinaweza hata kutafsiri matini ya lugha za kigeni kwenye vibao vya ishara au vitu vingine katika dunia halisi wakati mtumiaji anapoelekeza simu maizi kwenye vitu hivyo. Injini za utafsiri zimeimarika sana, na sasa mara nyingi hutoa tafsiri inayokaribia usahihi (na kawaida huwa si upuzi), lakini umakini unahitajika, kwani zinaweza kuwa zimekosea kabisa. Mojawapo ya programu maarufu sana katika kategoria hii ni Google Translate, ambayo huruhusu utafsiri nje ya mtandao baada ya kupakua data ya lugha inayotakikana.

src: Real-time text translator apps – applications that are capable of automatically translating whole segments of text from one language into another. Some of the applications in this category can even translate texts in foreign languages on signs or other objects in the real world when the user points the smartphone towards those objects. The translation engines have improved dramatically, and now often give more or less correct translations (and more seldom gibberish), but some care is due, as they still may have gotten it all wrong. One of the most prominent apps in this category is Google Translate, which allows offline translation after downloading the desired language data.
mt: App za kutafsiri kwa kipindi cha real-time – app zinazoweza kutafsiri sehemu kwa sehemu za kifungu cha kitala moja kwa nyingine. Kuna app nyingi katika kundi hili zinaweza kutafsiri kifungu cha kitala moja kwa nyingine katika ulimwengu wa asili wakati mtumiaji anapiga simu yake kuelekea kifungu hicho. Mafunzo ya mifumo ya kutafsiri yameimarishwa kwa wingi, na sasa mara nyingi hutafsiri kwa kipindi cha kutosha (na mara nyingi hutafsiri kwa kipindi cha kufikiria), lakini kuna haja ya kujitahidi, kwa sababu zaidi mara zinaweza kufikiri kwa kipindi cha kutosha.
ref: Programu za utafsiri wa matini kwa wakati halisi – programu-tumizi ambazo zina uwezo wa kutafsiri sehemu nzima za matini kutoka lugha moja kwa nyingine kiotomatiki. Baadhi ya programu-tumizi katika kategoria hii zinaweza hata kutafsiri matini ya lugha za kigeni kwenye vibao vya ishara au vitu vingine katika dunia halisi wakati mtumiaji anapoelekeza simu maizi kwenye vitu hivyo. Injini za utafsiri zimeimarika sana, na sasa mara nyingi hutoa tafsiri inayokaribia usahihi (na kawaida huwa si upuzi), lakini umakini unahitajika, kwani zinaweza kuwa zimekosea kabisa. Mojawapo ya programu maarufu sana katika kategoria hii ni Google Translate, ambayo huruhusu utafsiri nje ya mtandao baada ya kupakua data ya lugha inayotakikana.

src: Avalanches are not an abnormality; steep slopes can hold only so much slow, and the excess volumes will come down as avalanches. The problem is that snow is sticky, so it needs some triggering to come down, and some snow coming down can be the triggering event for the rest. Sometimes the original trigging event is the sun warming the snow, sometimes some more snowfall, sometimes other natural events, often a human.
mt: Kuanguka kwa barafu si jambo la kawaida; milima ya kawaida yanaweza kubeba tu kiasi, na kipindi cha kawaida cha barafu ni chini, na barafu ya kawaida inaweza kufika kama kuanguka. Kitu kubwa ni kwamba barafu ni ngumu, hivyo inahitaji kifaa cha kuchangia kufika kama kuanguka, na barafu moja inaweza kuwa kifaa cha kuchangia kwa barafu nyingine. Kwa mara nyingi kifaa cha kuchangia ni mabadiliko ya jua, kwa mara nyingi mabadiliko ya barafu, kwa mara nyingi mabadiliko ya tabianchi, mara nyingi mabadiliko ya binadamu.
ref: Maporomoko ya theluji si uhitilafiani wa kawaida; mteremko mkali unaweza kushikilia theluji kiwango fulani, na viwango vya ziada vitashuka kama maporomoko ya theluji. Tatizo ni kwamba theluji ni danganyifu, kwa hivyo inahitaji kuanzishwa ili iteremke, na kuteremka kwa theluji kidogo huenda kukawa tukio la kuanzisha iliyobaki. Wakati mwingine tukio asilia linalochochea ni jua kupasha joto theluji, wakati mwingine kuanguka zaidi kwa theluji, wakati mwingine matukio ya asili, mara nyingi binadamu.

src: "A curry is a dish based on herbs and spices, together with either meat or vegetables. A curry can be either ""dry"" or ""wet"" depending on the amount of liquid. In inland regions of Northern India and Pakistan, yogurt is commonly used in curries; in Southern India and some other coastal regions of the subcontinent, coconut milk is commonly used."
mt: "Kamati ni chakula kimepangwa kwa miti na viwanda, pamoja na asili ya nyama au vyakula. Kamati inaweza kuwa "joto" au "watu" kulingana na umuhimu wa maji. Katika maeneo ya kaskazini ya India na Pakistan, yoghurt inatumika kwa kiasi kikubwa katika kamati; katika mashariki ya India na sehemu nyingine za pwani ya kanda hiyo, dhaifu la nazi linatumika kwa kiasi kikubwa."
ref: "Bizari ni chakula kilichoundwa kwa mimea na viungo, pamoja na nyama au mboga. Bizari inaweza kuwa ""kavu"" au ""yenye unyevunyevu"" kulingana na kiasi cha kioevu. katika maeneo ya bara la Kaskazini mwa India na Pakistani, mtindi kwa kawaida hutumiwa katika mchuzi wenye viungo; Katika Kusini mwa India na mikoa mingine ya pwani ya bara ndogo, maziwa ya nazi hutumiwa sana."

src: The South Pole Traverse (or Highway) is a 1600 km trail from McMurdo Station on the Ross Sea to the Pole. It's compacted snow with crevasses filled in and marked by flags. It can only be traveled by specialized tractors, hauling sleds with fuel and supplies. These aren't very nimble so the trail has to take a long swerve around the Transantarctic Mountains to come onto the plateau.
mt: South Pole Traverse (au Highway) ni njia ya 1600 km kutoka McMurdo Station juu ya Bahari ya Ross hadi Pole. Inaweza kubakiwa kwa barabara ya mchanga iliyokatwa na kifaru cha kifua kifuani. Inaweza kubakiwa kwa trakta za kawaida, na kufuata njia ya kifaru na kifua cha mafuta na vitu vya kutosha. Hizi si trakta za kawaida, kwa hiyo njia inahitaji kubakiwa kwa njia kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa kubwa k
ref: Njia ya Ncha ya Kusini (au Barabara Kuu) ni njia yenye urefu wa kilomita 1600 kutoka Kituo cha McMurdo katika Bahari ya Ross hadi kwenye ncha. Ni theluji iliyoshikanishwa na mianya kuzibwa ndani na kuwekwa alama ya bendera. Inaweza kusafiriwa tu na matrekta maalum, magari ya kukokota kwenye theluji yenye mafuta na vifaa. Hizi si nyepesi sana kwa hivyo inabidi treni kuchukua mzunguko mrefu katika Milima ya Transantarctic ili kuja kwenye tambarare.

src: Entering Southern Africa by car is an amazing way to see all the region's beauty as well as to get to places off the normal tourist routes. This can be done in a normal car with careful planning but a 4x4 is highly advised and many locations are only accessible with a high wheel base 4x4. Keep in mind while planning that although Southern Africa is stable not all neighboring countries are. Visa requirements and costs vary from nation to nation and are affected by the country you come from. Each country also has unique laws requiring what emergency items need to be in the car.
mt: Kuingia katika Afrika Kusini kwa gari ni njia nyingi ya kuona zaidi ya upelelezi wa nchi hiyo na pia kufika katika mahali pa kawaida. Hii inaweza kufanywa kwa gari la kawaida na kwa kujitahidi lakini 4x4 ni lazima na mahali pengine yako hatarini kwa gari la 4x4. Kwa kujifunza kuwa Afrika Kusini ni nchi ya amani, hata hivyo, nchi zinazofuata hazisemiwi. Mipaka ya nchi zinazoelekezwa na visa zinazoelekezwa na kodi zinazoelekezwa na nchi yako na nchi yako inaweza kufanya kazi kwa nchi yako. Kila nchi pia ina sheria za kawaida zinazohitaji kuhusu vitu vya kawaida vya kawaida vya kawaida vya kawaida vya kawaida vya kawaida vya kawaida vya kawaida vya kawaida vya kawaida vya kawaida vya kawaida vya kawaida vya kawaida vya kawaida vya kawaida vya kawaida vya kawaida vya kawaida vya kawaida vya kawaida vya kawaida vya kawaida vya kawaida vya kawaida vya kawaida vya kawaida vya kawaida vya kawaida vya kawaida vya kawaida vya kawaida vya kawaida vya kawaida vya kawaida vya kawaida vya kawaida vya kawaida vya kawaida vya kawaida vya kawaida vya kawaida vya kawaida vya kawaida vya kawaida vya kawaida vya kawaida vya kawaida vya kawaida vya kawaida vya kawaida vya kawaida vya kawaida vya kawaida vya kawaida vya kawaida vya k
ref: Kuingia Afrika Kusini kwa gari ni njia ya ajabu ya kuona uzuri wote wa eneo vilevile kufika mahali kusiko katika njia za kawaida za watalii. Hii inaweza kufanywa kwenye gari la kawaida kwa mipango makini lakini inapendekezwa sana gari la 4 kwa 4 na sehemu nyingi zinaweza kufikika tu kwa gari la 4 kwa 4 lenye magurudumu mapana. Zingatia wakati wa kupanga kwamba ingawa Kaskazini mwa Afrika ni imara si nchi zote jirani zilizo imara. Mahitaji na gharama ya visa hutofautiana toka nchi hadi nchi na huathiriwa na nchini unakotoka. Kila nchi pia ina sheria za kipekee zinazotaja ni vifaa vipi vya dharura unavyohitaji kuwa navyo garini mwako.
